If you're serious about speaking in our COVID0-conscious culture, you've got to start livestreaming right now.
Streamyard for Speakers is your fast-track to stepping into online opportunities to share your messages anytime, from anywhere, alone or with any guests you choose.
This course includes everything you need, in step-by-step video tutorials, to streamline your introduction to livestreaming to YouTube, Facebook, LinkedIn and more through the powerful platform of Streamyard.
You'll not only discover the exact steps and shortcuts to get you up and livestreaming quickly and easily, but you will actually set it all up as you go. You'll be ready to roll* in less than two hours by simply watching the 1-3 minute videos (at regular or fast speed), and pausing between to take your next action step.
Do not wait for the perfect studio set-up, expensive equipment or to magically become tech-savvy. Other speakers who have none of the above are already livestreaming. Why not you?
Furthermore, why wait until you miss a golden invite because you weren't ready to fo live?
Take this course and set your Streamyard up today! Get positioned to gain credibility, increase your visibility and land speaking gigs that require livestream skills.
This course introduces you to the tools and strategies you need to go from invisible to livestreaming immediately. In "Mentor Marnie's" unique "Marnie Minute" format, everything here is fast, direct and will get you going before you miss another opportunity.
Two Hours from Now You Will Know How To:
Go live on YouTube, Facebook, LinkedIn and more, anytime you want
Preschedule future Livestreams to allow time to invite guests and promote
Invite viewers via any social media outlet, email and/or text messaging
Record video clips to use in your social posts or as advance marketing for your upcoming events
Brand your videos, apply cover art and add a marketing ticker to the bottom of your livestreams
Share comments to the screen from viewers live in the chat area (even while streaming to multiple social channels)
And so much more!
This course is fast and exactly what you need to get up to speed today. It includes examples, templates and tutorial videos so you can implement what you are learning at top speed.
Learning how to livestream via Streamyard will take you from antiquated to top-tier in two hours or less. You'll emerge with the skills, tools and confidence you need to outshine most other speakers who are still stuck pre-COVID or on limited platforms like Zoom.
Gain the reputation of a speaker who is READY.
Gain momentum as a speaker who wisely and confidently maximizes livestreaming by using Streamyard.
Being able to go live anytime is a critical skill for speakers who are serious about booking on-premise and on-line events.
Streamyard for Speakers is neither intimidating nor complex, it's simply the fastest and most effective way for you to move from off-line to on-line speaking ASAP because two hours from now you'll know exactly what to do and be ready to create instant or pre-scheduled livestream video programs.

"Mentor Marnie" is not only the creator of "Marnie Minutes" but also the director of the Christian Women's Speaker's Directory promoting over 1300 speakers to planners around the world. She has helped speakers get booked at thousands of events around the world. Right now, more than ever, it is imperative that speakers are experienced and ready to go live at any time.
Marnie is uniquely equipped to lovingly lead you from your current discomfort zone with the idea of livestreaming using Streamyard, to a whole new level of visibility, faster than you can believe possible.
By the end of this course you will be able to confidently, effectively and immediately go live on YouTube and/or up to eight of your social  platforms anytime. By doing so, you will gain credibility, visibility and bookability to reach more with your message starting right now.

courses.description:
Welcome to The YouTube Marketing & Niche Strategy Masterclass, your definitive blueprint for building a profitable YouTube channel from the ground up.


Are you tired of pouring hours into creating great videos, only to have them disappear into the vast digital ocean? Many creators make this mistake - they focus only on content, and forget the strategy that makes it succeed.


This course is designed to solve that problem.


I will be your guide, holding your hand through a proven, step-by-step system for YouTube success. You'll move beyond just creating videos and learn how to build a sustainable, monetized business. We'll start with the most critical decision - finding a high-potential niche - and then master the powerful marketing techniques that will get your content in front of a massive, engaged audience.


Using only a smartphone or laptop, you will learn to:
Identify a profitable niche with a hungry audience.
Craft scripts and edit videos that maximize viewer retention.
Master YouTube SEO to get your videos ranked and discovered.
Create viral thumbnails that guarantee clicks.
Drive growth and unlock monetization by mastering the YouTube algorithm.
This isn't just another course; it's a complete toolkit for anyone, from a complete beginner to a struggling creator - who is ready to turn their channel into a successful and automated brand. My continuous, direct support means you'll never be alone on your journey.


It's time to stop guessing and start growing. Enroll now and begin building the YouTube channel you've always dreamed of.
target_audience: The Complete Beginner: If you have zero experience with YouTube and don't know where to start, this course is your roadmap. You'll learn the step-by-step process, from finding your niche to creating and promoting your very first video.

The Struggling Creator: If you already have a channel but are not getting the views, subscribers, or watch time you want, this course will show you what you're missing. We'll focus on the strategy behind content, not just the creation, helping you fix the core issues preventing your growth.

The Aspiring Entrepreneur: If you want to use YouTube to create a new income stream or build a business, the course's focus on niche marketing and audience targeting is perfect for you. This is the exact strategy I use for my faceless channels, which are essentially automated businesses.

The Marketer: If you're looking to promote a product, service, or personal brand, you'll learn how to build an audience and drive traffic from YouTube to your website or social media channels. The content targeting and SEO modules are crucial for this.

courses.description:
Do you have a short film? Would you like it to be screened internationally and meet other filmmakers from around the globe?
In this practical course, you will discover a step by step guide on how to submit your film to film festivals and give it the best chances to be officially selected. You will also learn how to create a film festival strategy, that will help you distribute your film and get maximum exposure.
In addition to the festival strategy, you will learn what are the necessary materials every film festival requires and how to prepare them yourself. This includes such practical lessons as creating subtitles, DCP (digital cinema package) for cinema theatres.
Here are some more questions you will get answers to:
What are the differences between Class A, B or C festivals?
Premiere status of a short film, how not to get banned?
Online submission platforms and film festival databases?
How much should I spend on submissions?
What are the common mistakes filmmakers make when submitting their films?
The do's and don'ts for submitting your film to festivals.
By the end of the course, you'll be ready to launch a film festival tour for your short film, whether it is a documentary, fiction, experimental or animation.
target_audience: Film directors, producers, who have just produced their first or second short film and want to promote it and discover the new fascinating world of film festivals.
Beginner distributors who have submitted their films into film festivals but lost their hope in being selected.
Film school students that want their work to get maximum exposure.
Film festival agents, that promote or distribute other filmmakers work.

courses.description:
What this Course is All About
Everyone and their dog these days knows what YouTube is thanks to videos about every topic your can imagine. Whether you've used YouTube as a how to, to get the latest news, or just to watch silly videos of dogs, you know how popular it is. Now even though there is a tonne of competition, you can still get in on the action and given there are nearly 8 Billion people on the planet, carving your own small audience won't take decades. In this course, I want to help get you creating videos about your passion topic today on less than it would cost for a full tank of gas for your car.
The Best Part?
Even though there is a lot of competition and a lot of channels already out there, you can use these techniques to get yourself started with YouTube and even earn some money using Affiliate Marketing, outside of YouTube's own Monetisation!
What Can I Expect?
In this course, I'm not going to give you a full marketing course but I am going to teach you how to do things on a budget, getting you setup with hopefully little more than what you already have in your home. However still looking professional.
target_audience: Creatives who want to start their own YouTube Channel

courses.description:
Are you interested in earning income on YouTube without ever appearing on camera? This course will guide you through the entire process of building a successful faceless YouTube channel using artificial intelligence and automation tools. Whether you value privacy, prefer to stay behind the scenes, or simply want to create content more efficiently, this course is designed to help you achieve your goals.


You will learn how to set up a YouTube channel, choose a profitable niche, and produce high-quality faceless videos. The course covers essential skills including YouTube SEO, video scripting, editing, thumbnail design, and content planning. It also teaches how to market your channel for maximum visibility and how to monetize your efforts through multiple income streams. No prior YouTube experience is necessary — just a computer, an internet connection, and a willingness to learn.


By the end of this course, you will have the tools and knowledge needed to launch and grow a channel that generates income, while keeping your identity private.


What you’ll learn


How YouTube monetization works and how to join the YouTube Partner Program

This course is ideal for aspiring YouTubers, entrepreneurs, freelancers, content creators, and anyone who wants to generate income on YouTube without showing their face.

requirements: Basic Computer Knowledge
courses.description:
Learning to Manage YouTube Channel from Scratch is a course that is focused on introducing YouTube Studio, which is a platform to manage YouTube Channels. In this course, you will be getting familiar with YouTube Studio and work with a Brand Account, and then manage the account. You will learn how to change the channel profile picture, change the channel banner image, and add basic information to the channel. We will also be focusing on how to work around channel privacy settings and notification settings.
Then we will cover how we can add featured videos and trailers to our channel to engage the audiences. This will be followed by video management features inside YouTube Studio to manage the videos that we upload to the channel. We will then also look at how we can add keywords to make our videos easily searchable on YouTube.
We will then explore various elements that we can add to our videos such as thumbnails, cards, and manage related videos on a playlist. We will also look at video editing features that are available through YouTube Studio such as removing parts of videos, blurring parts of videos, and even adding audio to videos.
After that, we will explore the collaboration features provided by YouTube Studio which allows multiple users to manage a single channel with different levels of administrative controls.
We will also look at Audio Library for creators, captioning options for our videos, and community engagement features.
And then in the end we will look at how we can use the analytics features to track how our channel and videos in our channel are performing.
Hope that you will enjoy learning YouTube Studio with me.
target_audience: Beginner

courses.title: How to Create Short Videos for Self-Promotion Online
courses.bio: Learn how to become a video-based marketer quickly

How to Make a Short Video THREE

requirements: Minimal gear - a cell phone with a camera will do
A keen interest in video software and marketing will help
courses.description:
"There's No Escape: The Future of Marketing is Audio Visual.
But... "Now You Can Make your Own Super-Slick Video Ads From Home!"
Rob Parnell here - how's it going?
Listen, This horrible virus has changed the world - and all of us in it - forever.
Where once we had a life outside of the net, and a job too, for many of us that will change.
If you've ever read my prophesies from 20 years ago, you will know that even back then I was teaching new writers they would have to prepare for a brave new world of internet based employment - and as soon as possible.
I hate to say I was right but I do have to say I never expected it to happen so quickly.
All the figures and surveys suggest at least 65% of us will be relying on some form of internet inspired income by 2025. So. Do you get it? The sooner you get involved in the online commercial world, the better.
We live in a time when the unexpected is normal and the unthinkable is just around the corner. You can't keep believing your day job - your normal life - will support you forever - or indeed that any offline job or life will!
Now is the time to learn how to communicate effectively with a band of followers, and potential buyers of your work, whether that's books, courses or perhaps even your music and film projects.
Or perhaps you're a trades-person who needs to let a lot more people know about your skills.
Maybe you're a doctor, a dentist, a real-estate agent or a lawyer.
Or maybe you make things - like clothes or trinkets or bikes or software.
Literally, any skill you have can be monetized and sold online through effective video promotion.
The best part is that the internet is now the most perfect place to sell anything.
All you need to do is to interact with your buyers - and to do it cheaply and effectively, without the need to learn complex new skills or by purchasing any expensive equipment.
Truth is, you can create professional looking ads, video sales letters, blogs, mini seminars and other short video content very easily and at minimal cost.
Let me show you how.
This new course teaches you how to plan, write and create any marketing message you may want to send out to your mailing list or post to social media.
This is the course you need to get you started on your new future, one where you take control of your career and start profiting as a professional author / marketer or teacher.
Here is what you'll learn:
Introduction
Learn why you need to use video to compete in the modern marketplace. And how to be slick without spending lots of money!
What You Will Learn
Where to start, the best way forward, how to maintain autonomy and momentum

First Things First
Attain the correct mindset. Get to know the reality of life behind the camera.
Copyright
Make sure you don't get into legal trouble or get yourself taken down!
Strategy
Learn the 7 step procedure that professionals use to create thumb-stopping video ads.

Getting Ideas
Discover the secret to boundless creativity. How to structure your goals and turn your vague aspirations into concrete results.
Planning
The THREE most crucial aspects of any video creation plan. How to allocate the correct amount of time per minute of digital film.
Tools
What exactly do you need? And what exactly can you get away with? What's the best software for film editing?
Time
Your number one resource examined. The big, BIG secret to creating lively and spontaneous film clips.
The Writing
Learn the straightforward way to write a short script, even f you've never written anything more than a shopping list before.
Editing
Is editing really necessary at all? How to approach editing if it is. What is the true purpose of a script?
Types of Presentation
What is your message? And what is the best way to show it? Learn the FOUR types of presentation available to you. And which is the most suitable for your video.
The Sound of Your Voice
Probably the most crucial part of your presentation. Learn easy fixes to common issues. How to fix bad sound.
Backgrounds
Should you invest in a green screen? How to assess and perfect your "home-based" environments for best effect.
Lights
You don't need expensive studio lighting. See some inexpensive work-rounds.

You - The Presenter
How to best present your own videos. Tips and tricks on how to emulate the professionals.
Your Stance
Learn how to judge and alter how you come across on film. It's all about being subtle!
Filming Advice
The key is simplicity. How to focus on the job at hand and not get carried away! How to stick to the plan

Post Production
Learn how best to file and format your film stock so that's it's easier to edit and handle

Polishing
Add color, spice and pizzazz. Add intros and outros. Make the whole project look slick.

The Music
How to make sure you're not using copyrighted material.
Uploading
There are hundreds of differing types of content and tech specs. Learn the ONE format that will always work, wherever you put it, on whatever website or app, online.
PLUS!
Walk-through Instruction
Special bonus LIVE videos where I show you - on screen - how to use editing software from InVideo

More Resources
How to make intros, outros and logos easily and quickly with InVideo.

How to Make a Promo
Personalized instruction on how to turn a short article into a full on video marketing ad.

See you in class!
target_audience: Beginner marketers, tradespeople, professionals etc.,
online entreprenuers

courses.description:
Formación que te enseñará a grabar, editar y exportar videos para tus cursos o canal de YouTube
Camtasia es la aplicación estrella entre usuarios de Windows (también disponible para Mac) que te permitirá grabar la pantalla de tu equipo de sobremesa o portátil, e incluso de dispositivos móviles como iPhone o iPad (solo disponible en la versión para Mac)
Podrás editar esas grabaciones de manera profesional, añadiendo transiciones o efectos de movimiento, y exportar el resultado final a múltiples formatos, o incluso publicarlo directamente en plataformas como Youtube o Vimeo.


Este curso incluye
Casi 2 horas de video bajo demanda, puedes verlo cuando quieras
Soporte en los comentarios de las lecciones, no aprenderás solo
Acceso de por vida al contenido, refresca lo aprendido cuando quieras
Acceso disponible desde smartphone o tablet, aprende desde el sofá
Certificado de finalización, utilízalo para aumentar tu autoridad


¿Qué voy a aprender en este curso?
Si aun no tienes una copia de Camtasia te enseñaré como comprar una licencia e instalarla.
Comprenderás los conceptos más básicos de Camtasia 2020 y de la edición de vídeo, las resoluciones y framerates dejarán de ser un misterio para ti.
Aprenderás a grabar vídeos de la pantalla de tu equipo y de tus dispositivos iOS como iPhone o iPad (solo disponible en Mac!).
Descubrirás cómo editar tus vídeos como un auténtico profesional, creando animaciones de todo tipo que dejarán a tu audiencia boquiabierta.
Te enseñaré a utilizar filtros de vídeo para que puedas, por ejemplo, deshacerte del fondo verde de tu Croma con un simple click, y filtros de audio para que puedas eliminar el molesto ruido de fondo que existe en la mayoría de las grabaciones.
Verás cómo añadir callouts, subtítulos, y demás anotaciones visuales para que tu audiencia no se pierda durante tus explicaciones.
Te mostraré cómo puedes exportar tus creaciones.


Por qué necesitas este curso
El formato vídeo, además de una poderosa herramientas de marketing y promoción, es una de las mejores maneras de distribuir tu conocimiento en la actualidad, y lo seguirá siendo durante muchos años.

Las personas recuerdan mucho mejor una imagen que un simple audio o un texto que han leído, pero si sigues creando los clásicos vídeos de pantalla estática no estarás ofreciendo la mejor experiencia a tu audiencia.


¿Es esta formación para ti?
Si tu perfil encaja con uno de los siguientes, y estás buscando una herramienta profesional de grabación y edición de vídeo, entonces este curso es para ti.
Formadores online que quieren enseñar en remoto en su propia plataforma o en servicios de terceros.
Bloggers o Youtubers que quiere crear contenido más atractivo para hacer crecer su audiencia.
Profesores de escuela o de universidad que quiere mejorar su enseñanza.
Marketers que quieren crear contenido para promocionar su marca o producto.
Personas que simplemente quieren iniciarse en la creación de vídeo.


¿Cuáles son los requerimientos?
Además de una conexión a Internet para visualizar las lecciones, para poder seguir este curso necesitarás:
El Software de Camtasia, al menos la versión de prueba.
Un buen micrófono será de gran ayuda para darle mejor voz a tus vídeos, pero es algo opcional.
No son necesarios conocimientos previos de ningún tipo ya que en el curso enseño desde los conceptos más básicos a las funciones más avanzadas.
target_audience: Formadores online que quieren enseñar en remoto en su propia plataforma o en servicios de terceros como Udemy gracias a Camtasia 2018.

courses.description:
Do you feel camera anxiety every time you hit record?


Do you struggle with on-camera presence, wondering how to look natural, confident, and engaging? You’re not alone. Many content creators, professionals, and entrepreneurs find the idea of making content online very intimidating—but the good news is, camera confidence is a skill you can learn.


This course is designed to help you overcome camera shyness, build on-camera charisma, and create professional-quality online content, whether you’re making YouTube content, creating online courses, or hosting live webinars.

What You’ll Learn:
Overcome camera fear with practical mindset techniques and confidence-building exercises
Develop a strong on-camera presence using effective body language, vocal variety, and engagement techniques
Master video content creation—learn scripting, storytelling, and audience engagement strategies
Video production for beginners—set up a simple yet professional studio setup with proper lighting, sound, and camera
Speak confidently on camera, whether for YouTube videos, YouTube Marketing, virtual presentations, or online teaching
Structure and plan compelling videos so you never run out of content ideas for your next YouTube video or online course
Build the essential foundation of habits and skills necessary for YouTube audience growth, to build your online following, or for YouTube marketing
Find your voice—identify and make the most of your natural traits to make your content stand out


Why This Course?
This is more than just a public speaking course. It’s a complete on-camera training program that bridges the gap between confidence, content creation, and video production. You’ll not only feel more comfortable on camera but also learn how to create videos that people actually want to watch.


If you’ve ever wondered:
How do I stop feeling awkward when speaking to a camera?
How can I make my videos more engaging?
What’s the best way to set up lighting and audio for video?
How do I structure my content to keep an audience engaged?


Then this course will give you clear, step-by-step guidance to help you look, sound, and feel more confident on video—no matter your experience level.


By the end of this course, you will:
Feel at ease speaking on camera, whether for YouTube videos, YouTube marketing, social media, online courses, or professional presentations.
Create engaging video content that keeps your audience watching until the end.
Build a strong personal brand on video, making you more memorable and impactful.
Enhance your public speaking skills, improving how you communicate in all areas of life.
Master camera techniques for beginners, so you can film professional-quality videos with minimal equipment.
Understand video production basics, so you can create high-quality videos without spending a fortune on gear.


Who is this course for?
Content creators and aspiring YouTubers who want to improve their on-camera confidence
Professionals, coaches, and entrepreneurs who need to present on video for their business
Online educators and course creators who want to be more engaging and charismatic on camera
Anyone looking to overcome camera shyness and become a more confident speaker


You don’t need expensive equipment or prior experience—just a willingness to practice and improve. Whether you’re filming with a smartphone or a mirrorless camera, this course will help you develop real on-camera confidence and create engaging, high-quality videos without overcomplicating the process.


If you’re ready to break free from camera fear, speak with confidence, and start creating video content that stands out, sign up now—I’ll see you in the course!
target_audience: Anyone looking to overcome camera nerves and become a more confident speaker

courses.description:
Unleash Your On-Camera Power with Presenter Bootcamp
Looking to captivate your audience, grow your brand, and boost your business? Whether you're part of a company, organisation or simply building your own profile, Presenter Bootcamp is your fast-track to confident, professional video presentation.
In today’s digital age, being comfortable on camera is no longer a luxury—it’s essential. With online video now one of the most powerful communication tools available, it’s time to embrace this medium and start creating high-quality content that connects.
Platforms like YouTube attract billions of views each month, and over a third of UK adults now regularly consume video content online. This is your chance to reach wider audiences, share your message more effectively, and build trust through video—without the need for expensive production equipment.
This practical bootcamp is designed to help you create clear, engaging, and professional content using just a smartphone. We’ll cover everything from planning and scripting to presentation skills, technical setup and common mistakes to avoid. You’ll gain the confidence and know-how to present naturally and effectively, whether you're delivering internal updates, promoting a service, or building your online presence.
What you'll learn:

Apply storytelling techniques to keep viewers watching until the end

Improve delivery and pacing to increase viewer engagement and retention
Bonus Content:
You’ll also receive specialist guidance on presenting for vertical video, ideal for Instagram Reels, TikTok and YouTube Shorts. Learn how to frame, pace, and tailor your message to suit mobile-first viewing, and stand out on fast-moving social feeds.
This course is hands-on, practical, and tailored to real-world use. All you need is a phone and the motivation to improve.
Ready to be seen, heard and remembered?
Join Presenter Bootcamp and start creating video content that truly delivers.

courses.description:
グーグル広告は、マーケッターにとって、最も重要な広告配信手法となっています。
このコースは、Google広告の中でも特に、Youtube動画広告を扱います。


これから広告代理店への就職に関して興味のある方や、デジタルマーケティングの知識を深めたいと考えている方にとっては、 このコースがお役に立てると考えています。


2022年現在、日本における広告費は、その約4割がインターネット広告となっており、その割合は今後も伸び続けていくことが予想されています。 その中心に位置するのがGoogleです。また市場が伸び続けている動画広告市場において、Youtubeは圧倒的なシェアとなっています。 動画広告をマスターするには、まず一番最初に、Youtubeをマスターする必要があるのが現状となっています。


一方で、Googleのプラットフォームは常にアップデートを繰り返しており、直近の2021年にも大きなアップデートがあり、 最新の情報をキャッチアップすることに難しさを感じていらっしゃる方も多いのではないでしょうか。 これからYouTube広告を自ら操作し配信してみようと考えている方にとっては、なおさらそのような状況かと推察しています。


この講座はそのような人に向けて作成しました。


Google ユーチューブ広告は、とてもパワフルな広告配信手法です。
このコースは、理論、設定をカバーしています。
実戦形式で、実際の管理画面を見ながら解説していますので書籍など他のツールと比べても圧倒的に分かりやすく学習することができます。
Youtubeチャンネルを立ち上げていきます。
実際に動画を作成していきます。
動画の作成に当たり構成のフォーマットもご用意しています。


一度、このコースに時間を投資し、Youtube広告の操作、設定、動画作成方法などを体系的に学習していただければ、 そこから多くの利益を上げることが可能になります。その投資以上の結果が出ることをお約束いたします。


このコースはYoutube動画広告を使用しビジネスを拡大していこうと考えていらっしゃる、すべての方が対象です。
とても基礎的な内容からスタートし、徐々に応用について説明していますので、初心者の方でも安心して取り組みいただけます。


私は広告代理店でコンサルタントをしていましたが、多くのお客様は、代理店へ頼むほどの予算はないけど、自分たちでやれるほどの知識もないという状態です。 また、広告代理店の担当者様も新人教育や社員教育をもっと効率的にしていきたいけど時間がないという状態なのではないでしょうか。


知識が不足している状態でYoutube広告に取り組んでも、多くのお金と時間を無駄にしてしまいます。 そうなる前に、是非、知識をつけていただきたい、そのような想いで作成しています。


本コースは全く知識がない状態からGoogle広告のプラットフォームを自由に使いこなし、広告運用をしていける状態を目指していくコースです。


このコース終了時には、Googleユーチューブ広告の初心者を脱して、上級者としての知識を得ることができます。一人で試行錯誤することなく最短での上級者への道をご案内いたします。


＊＊返金保証＊＊
もちろん30日以内であれば、いつでもキャンセル可能です。 あなたの貴重な時間を頂いていることを意識し、内容にもとにかくこだわって作成しています。 是非、この機会に本コースを受講いただき、Youtube広告に対する理解を深めて頂ければと思います。


よろしくお願いいたします。

There are about a BILLION reasons:
YouTube has over 1 billion users — that’s about ⅓ of the entire internet
Over 1 billion hours of video are watched DAILY on YouTube
On mobile alone, YouTube reaches more 18-34 year olds than any TV network
95% of ads are viewable and played with sound on — it is easier and faster than ever to get your message in front of your target audience
Ok. YouTube is huge.
And this course will teach you how to get your message in front of anybody you want. Whenever you want.
Don’t miss out on this opportunity to engage your prospects like never before.


Here’s exactly what you’ll learn when you enroll:


Section 1
Confused about video advertising? You won’t be after this section. In addition to the basics, you’ll learn our number one strategy for targeting your potential customers. This is the secret sauce that makes everything work.


Section 2
There is a format for high converting YouTube ads. And in this section, we show you what it is.


Section 3
Time for a quick overview of Google Ads (AdWords) and some best practices to get you started. We also talk bidding and make sense of all the additional targeting options you have at your disposal.


Section 4
Introducing Placement Targeting! This is where we get down to business and deep dive into the full targeting strategy of this course. Wondering how to generate lists of videos your customers are watching? We’ll show you how.


Section 5
Campaign Strategy. Here we make sure we are using the right structure and make sure we have proper tracking. If you ain’t trackin’, it ain’t happenin’!


Section 6
Time to build that first video campaign! You’re going to love this one. We leave no stone unturned and show you the best setup options to ensure success.


Section 7
Here is where you the magic happens. It his section you’ll learn how to analyze, exclude, and expand your campaigns based on performance data. This is how you scale what’s working and kill what’s not.


Section 8
There are common pitfalls that should be avoided. They are costly and annoying. Here you’ll learn what they are so you can save your budget and time for what’s working.


Section 9
BONUS! Want to show ads to people who’ve viewed some of your videos? Now you can! This is a crash course on video retargeting.


Section 10
Now you’re an expert. Here we reflect on what we’ve learned in this course and tie up any loose ends.


Each of these sections will build upon the last and give you a crystal clear understanding of how to implement a successful YouTube advertising strategy for your business or company.
By the end of this course you’ll have everything you need to drive targeted traffic, leads and sales with YouTube Advertising. Remember, it’s totally risk-free to get started.
Are you ready to harness the power of video?


Enroll now and grow your business with video today!

لاشك أن اليوتيوب هو المصدر الأول والأقوي والاسرع والاضمن في الوقت الحالي للربح والعمل عبر الانترنت , فكلنا يعلم ان اليوتيوب عمل حقيقي وقام بتغير مسار حياة الكثيرين من الأشخاص ولكن يجب ان تتحلي بالعزيمة والاصرار وترك الكسل حتي تستطيع الظهور اولاً في اليوتيوب والحصول علي الالاف الدولارات شهرياً مثل الكثيرين , لا يوجد مايميز أي شخص عنك فانت تستطيع ان تصبح أفضل منهم وتحقق أرباح اضعافهم فقط تعلم ثم اجتهد في تطبيق ماتعلمته .


الجميع يتسائل كيف ينجح الناس في اليوتيوب.
الكثير من الناس لا يعرفون اسرار اليوتيوب وخصوصا النجاح بسرعة في هذا المجال والكثير منا يتعرض لحقوق طبع ونشر ولا يعرف ما هو السر فيها وكيف يمكن تجاوزها.
لذلك قمت بإعداد هذا الكورس الإحترافي و الكامل المتكامل من الصفر الى الإحتراف و بشكل سلس لكي تبدأ رحلتك بالنجاح على اليوتيوب و تبدأ بحصد النتائج و الأرباح كما كنت تشاهد نجاح الأخرين سوف تكون انت مكان الأخرين تستمتع بالأرباح.

courses.description:
このコースは、ScreenFlow（スクリーンフロー）の使い方を動画で解説したものです。僕は長らくCamtasiaを使っていましたが、米国UdemyのトップクリエイターはみんなScreenFlowを使っていたので、どれほどのものか知りたくなり試してみたところ、本当に使いやすい。
大きな違いは、アプリケーションの軽重。Camtasiaは重いし、Chromeのような常駐アプリと競合することが多く頻繁にクラッシュします。一方、ScreenFlowはほとんどクラッシュしません。一つ一つのメニューの反応も早く、サクサクと作業を進められます。
もちろんCamtasiaにも良いところがあるし、ScreenFlowにも悪いところがある。でも、CamtasiaからScreenFlowに乗り換えてから、僕が一度も「Camtasiaに戻りたい」と思ったことがない・・・ということを鑑みると、トータルではScreenFlowの方が使いやすいからではないでしょうか。
検索エンジンを使う基本なモチベーションは「悩み解決したいから」です。Facebookにアクセスする時だって「Facebook」と検索するはずです。つまり「Facebookに行きたいという悩み」を解決してくれるのがGoogleなどの検索エンジンなのです。検索キーワードが「痩せる方法」とか「ニキビ　消す方法」とか「英語　勉強法」とかであれば、より悩みが切実でしょう。
ブログで生計を立てている人たちに啓発されて「僕も彼らのようにパソコン1台で生きてゆきたい」と考える人は多いようです。僕も同じような類の人間なのでよく気持ちはわかります。彼らはテキストを駆使してお金を稼ぎます。なぜお金が生まれるかと言えば、やはりブログの記事が誰かの悩みを解決しているからです。ここでふと思うことがあります。なぜブロガー長者はいないのか、ということです。ブログでムッチャ儲けている人を見かけることはありません。
一方、YouTuber長者はたくさんいます。今は活動をやめちゃったけど、一時期すごい有名になったヒカルさんは年収5億円と公表し、世間を驚かせました。ブログだけで5億円を稼ぐ人は見たことがありません。なぜか？動画の方が人の悩みを解決しやすいからです。僕らがNetflixやHuluを開いて「あー、面白い映画ないかなー」と探している時も、やはり「面白い動画を見て時間を潰したい」という悩みがベースにあります。エンターテイメントも、やはり誰かの悩みを解決しているわけです。
そう、動画は誰かの悩みを解決しやすい。もしあなたが何かに悩み、検索行動を通して、それを解決したとします。今度はあなたがその解決法を動画にして、誰かの悩みを解消してあげます。悩みを解決する動画コンテンツには、YouTubeであれば広告収入が支払われ、Udemyであればコース収入が支払われます。
target_audience: Udemyの講師

E i tuoi video come sono? sei contento, soddisfatto? Ricevi molti like? Condivisioni? Interazioni?
Se la risposta è no allora questo Video Audio Corso fa al caso tuo.
Dobbiamo correre ai ripari e correggere subito il tiro non credi?
Cosa serve?


BASTA il tuo SMARTPHONE - un microfono a spilla ( o USB ) una buona luce ( meglio un anello di luce ) e tanta voglia di imparare.

Andremo a comprendere l’importanza di un Audio e di un Video di qualità superiori, con un microfono cardioide, a spilla e anche USB,  anche con il solo utilizzo di uno smartphone.
Fare dei video luminosi, andremo a comprendere il significato di nebbia o "sporcature", come trovare una location adatta, video verticali o orizzontali e il perché, come comprimere un video e mantenerlo nel tuo smartphone senza appesantirlo, la migliore centratura, il piano americano e tanto altro.
Ricordati che se vuoi emergere nel fantastico mondo della rete, hai il dovere di alzare l’asticella, e se hai dei validi contenuti ma pecchi nella realizzazione, continuerai a essere mediocre.

Ti aspetto dall’altra parte.
Marco

courses.description:
So, you are a digital marketing manager working hard to increase website conversion and generate more leads. You know that a professional video is essential to achieve your goals, but you don’t have enough budget to hire an agency, and you don’t have time to create a professional video yourself.
Until you find this course - How to quick create a professional video using Keynote?
Keynote is easy to use and has gorgeous design elements that make easy for anyone to create beautiful slides. And besides being presentation software, it can also be used to create videos in a fraction of the time would take using a professional video software tool.
And since you don’t want to change your career to become a professional video editor why you would spend hundred of hours learning complex software? With Keynote, you can create a professional video fast and inexpensively.
Besides Keynote there are a few other elements you have to learn to be able to create videos that get people’s attention and lead them to take action. So here is a small insight into what you will learn in this course:
1) Requirements - the necessary hardware and software, many of which are free.
2) Script writing - how to write a great script following a simple recipe.
3) Voice-over - How to record your voice clearly as the TV Network, or if you don’t like your voice, how to hire a voice-over professional very affordably.
4) Storyboard - Why you should create one and how to do it fast, even if you don’t know how to draw.
5) Keynote 80/20 video creation course - Learn the 20% about Keynote you will use 80% of the time when creating a video.
6) Image editing 80/20 course (with free software) - Learn the 20% about image editing that you will use 80% of the time when creating videos. Plus, where to find cheap images and never pay more than U$ 2.00 for an image.
7) Animating in Keynote - Look over my shoulder while I animate tricky shots in Keynote.
8) Video editing with ScreenFlow - Synchronizing the audio with the animation.
9) Sound Design - Give the final touch with music and sound effects, plus where to find free and cheap sounds.
When you finish this course, you will be able to create professional videos in less than two weeks with just a small outlay of money.
I encourage you to watch the free lessons below and judge the quality of this course for yourself.
It has a 30-day money back guaranty, lifetime access and my full support to answer any of your questions.
Thanks for watching and if you decide to join I will see you inside.

courses.description:
テンプレート付きの講座で学び自社商品のセールスに動画を取り入れて売上拡大したいですか？
オンラインコンテンツのセールスには様々なものがあります。ブログやページだけで販売する方法からメルマガやSNSを駆使したセールス方法など。あなたも様々な情報を目にして実践経験をしてきたはずです。
その中でもセールス手法として注目されているのが動画セールスです。といっても、動画はアニメーションツールを使った複雑で凝ったものではありません。無料のパワーポイントやスライドなどのプレゼンテーションツールを使って、テキスト中心の資料をサクッと作って、流れに沿って読んでいくだけでセールス動画が完成します。
この動画セールスを取り入れれば、長文のセールスレターを制作したり、何通ものステップメールを書くことに比べて圧倒的に短時間にセールス素材を準備でき、売り上げを作り出すことができます。
しかも、今回のビデオセールスレター講座の中では、コピーライティングを基本にして解説していますので、順番に流れに沿って文章を作っていくだけでセールス資料が完成します。早い方であれば数時間でセールスを開始できるかもしれません。それくらい他のセールス方法に比べて優位性があります。時は金なり、です。
このオンラインコースでは、売れるためのコピーライティングの要素解説からビデオセールスレターを制作するための資料作成や画面収録方法までカバーするだけでなく、具体的に私が使ったテンプレートと記載済みの資料、実際のセールスビデオ素材を共有させていただきますので、このテンプレートを書き進めて私の動画を真似していただければ、迷うことなく短期間でセールス動画を作ることができます。
まずビデオセールス動画をあなたのセールスツールに組み入れてセールスのサイクルと成約率を引き上げて、あなたの事業を安定的にしていただければと考えています。
では、コース内でお会いしましょう。

objectives: Wie du einen YouTube-Kanal schnell aufbauen und monetarisieren kannst

Internet / Computer
courses.description:
Hi,
in diesem Kurs YouTube SEO zeige ich dir, wie du mit einer cleveren YouTube-Marketing-Strategie und dem den AI-Tools von vidIQ deinen YouTube-Kanal schnell zum wachsen bringst, damit du ihn monetarisieren kannst.
Für diesen Kurs habe ich die TOP-YouTuber studiert (und auch zahlreiche derer Kurse gekauft), um herauszufinden, ob es einen perfekten Fahrplan gibt, um auch mit einem kleinen Kanal auf YouTube erfolgreich zu sein.
Und siehe da: Bereits mein 6. Video auf meinem neu erstellten Kanal ist auf Platz 1 in den Suchergebnissen gelandet.
Das Beste ist aber, dass man den Prozess leicht kopieren kann. Und genau darum geht es in diesem Kurs.
Wir konzentrieren uns nicht auf die "technische Erstellung eines YouTube-Kanals", sondern auf die praktische Umsetzung, wie du deinen YouTube-Kanal möglichst schnell zum Wachsen bringst.


Der Schlüssel zum Erfolg liegt zunächst darin, eine klare Strategie für deinen Kanal zu haben. Dabei ist es wichtig zu verstehen, was in deiner Nische wirklich funktioniert und welche Art von Inhalten deine Zielgruppe anspricht. Ich zeige dir, wie du die erfolgreichen Kanäle in deiner Branche auswertest – und eine Blaupause für deinen eigenen Kanal erstellen kannst.
Eine professionelle Content-Strategie ist der Schlüssel zum Erfolg auf YouTube. Eine wichtige Komponente ist die Keyword-Recherche. Indem du relevante Suchbegriffe identifizierst, die von deiner Zielgruppe häufig gesucht werden, kannst du mehr potenzielle Abonnenten erreichen und deine Reichweite auf YouTube erheblich steigern.
Leider bieten Google, Ubersuggest und andere Tools nicht die richtigen Daten! Wir müssen a) die aktuell auf YouTube relevante Keywords finden und b) herausfinden, bei welchen Suchbegriffen wir mit einem kleinen Kanal konkurrenzfähig sind. Dies ist der einzige Weg, sich gegen die Millionen Konkurrenten als kleiner Kanal durchzusetzen.
Rankt dein Video, ist als Nächstes der perfekte Titel entscheidend für den Erfolg eines YouTube-Videos. Mit dem AI Coach von vidIQ kannst du sicherstellen, dass dein Titel sowohl ansprechend als auch suchmaschinenoptimiert ist. Indem du relevante Keywords im Titel verwendest und eine klare und prägnante Beschreibung deines Videos gibst, kannst du mehr Klicks und Abonnenten gewinnen.
Ich zeige dir meine AI-Strategie und meinen AI-Prompt, um meine Titel zu erstellen.
Neben dem Titel sind auch die Beschreibung und Tags deines Videos wichtig für das YouTube-SEO. Auch hier gilt es optimale Beschreibungen und Tags zu erstellen, die deine Videos für Suchmaschinen sichtbar machen und deine Chancen auf eine höhere Platzierung in den Suchergebnissen erhöhen.
Zudem entscheidet das Thumbnail, ob dein Video tatsächlich aufgerufen wird. Clickbait-Thumbnails sind ein effektives Mittel, um die Aufmerksamkeit von potenziellen Zuschauern zu erregen und die Conversions zu steigern. Mit ansprechenden und aussagekräftigen Thumbnails kannst du mehr Klicks und Abonnenten gewinnen.
Um auf YouTube erfolgreich zu sein, ist es entscheidend, die neuesten Trends frühzeitig zu erkennen. Durch die Nutzung von künstlicher Intelligenz können wir Daten analysieren und Muster erkennen, die uns helfen, relevante Themen zu identifizieren, die das Potenzial haben, viral zu werden. Indem wir uns frühzeitig auf diese Trends konzentrieren, können wir unser Publikum besser ansprechen und mehr Abonnenten gewinnen.
Insgesamt ist YouTube-SEO ein komplexes Thema, das viele verschiedene Aspekte umfasst. Aber mit den richtigen Tools und Strategien kannst du erfolgreich sein und deine Views und Abonnentenzahlen signifikant steigern.
Indem du eine professionelle Content-Strategie verfolgst, den perfekten Titel, Beschreibung und Tags verwendest und klickbare Thumbnails erstellst, kannst du das volle Potenzial deines YouTube-Kanals ausschöpfen und eine treue Fangemeinde aufbauen.
Starte jetzt deine YouTube-Reise!
Bis gleich im Kurs,
Marco

Welcome to the bestseller Powerpoint Video Course! Start creating animated videos now.
Video creation skills are becoming more and more important these days. Video content is growing fast, people prefer this format, and marketers are jumping on this trend. And while there is a lot of complex video software out there, you can actually create pretty beautiful videos with PowerPoint only!

The quality of PowerPoint videos is good enough for all kinds of informative/educational videos. These can be marketing videos for businesses, videos for online courses, for a YouTube channel or even for TikTok and Reels - Yes, you can also easily create animated vertical videos in PowerPoint as well. There are a lot of YouTube channels with millions of views which create their videos with PowerPoint only.

So if you want to use video for business purposes, you don't need fancy/complex software and long training anymore - You can use PowerPoint. And with the right techniques that I will teach you in this course, you can make beautiful videos which will definitely look like "real videos" and not PowerPoint presentations.

This course is full practice, full hands-on. We will create 3 videos together completely from scratch, and every single step will be clearly explained. By the end of it you will master PowerPoint video creation and will be able to make animated videos at will. And with more experience you will become more efficient. It's totally possible to create one video per day!
And, as a bonus, you will be able to download more than 20 ready-made PowerPoint video templates for your Video Introductions, Facebook/Instagram Ads, YouTube End Screens and more! I create these templates myself and occasionally upload new ones to the course completely for free.

Creating videos with PowerPoint is a great compromise between the quality of the video (in terms of "complexity") and the time it takes to do it. You can create hours and hours of video relatively fast compared to most specific software.

courses.title: Videos drehen und schneiden - der ultimative Anfängerkurs
courses.bio: Mit iPhone und iMovie zum fertigen Film
objectives: Videos mit dem iPhone drehen und mit iMovie schneiden. Gute Bilder und einen guten Ton machen. Mit Musik, Soundeffekten und Voice over arbeiten können. Visuell-dramaturgische Grundkenntnisse haben.

Einleitung: Wie drehe ich gute Videos mit dem Smartphone?
Mediathek und Projekte in iMovie anlegen, Material sichten und sortieren
Wie schneide ich Videoclips? Die Basics.
Wie setze ich Musik, Soundeffekte und Voice Over ein?

requirements: Ein MacBook oder einen iMac und ein iPhone. Du kannst natürlich auch mit jeder anderen Kamera drehen, wenn Du sie bedienen kannst.
courses.description:
"Mit Videos wird man viel besser gesehen." "Videos knacken den Algorithmus." und "Bewegtbild ist die Zukunft." Das sind nur drei der Aussagen, die wir von Experten immer wieder hören. Sicher ist: Der Anteil an Videos hat auf allen Plattformen zugenommen. Und wer Menschen erreichen möchte, hat mit Bewegtbild viel bessere Chancen.
In diesem Kurs geht es darum, mit einfachen, technischen Mitteln Videoclips zu drehen und zu schneiden. Ihr lernt, für welche Aufnahmen sich ein Smartphone eignet und wo dessen technische Grenzen sind. Ich nehme euch Schritt für Schritt an die Hand. Zeige euch meine Ausstattung und wie ich gute Bilder hinbekomme. Wie plane ich einen Dreh? Welche Kameraeinstellungen gibt es und welche Grundregeln muss ich bei der Bildgestaltung beachten? Wie mache ich einen guten Ton und wie bleibe ich vor der Kamera entspannt?
Nach dem Dreh kommt der Schnitt. Wir laden gemeinsam die gedrehten Clips auf euer MacBook oder euren iMac. Wir richten eine Mediathek ein, legen ein Projekt an und sichten und sortieren das Material. Ich nehme mir Zeit, euch ganz in Ruhe zu erklären, wie ihr Bilder schneidet. Dann schauen wir uns die Möglichkeiten an, die ihr mit dem Einsatz von Musik, Soundeffekten und Voice Over habt.
Und zu guter Letzt schneide ich live ein komplettes Projekt von Anfang bis Ende. Ihr schaut mir dabei über die Schulter und ich verrate euch meine Tipps und Tricks für Videos, an denen eure Zuschauer hängenbleiben.
Wenn ihr eure Inhalte und euer Know-how sichtbarer machen möchtet. Wenn ihr zuverlässig lernen möchtet, Videos zu drehen und zu schneiden. Wenn ihr ein für allemal wissen wollt, wie das alles geht - dann freue ich mich auf euch und darauf, euch zu zeigen, was ich in den letzten Jahren durch all meine Drehs und Videos gelernt habe.
target_audience: Für Video-Anfänger und alle, die Wert auf eine hochwertige Bildsprache legen und auf der Suche nach einem Workflow sind..

courses.description:
Come si organizza un'intervista? Quali vantaggi puoi ottenere intervistando gli esperti del tuo settore? Quali sono le strategie e gli strumenti più efficaci per creare interviste dal vivo e online, registrando audio, video o trasmettendole in streaming?
Grazie a questo corso diventerai "cintura nera" di interviste, che tu debba imparare ad intervistare per lavoro o lo faccia per un progetto personale.
Le interviste sono un vero e proprio hackeraggio della comunicazione: ci permettono di ottenere il massimo, con il minimo sforzo.
Ci portano benefici dal punto di vista della produzione di contenuti di valore semplicemente intervistando persone di riferimento nei loro campi, portando al tuo pubblico le competenze e le conoscenze dell'intervistato.
L'intervista è un ottimo format per i contenuti che dobbiamo creare in quanto il dialogo tra intervistatore e intervistato attira immediatamente l'attenzione dello spettatore.
Per quanto riguarda il brand marketing, le interviste ci permettono di far crescere i nostri progetti di comunicazione facendo leva sull'autorevolezza di chi intervistiamo.
Infine, dal punto di vista del networking l'intervista permette di costruire una fitta rete di relazioni, portandoti a conoscere personalmente e ad avere i contatti di influencer e personaggi noti, che ti potranno sicuramente tornare utili.
In questo corso Giulio Gaudiano e Giacomo Sisca ti condurranno per mano alla scoperta di strategie, strumenti e software che gli hanno permesso di intervistare centinaia di personaggi di riferimento nel loro settore, creando contenuti di valore per i loro progetti, a beneficio delle community che hanno creato.
target_audience: Vuoi realizzare un'intervista per lavoro o per un progetto personale?

The most effective app promotion and monetization strategies to grow your app, and make it as profitable as possible.


LATEST COURSE UPDATE FOR 2025:


Three great launch strategies for your app

*** OVER 10,000 DELIGHTED STUDENTS HAVE TAKEN THIS COURSE ***


WHAT YOU CAN ACCOMPLISH WITH THIS COURSE


I am an independent mobile app entrepreneur just like you. I created this course to help you:


Get 1,000,000+ downloads with effective mobile app store marketing
Save money by doing your own ASO (for Android and Apple App store) better than most consultants you might hire

Create a successful mobile app business
Learn the strategies I used to get 1,000,000+ downloads for my apps, make money from them, and create a successful mobile app business.


WHAT MAKES THIS APP PROMOTION COURSE SPECIAL


The course shows you how to create a real business out of your app. I realize that you may be excited about your app idea, and rush to have it built as soon as possible. But as an app entrepreneur, you need to understand what it takes to make your app a real business that's profitable and makes money.
This course teaches you about app business models, high-level business strategies, and app business planning.
This is what makes this course special! This course will make you a stronger app entrepreneur.


INSTRUCTOR BACKGROUND


My apps have 2,000,000+ cumulative downloads that I got for free in a 99% passive way. My income from apps is 99% passive as well.
My book on mobile app business has been the #1 book on this topic on Amazon for the last few years, and it is used by a few universities and high schools across the country.
My app ranked #1 for the search "business" on Android for a number of years, and many of my apps dominate their search rankings in the Apple App Store and Google Play Store.
In this app promotion course, I'll teach you the insights and secrets I learned while growing my own mobile app business. Everything I teach in this course is something I have done and tried myself.
I've been an entrepreneur for 20+ years, have coached 1,000+ entrepreneurs in person, taught 850,000+ students, impacted millions of entrepreneurs worldwide, creating 6 and 7-figure businesses in the process, and I would love to help you.


BONUSES INCLUDED

1) I care about my students.
2) I feel a responsibility to make sure that students get their money's worth from the course.


HOW THIS COURSE IS STRUCTURED


The course is structured in 3 parts. The first part goes over some of the

PART 2: mobile app marketing.
PART 3: monetization.
I also show you some of my favorite tools and outsourcing strategies that you can use for your own app development and growth.


WHY YOU SHOULD TAKE THIS APP MARKETING COURSE NOW


Focusing on marketing and monetization after your app is built and has launched is a very costly mistake. You must focus on your app marketing plan and monetization early, during business planning!
This course will shed light on many parts of your business strategy, and help you choose a successful path for your app from the beginning. That is why you should take this course before even writing the first line of code for your app.
This course will transform you, and make you a much stronger app entrepreneur quickly. Take the course today, and see for yourself.


WHAT KINDS OF APPS DO STUDENTS IN THIS COURSE USUALLY MAKE?


Game apps, puzzle apps, social apps, photo apps, dating apps, and productivity apps.


CERTIFICATE OF COMPLETION WHEN YOU FINISH THE COURSE

MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE

Invest in your future. Enroll now.

Master analytics tools to measure and improve content marketing effectiveness, making data-driven decisions that refine your strategies over time. Build and lead content teams, striking the delicate balance between creativity and consistency for sustained success.


Navigate ethical considerations in content creation, understanding disclosure, transparency, and copyright issues. Stay at the forefront of industry trends, adapting to technological advances and emerging content consumption habits to future-proof your content marketing strategies.


Join us on this transformative journey to mastering content, and unleash the full potential of your brand in the digital landscape. Elevate your marketing game with the ultimate guide to content mastery.

courses.description:
ഈ കോഴ്‌സ് വൈറ്റ്ബോർഡ് ആനിമേഷനെക്കുറിച്ചുള്ളതാണ്. നാൻ ഒരു യൗറ്റുബെർ ആണ്, അത് കൂടാതെ വർഷമായി ഓൺലൈൻ ജോബ് ചെയ്യുന്ന ഫ്രീലാൻസെർ ആണ്. ഫലപ്രദമായ  വിദ്യാഭ്യാസ വിപണന ഉപകരണമാണ് വൈറ്റ്ബോർഡ് വീഡിയോകൾ. ഇത് നിങ്ങളുടെ പ്രേക്ഷകരുടെ മനസ്സിനെ ഒരു പഠന മാനസികാവസ്ഥയിലേക്ക് മാറ്റുന്ന ഒരു ശൈലിയാണ്, പക്ഷേ ഇത് പഠനത്തെ മനോഹരമാക്കുന്നതിന് പര്യാപ്തമാണ്. നിങ്ങളുടെ ബിസിനസ്സ് നിങ്ങളുടെ  പ്രേക്ഷകരെ പരിചയപ്പെടുത്താനും  ഇത് നിങ്ങളെ സഹായിക്കും. നിങ്ങളുടെ പ്രാദേശിക അല്ലെങ്കിൽ അന്തർദ്ദേശീയക്ലയന്റുകൾക്ക് വൈറ്റ്ബോർഡ് ആനിമേഷൻ വീഡിയോകൾ വിൽക്കാനും നല്ലൊരു വരുമാനം നേടാനും നിങ്ങളെ സഹായിക്കുന്നു. ഓൺലൈൻ രംഗത്തു മുൻ പരിചയമില്ലാത്ത തുടകർക്കു വേണമെങ്കിലും ഈ കോഴ്സ് അറ്റൻഡ് ചെയ്യാവുന്നതാണ്.


ഈ കോഴ്സിലൂടെ നിങ്ങൾക്കെന്തൊക്കെ പഠിക്കാം:

互联网时代，经济发展迅速，生活节奏加快，“碎片化”成了关键词。碎片化学习、碎片化娱乐、碎片化时间处理工作……正是在这样的背景下，短视频兴起，抖音、微信视频号等平台野蛮生长。“内容为王”的短视频赛道，究竟怎样的视频才能成为爆款？究竟如何利用算法建造属于自己的流量池？本次课程，吕白老师将用丰富的从业经验及高度行业视角，为你讲解爆款短视频的底层逻辑！

courses.description:
このコースでは、Filmora14（フィモーラ）を活用して、爆速でオンラインコース制作するための動画編集を学ぶコースです。
知識がゼロ方でも受講できるように、インストール方法から動画の基礎知識、動画編集の流れ、画面録画の方法、爆速で編集するためのテクニック、最新AI機能など、実践で使えるスキルを身につけることができます。


■ このコースで得られる3つの成果
簡単操作で高品質な画面収録と編集が完全マスターできる
複雑な操作は不要！直感的な操作でプロ並みの編集が可能に
AI機能で自動字幕作成やノイズ除去もワンクリックで実現


本業の知識や経験を活かした副収入の道が開ける
会社員の専門知識やスキルを活かしたオンラインコースが作成可能
時間や場所に縛られない自動収入の仕組みを構築できる


受講生を引きつける魅力的な教材作成スキルが身につく
モザイクやズームイン・アウト、グリーンバック合成などのスキルを身につけられる
画面描画ツールを活用して視覚的に理解しやすいコンテンツを作成


■ 学習範囲
Filmora（フィモーラ）の購入方法
データ管理
動画編集の基礎知識
Filmora（フィモーラ）を使った画面収録の方法
基本的な動画編集の流れ

動画の質を向上させるための編集方法
Filmora（フィモーラ）でのデータ保存場所
Filmora（フィモーラ）のAI機能について




■ コース内容ハイライト
初心者に特化した実践型カリキュラム：基本操作から効率的な編集テクニック、最新AI機能まで段階的に学べる
厳選された必要機能のみを学習：オンラインコース制作に必要な操作だけを集中的に解説
プロのテクニック伝授：プロの映像クリエイターが使っているテクニックを教えます
target_audience: オンラインコースを作りたいけれど、「編集スキルがなくて不安」という方

手元にあるアーカイブ動画を、効率よくオンライン講座に変えて収益化を考えている方
複雑な操作や高額なソフトは避けて、きちんとした動画コースを作りたい方

社員研修や教育コンテンツを、自社で手軽に作りたいと考えている人材育成・教育担当者の方

courses.title: Creating SVG for Whiteboard Videos
courses.bio: Learn how to create svg files for whiteboard videos the right way.
objectives: Create professional svg files for whiteboard videos
Start using the pen tool with confidence
Master a new skill
Learn something new to offer as a service

Right Way and Wrong Way to Create SVG Fi: Creating SVG Files The Wrong Way
Creating SVG Files the Right Way
Tools That Make Bad SVG's: Brush Tool Examples, Why It Don't Work
Best Tools to Create Your SVG Files: Best Tools for Line Drawing SVG Files
Pen Tool Tutorial: How to Use The Pen Tool for Beginners
Using The Bezier Tool in Inkscape
How to Use The Pen and Pencil Tools in Inkscape
Ideas for Drawing Your Own Images: Getting Ideas for Hand Drawn Images

requirements: Have access to Adobe Illustrator or Similar software such as Inkscape
courses.description:
If you have been struggling to create your svg image files without those double lines then you have come to the right place to learn a better way of creating them. You have probably been taught how to convert a .png file to .svg to use with your whiteboard videos, but those crazy double lines keeping showing up. Converting those .png file to .svg's just don't seem to work that well but I am going to help you change that. Here is what you will learn to do in this course.
Create svg files with the real line by line drawing effect.
Never have the double lines in your svg files.
Learn how to set your brush mode to make it happen.
Learn the best tools for clean line drawing effects.
I'll show you examples of what not to do.
Show you everything to do the right way.
How to use the pen tool
All you will need is access to Adobe Illustrator or any other software such as Inkscape, or any other that is like Illustrator. Some of these alternatives are free to download.
The videos in this course has been structured in order of importance to help you get the most out of it. This course is about an hour long and gets straight to the point with all of the fluff left out so you can focus on the topics at hand.
Video marketing is huge and isn't going anywhere so jump on board and learn how to create your very own svg images the right way for yourself, or to offer this new talent as a service to others. If you have any question along the way just send me a message and I will respond as quickly as possible to help you.
Get in now while the price is right because there are time I will add new content as new technology evolves and once you are in, you never pay another cent no matter how large this course gets.
target_audience: This course is for anyone who wants to learn to create their own svg files for whiteboard videos, to use in their marketing efforts. Students will also benefit by learning a new skill to offer as a service. This course is not for you if you are looking for an in-depth graphic design course.

courses.title: Dan Roam's Professional Hand-Drawn Whiteboard Video Course
courses.bio: Learn to use PowerPoint & Camtasia to create professional hand-drawn whiteboard videos for marketing, sales, & training.
objectives: Make money by creating simple hand-drawn videos with PowerPoint and Camtasia.

Create hand-drawn videos to boost sales,: Introduction: Why hand-drawn videos are so powerful for online sales & education
The Video Revolution: Hand-drawn videos are powerful -- and easy to create.
Hand-drawn videos are easy to make. Here's a sample.
Who cares about hand-drawn videos? (And another sample.)
The tools we'll need: PowerPoint & Camtasia
The video creation process: from Idea to Upload
How to draw in PowerPoint (the secret revealed!)
How to make a complete video in 3 minutes
Quick preview of the entire production process
What do you think about videos?
Video quick-tools: Using PowerPoint and: Introduction: The amazing video combination of PowerPoint & Camtasia
The two tools we need: PowerPoint & Camtasia
An sample advanced video -- made with just these tools!
Getting started in the video process: prepare slides, record, edit
Top-tips for turning PowerPoint into an animation platform
Top-tips for using Camtasia as a recording and editing platform
Exporting .AVI files as a time-saver while working in Camtasia
Two more tricks: screen-shots and image cropping
Fast & effective storyboarding: the key: Introduction: Why story matters -- and how to capture yours.
Story matters most: a 60-second example clip
The storyboard for that example clip -- made in PowerPoint
Process check-in: where we are in the sequence
The best stories start with pen & paper -- and Postit notes
We're screenwriters now -- and we need the "3-Act Structure"
The Pixar Pitch: a story that will never let us down
Vivid Thinking: how to turn words into pictures
How to write a sample script -- and turn it into a sketched storyboard
Introduction: The power of pre-visualization. (Thanks, George Lucas!)
Process check-in: shifting from writing and sketching to animating.
Character, action, outcome: let's create a viral marketing video.
4 storylines to choose from: We pick the "Pitch."
Let's turn our script into a classic "Pitch" structure.
We turn our "Pitch" into a full storyboard.
How to create a rough video from our storyboard.
Sketching in our first characters: the animation begins!
Take lots of screen-shots. (So you don't have to draw twice.)
Use PowerPoint's animation tools to pre-visualize your clip.
Cut-&-Paste as you go. (This saves time and keeps things aligned.)
Keep recording: you will fix errors while editing later on.
Export complex animation sequences as .AVI files. (This keeps clips manageable.)
How to make amazing animations with simp: Introduction: Amazing animations from simple shapes and movement.
The Vaulting Video: an example of the power of simple animation.
Our video project so far: update and review.
The 2 types of animation: Creation & Motion
The 3 kinds of motion: Position, Orientation, and Scale.
Putting the 3 kinds of motion together.
How to create advanced animations in Pow: Introduction: How to push PowerPoint and Camtasia beyond to standard.
A sample marketing video -- created entirely with PowerPoint tools.
How I created the sample; a look "under the hood" of PowerPoint.
How to use the "Wheel" to make a picture look hand-drawn.
Adding the exit and fade-out effects.
Getting started on our complex animation using the tools we've just practiced.
How to create simple "Visual Assets" that can be used over and over again.
Step-by-step, let's animate our video introduction.
How to layer multiple animations in a single slide.
Wrap-up of our animation so far.
Introduction: Camtasia is a powerful editing platform for hand-drawn videos.
The best part of film-making is editing. (Thanks Steven Spielberg!)
Why we edit: save time, add continuity, & increase punch.
Video editing software options. (You have choices other than Camtasia.)
Editing effects we'll use: Cuts, Pan-&-Zoom, Change Speed.
How to edit: Capturing a video clip from the screen.
How to edit: Importing the video into Camtasia.
How to edit: Cutting the video clip.
Removing unwanted audio from the video clip.
Making final cuts in our video clip.
Gluing all the pieces back together. (Produce as .AVI)
A final review of our edited video.
Introduction: Putting on the final polish in Camtasia.
The polish: adding a voice-over, layering in music, and fine-tuning the details.
Where to find great FREE and LEGAL music online.
How to layer in your voice-over narration.
How to add in your music selections.
How to save and export your final, beautiful video.
Posting & Promoting our video -- so that: Introduction: The final steps to getting your video out to the world.
A simple idea: getting people to watch our video is easy!
Where we've been: A review of the entire video production process.
Final checks: Format, Size, Volume, and the Cover Shot.
Uploading your video to YouTube and Slideshare.
Wrapping up the package: Title, Key-Words, Description, Cover Shot.
Promotion basics: Twitter, FaceBook, Blog, and Email.
Promotion via a blog: Linking to the video services.
Check your numbers: Views, Uploads, Links, and Google Analytics.
We're done! Time to get rich and famous: You're ready for video fame and glory! Thank you!

requirements: You should have basic PowerPoint skills. You will also need a screen-recording application like Camtasia, but don't install it yet! We'll cover that in lecture 6.
courses.description:

How to create a script.
How to visualize your ideas in PowerPoint.
How to quickly animate, record, and narrate your whiteboard videos.
How to edit, polish, and add the right music quickly.
How to promote your video online for great exposure.
And much, much more.
Your hand drawn video will look and sound so professional and compelling that you will be able to sell more of your products and services than you ever thought possible.
In fact, your whiteboard videos will stand out so much that, if you want to, you could sell your hand drawn whiteboard videos as a service to others.

courses.title: Be A Video Production & Video Marketing Master!
courses.bio: Video Production and Video Marketing wrapped up in one course.
objectives: You will understand how video marketing can fulfil certain objectives for you or your business - profits, income, exposure, recognition, critical praise and new opportunities.
You will learn how to effectively structure the pre-production process so your video production shoot is efficient and professional.
You will gain an understanding of professional video production equipment, and the software and hardware required to undertake production and marketing projects.
You will learn how to shoot and edit a professional video, including how to achieve the best audio, lighting, composition and content for your production.
As well as simple video editing, you will also learn advanced video editing techniques and how to create animated motion-graphic elements to take your video productions to the next level.
You will be given a thorough grounding in the world of online video marketing, delving in to the various platforms online at your disposal as well as an in-depth tour of YouTube and its capabilities.
Finally, you will understand how to measure the success of your video across a number of metrics, tracking ROI and tailoring future productions for maximum results.

Welcome to the course: Why market your business through video?
Shooting Your Video: Eliciting good responses from non-professional subjects
Editing Your Video Production: Editing your video in Premiere Pro
Creating animated motion-graphics in After Effects

requirements: Computer
Adobe Premiere Pro is recommended but any editor (free) can be used
courses.description:
Welcome to the Video For Business course!
Don't be put off by the inclusion of the word business - it just means that this is a video production and video marketing course designed to help you make money with the skills and expertise that you'll learn. Yes, that might be through effectively marketing your business, but it can also mean this course sets you on a new career path.
Video for Business is not a niche course, instead it covers the day to day requirements of a professional video producer and online marketer. You'll learn about the online video landscape, the details of pre-production, how to shoot and edit professional video, the methods available to get your videos seen, ranked, clicked on and shared and finally, how to measure your results and your successes.
The course is structured in a way to allow complete beginners to start right at the beginning and learn the entire professional pathway, while more experienced students can pick and choose a variety of chapters and lectures to suit their current needs.
I can only reiterate again that this is a full, actionable course. Once complete, you should be able to apply it to your own projects without the need for further guidance. Furthermore, as the video production and marketing profession evolves, so to will this course, with frequent updates and additions to keep you on the right track.

courses.title: 【TikTok広告】未経験者〜初心者向け、TikTok広告完全ガイド / 2025年最新版
courses.bio: ゼロからTikTok広告を学習し広告制作から運用までを完全に理解するコース。運用未経験の方が「運用できるようになりました」と言って申し分ないまでに能力値を引き上げる内容です。
objectives: デジタル広告における動画広告の役割と、その中でもTikTok広告のメリデメについて理解できる。ゆえにTikTok広告の適切な使い方に関する勘所が身に付く
TikTok広告のキャンペーン構造について理解し、適切な設定ができるようになる
TikTok広告のクリエイティブ制作について大まかな制作の工程を理解し、フォーマットを使った台本制作ができるようになる
TikTok広告の日々の運用調整の考え方について大まかに理解し、最低限必要な運用が可能となる

コース概要と基礎知識: コース概要紹介と講師紹介
動画広告の種類とそれぞれの特徴
アプローチできるマーケティング目標
広告掲載に向けてのセットアップ: TikTok広告アカウントの作成
TikTok広告の配信設定: キャンペーン設定(1)_広告アカウントの構造
キャンペーン設定(2)_各種設定について
動画クリエイティブの制作: クリエイティブ作成のポイント
クリエイティブテンプレート
動画クリエイティブの作成
計測環境の整備と運用調整: 計測環境の整備　トラッキングの基礎
よくあるトラブルと解決法

requirements: PCとネット環境が整っていることが前提
TikTok広告アカウントが作れることが前提（垢BANなどを食らっていない）
TikTok広告未経験者〜初心者層が前提（ここでいう初心者というのは、広告アカウントの構造の理解が及んでいない、なんとなく運用してしまっている人を指す）
courses.description:
縦長動画広告は近年マーケッターにとって、最も重要な広告配信手法となっています。
このコースは、縦長動画広告の中でも特に、TikTok広告を扱います。




これから広告代理店への就職に関して興味のある方や、デジタルマーケティングの知識を深めたいと考えている方にとっては、 このコースがお役に立てると考えています。




2024年現在、さまざまな広告メニューが市場に乱立し中でも爆発的にそのシェアを広げているのが縦長動画広告です。
TikTokを筆頭に、縦型のショート動画（短尺動画）を視聴するユーザーは急速に増加しており、世界で20億人以上が視聴するコンテンツにまで成長しています。
幅広い世代のユーザーに親しまれるフォーマットとして普及していること、各SNSにおいてショート動画がメインのコンテンツフォーマットになりつつあることから縦型動画広告の活用は「マストで取り組むべき」施策になっています。




この講座はそのような市場感の中で、これからTikTok広告に挑戦していきたい方のために制作しました。




TikTok広告は、極めてパワフルな広告配信手法です。
このコースでは、TikTok広告に期待できるマーケティング成果 / 運用の設定方法や理論 / クリエイティブの制作 / 日々の調整を網羅し、短時間でTikTok広告運用者として成立できる内容にしています。


実戦形式で、実際の管理画面を見ながら解説していますので書籍など他のツールと比べても圧倒的に分かりやすく学習することができます。








本コースは全く知識がない状態からTikTok広告のプラットフォームを自由に使いこなし、広告運用をしていける状態を目指していくコースです。
0からわかりやすく解説いたしますので、今まで運用経験がほとんどないという方にも理解いただける内容となっているかと思います。


このコース終了時には、TikTok広告の初心者を脱して、上級者としての知識を得ることができます。
一人で試行錯誤することなく最短での上級者への道をご案内いたします。
target_audience: 広告代理店勤務でTikTok広告をこれから始める人
事業会社のマーケティングチームにてこれからデジタル広告やTikTok広告に挑戦する人

courses.bio: 視聴者を魅了する音質向上術！動画クリエイターのための音質マスターガイド。デジタルオーディオの基礎知識、マイクの選び方からDaVinci Resolve Fairlight での編集ノウハウまで網羅。

DaVinci Resolveの基本的な操作知識はあるとスムーズに学べますが、必須ではありません。
録音や編集に使用する機材やソフトウェアは特に指定はありませんが、具体的な機材の選び方や使用法を学ぶ際に参考として自身の機材を持っていると理解が深まります。

Youtube marketing adalah cara kita untuk mempunyai penghasilan baik dari produk/ jasa yang kita jual lewat platform youtube (youtube ads), kemudian berlanjut ke website atau medsos kita agar terjadi konversi ataupun kita sebagai youtuber. Kelas ini adalah kelas kombinasi informasi yang mendukung Anda untuk segera praktek dan berpenghasilan lewat youtube juga kelas praktek yang membuat Anda langsung pegang gadget dan atau device untuk langsung praktek sesuai dengan instruksi-instruksinya.


Mengingat kebiasaan masyarakat Indonesia sekarang lebih menyenangi menonton video daripada membaca (dan sesuai juga dengan riset dari We Are Social yang mana youtube menduduki peringkat atas setelah Google untuk website yang paling sering dikunjungi karena naturenya), platform youtube akan sangat tepat untuk Anda yang sedang ingin mempromosikan produk/ jasa dengan cara yang menarik, yang mengundang perhatian audience dengan video yang menarik. Juga, cara yang efektif dan efisien untuk memberikan informasi terupdate, terkini atau informasi yang berguna bagi yang membutuhkan secara audio visual.


Anda tidak perlu khawatir kalau Anda belum berpengalaman di dunia peryoutuban. Justru materi ini akan mengupas dari hal-hal mendasar agar Anda dapat dengan mudah mengikutinya karena semua materi ini disampaikan secara sederhana dan mendukung langkah-langkah agar Anda dapat memahaminya dengan baik dan segera langsung dipraktekkan supaya secepatnya dapat cuan.


Jadi, mulailah dari sekarang untuk membuka video pertama, kemudian fokus, tetapkan tujuan, praktekkan dan lihat hasilnya. Tapi ingat, semua berproses, tidak ada yang instan. Dan yang bisa menjamin jualan Anda di youtube laku keras atau seberapa tenarnya Anda menjadi Youtuber adalah hasil kerja keras Anda sendiri, apakah Anda patuh mengikuti langkah-langkah di materi ini, apakah Anda bersungguh-sungguh dalam melaksanakan apa yang dicita-citakan, itu semua kembali kepada Anda.

courses.description:
Most video animation software comes with high costs and steep learning curves. And though there are many online animation tools trying to solve this problem, they require an internet connection and recurring payments.
If you own a Mac, however, Keynote is easy to use and free.
You might know Keynote as a presentation tool. But in reality, it's so much more — it comes with 30+ animation effects, more than 700 customizable shapes, and many other useful features for making videos.
In this course, you’ll discover the settings and techniques you need to unlock Keynote's potential as a robust animation tool. By the end, you'll be able to produce custom animated videos quickly and easily.


What do I get with this course?
90+ minutes of on-demand training videos
4 follow-along exercises with project files
5 popular royalty-free songs from Music for Makers
Custom illustrated character made and editable in Keynote
17 blank social media templates set to best practice dimension ratios


How can I apply what I learn in this course?
Using techniques taught in this course, you'll be able to use Keynote to make:
Explainer videos
Promotional videos for social media
Animated intros and transitions for videos
Kinetic typography animations
Overlay motion graphics (e.g., lower thirds)
... and more!


What if I'm not an artist or technically inclined?
The great thing about Keynote is that it makes animation accessible to everyone. Regardless of your experience or skill level, you'll be able to create animated videos you're proud of after taking this course.

Anyone wanting to make animated videos — no experience necessary!

本コースでは自分で開発したアプリの集客手段をたくさん知ることができます。
特にSNSが苦手な方にとって、人気者にならなくても集客できて無料で試すことができる方法を紹介していきます。
「アプリを作ったけど、ユーザーが増えない」といったお悩みを持っている方のコースになっております。

1. Google検索（SEO)
集客の王道である検索系集客について、全体像と戦略をお伝えします。


2. 文章系SNS
文章だけで集客できるSNSについて解説していきます。

今やテレビ並みの集客力になったYoutubeです。大変ですが、やはり欠かすことはできませんので、安定的に集客する方法を解説します。

僕たちのような個人開発者は0から1を作るのが一番大変です。そこで初期ブーストが作りやすいショートムービーを活用する方法を解説します。


5. プレスリリース
知名度がなくてもメディアの力を借りて知ってもらうことができるプレスリリースの使い方を解説します。（無料でできる方法）


6. フォーラム
SNSのように人気取りにならなくても、集客できるフォーラムの活用方法を解説していきます。


7. 音声配信
アメリカではYouTube並の市場になっている音声配信を解説します。


8. アプリタイプ別戦略提案
最後に、あなたのアプリタイプ別に最適な集客方法の組み合わせを提案します。


当コースが向いていない人
当コースは集客手段をたくさん知ってもらい、貴方自身に戦略を考えていただくコースになっております。
1つの集客手段を深堀りしたい方や、具体的な方法を1から10まで必要な方は別コースをご検討ください。

courses.description:
この教材では、オンラインスクール構築の入門レベルをクリアし、実際にオンラインスクールのための動画教材作成に着手し始めるところまですすむ講座です。


オンラインスクールを作ろうと決めたし、必要な道具もわかった、あとは、作り始めるだけ、という方へのナビゲーションを提供します。
1か月程度で、顧客を集める準備しながら、まず最初の教材をつくり始めたい方にむいてます。


具体的な道具の使い方を知りたいよ、オンラインスクールってそもそも何という方は、この講座ではなく、まず入門講座からご利用ください。


講義を聴き、ワークをしていただきながら、すすめます。
講義内容をワークしながらすすめると、１ヵ月程度で、教材の１本目をつくっている状態までゆきます。


【こんな方が対象です】
コーチやコンサルタントとして、いつも顧客から問われる内容を教材として作っておいて、自分の時間を、より困った難易度の高い問題解決につかいたい方
資格取得を目指す受験者に対して、受験のノウハウや自分の専門知識を伝えるオリジナルスクールをつくりたい方
専門家を対象とした高度な技術やノウハウを伝える講座をつくりたい、専門家育成の先生（例 日本語教育の先生のためのスキルアップ講座を開催している先生）
今おこなっている対面型や集合型のリアルの教室をビデオ配信型のオンラインスクールにも移行していきたい先生方（例　英語教室の先生など）
のちのち資格や検定に育てたいと考えるノウハウを、録画型の動画教材で顧客に販売してゆくための、教材の作り方として必要な枠組みを知りたい経営者
講師業の先生


【講座のゴール】
受講後１ヵ月目には、動画教材をつくり始めている。


【この講座で学ぶこと】
オンラインスクール構築のために必要な５つの要素
オンラインスクールで収益を生んでゆくための仕組みづくり
商品となる動画教材をつくりながら集客する方法
オンラインスクールへの集客手法
動画教材を伝わる内容にするためのストーリーテリングの方法
シードローンチの方法


【本講座の内容をリアルセミナーで受講された方の声】
（合法的な公務員副業を支えるコーチ）
最初は、ツールや設備を揃えたりすることからして、回収の見込みがないなか投資を怖がっていました。しかし、現状を変えるためにやるべきことがみえ、決断できました。シードローンチをおしえてもらって実行し、セミナーへの参加を有料でしてくださる方もでて早速回収できました。来週セミナー開催します！　そしてこのセミナーを動画教材としてローンチした後も、揃える動画教材の構想もまとまりました。


（英語教室の先生）
動画を、自分のコンテンツのなかで、どう収益ビジネスにとりいれてゆくのか、具体的にイメージしたくて参加しました。講義のなかで、動画づくりだけでなく、集客やマーケティングのこともわかり、ツールの情報もいただいたので、始める前と、おわったあとでは、自分の成長がぜんぜんちがうとおもっています。自分らしく何ができるか、わかりました。


（日本語教師養成）
協会ビジネスをたちあげたいという構想があり、そのために何が必要かを学びたくて参加しました。チームで進めるにはどうするかどうか迷っていましたが、いまはまず自分が主導で始めることを決意し、１年前からばくぜんと考えていた開業届けを、学んでいる期間に出せました！　あとは教わったことを、手足を動かして、日々実践し、収入に結び付けるのみです。
