courses.description:
Are you ready to grow a youtube channel make money and build a business using Youtube?
Well than this course is for you. I have reviewed everything out on the market and combined it to help fast track to helping you become a pro when promoting yourself with youtube.
It doesn't matter if you are brand new or you have been using youtube for quite some time. Learn the basics and pick up some amazing hacks to grow your channel faster.
Youtube is a platform where people watch and come back and watch content. It's time they find you and your channel and like you, trust you, and you become their authority when it comes to what content you produce.
These tactics have helped multiple 7 figure businesses and people who started with a dream. Well I have proven testimonials that by following these course details you too can get more views and subscribers and build your brand.
The youtube traffic secrets teaches you the steps from how to get started on youtube to what videos you should create, how to film them, edit them, and how to rank them.
It's a simple to follow course where as you watch along you can start producing content. I believe the fist step is getting started. This is why I have taken all the headache out of trying to figure this out on your own.
Finally just by watching this course you too can have a successful youtube channel.
This course will not only make you a pro Youtuber you can also watch this course and start consulting others teaching them these same secrets to earn you even more money.
What will you be able to do after you take this course:
Get started on youtube
Quickly get your channel monetized
Get your 1st 100 subscribers fast
Get views quickly
Increase your videos watch time
Create content without breaking the bank
Rank your videos to #1
Start consulting others
Learn how to improve your videos, channel, and all
How to track your numbers to get more subs and watch time
How to generate more money with Youtube once your monetized
How to become a authority, expert that people trust, like, and find credible.
How to earn 6-7 figures using Youtube
How to build a brand and make more sales with Youtube.


Grow Your YouTube Channel, Get More Views, Subs and Increase Watch Time, and Earn More Money!
It doesn't matter where you are starting or how amazing you are. I will guarantee you will learn some valuable information to improve your success with youtube.
Whether you want to make a channel to promote your business, teach a skill, or just share your life story through vlogs, by understanding what makes a YouTube channel successful, you can replicate and get more views, more subscribers, and make money on your own. This course shows you exactly how to do it.
Contents and Overview
This course is aimed at teaching new YouTubers what it takes to create great videos and make money from them. Most lessons are hands-on tutorials where we walk you through not only what it takes to succeed, but where we show you exactly how to do it.
You'll start with the basics - the best practices for all YouTubers. These tips will get you in the mindset of a YouTuber.
You'll learn how to use the YouTube platform. You’ll sign up for an account, get verified as a YouTube partner, and know how to navigate the Creator Studio.
You’ll then learn how to make great videos with professional and budget equipment. You’ll learn how to shoot a great video with any camera, how to record great audio, how to light videos with a cheap DIY setup, and how to edit videos efficiently.
After learning how to create amazing videos, you’ll learn how to post them to your YouTube channel with great titles, descriptions, and tags that are SEO friendly and will get you the most views. You’ll even learn how to design and upload a custom thumbnail that increases your views. You’ll learn other optimization strategies to get the most views and subscribers.
By learning how to use analytics, you’ll know which videos work and which videos don’t. This will help you rapidly grow your YouTube channel with smart video creation - only making videos that you know will work.
Lastly, you’ll learn how to make money with YouTube. There are a number of ways that you will learn how to make money with your YouTube videos including with ads, YouTube Red, digital and physical products, sponsorship, and crowdfunding.
By the end of this course, you will have a YouTube channel that you are proud of. You’ll be making high quality videos that your audience loves. You’ll be getting more and more subscribers to increase your brand strength. And you’ll be making money from your YouTube channel.
About the instructors:
Scott White:  Scott White is the founder of White Inc. He focuses on building brands and business to surpass the 7 to 8 figure thresholds by utilizing ways to generate more revenue and building a culture that thrives in any organization. When you are ready to increase sales, grow your brand and start building a business with a amazing culture that runs like a machine then he's your guy. He has helped multiple brands utilize youtube in their process of growing their brand.


With our 30-day 100% money back guarantee, there is nothing holding you back from jumping in right now and trying the course out.
Go ahead and click the enroll button, and I'll see you in lesson 1!
Best,
Scott

多くの方がYouTubeに参入しますがそのほとんどが諦めてしまいます。なぜだか分かりますか？それは「結果が出ないから」です。結果とは各々の目的によって色々あります。再生回数、チャンネル登録数、商品販売数、口座開設数、お問い合わせ件数など。

Definição de público alvo, escolha de temas relevantes, elaboração de roteiro, o áudio ideal, gravações externas e internas, edição por aplicativos de celular
Alcançar uma maior audiência com gravação de vídeos e virar referência em determinados assuntos, fortalecendo uma imagem de respeito entre a audiência

There's no doubting that video is one of the most powerful tools available for marketing your business today. Especially when it comes to social media management.
But what if you don't have a production budget? Or you don't have video experience? That's where your own smartphone comes in.
Smartphone filming is an affordable, easy-to-use option that can help you create high-quality videos in the palm of your hand and immediately boost your marketing strategy.

This course gives you the confidence to film yourself and showcase your business, or that of your clients, online. Over the course of 12 easy-to-understand video lessons, you'll learn how to create engaging and consistent social media by planning, producing and publishing video using just your phone. Elevate your engagement with video without the cost of a videographer and make video content your number one marketing strategy in 2023.

Social media managers who want to show their clients how comfortable they are with video.
Professional marketers and small marketing teams who don't have the budget for video.

Sole traders and start up entrepreneurs who want to feel confident with their social media marketing.
Course students say it reinvigorated their love of social media: "It's made all the difference to how I put together social media videos. It's always those little nuggets of insightful knowledge you learn that really do make my job easier."
The greatest camera you have is the one you have on you. Develop yourself from filming fear to confidence on camera.
Including:
Equipment and app recommendations.
Top presenting tips.
Ideas to fill a year's worth of content.
How to subtitle and publish videos.
Taught by a BBC and ITV trained camera woman and broadcast journalist who launched her own media production business with just an iPhone.  In this video marketing course, you'll learn how to make engaging video content using just your smartphone. You'll be able to produce videos that are creative and persuasive, and that will help you to stand out on social media against your competitors.
We cover all the basics of smartphone videography, including composition, lighting, and basic editing. You'll also learn how to use different apps and software to enhance your videos. By the end of the course, you'll be an expert at creating stellar social media video content.
So why should you take our course?
First, because video is one of the most powerful tools you can use to reach your audience on social media. People are more likely to watch a video than read a long block of text, so if you want to get your message across, video is the way to go.
Second, because our course is designed specifically for people who want to use video to market their business or brand on social media. We'll show you how to make videos that are creative and eye-catching, and that will grab attention and get results.
Third, because we're experts in social media marketing. We know what works on social media, and we can teach you how to create videos that will help you achieve your goals.
So if you're interested in learning how to make great video content for social media, sign up for our Smartphone Video Masterclass today.

courses.bio: YouTube SEO - Video SEO: So wird Ihr Video zur Nummer eins bei YouTube, Google & Co
objectives: Bringen Sie Ihre Videos auf Seite 1 bei YouTube
Bringen Sie Ihre Videos auf Seite 1 bei Google
Und in der Google Video Suche
requirements: Voraussetzung sind ein Google Konto und ein Video, dass es zu optimieren gilt!
courses.description:
Video Optimierung für YouTube und Google
So erzielen mit Ihren Videos Top10 Platzierungen und gewinnen massenweise neue Besucher und Kunden...
Das YouTube, eine 100% Google Tochter, aktuell die zweitstärkste Suchmaschine der Welt ist brauche ich ihnen sicherlich nicht zu sagen. Ebensowenig wie, dass tausende Minuten Videomaterial pro Tag von deutschen Nutzern konsumiert werden, die hauptsächlich, wenn von den Spaßsuchenden abgesehen wird, auf der Suche nach nützlichen Erklärungen, Anleitungen und Wissen sind.
Und genau dies ist die Chance für Sie als Unternehmer(in) Sich und Ihre Dienstleistungen und Produkte an prominenter Stelle zu vermarkten.
Was ist einfacher als einem potentiellen Kunden, der nach einer Lösung für sein Problem ist, diese Lösung mit eigenen Anwendungen oder Angeboten zu demonstrieren?
In diesem Kurs werden Sie deshalb lernen, wie Sie sich sowohl bei YouTube als auch in der Videosuche von Google und - ich betone und - in der organischen Suche von google mit Ihren Videos präsentieren und damit fast zwangsweise neue Kunden gewinne werden.
Der Kurs ist in zwei, eigentlich in drei Teile untergliedert:
1.) Werden Sie Lernen wie Ihre Videos auf die erste Seite von Google und YouTube gelangt. Dafür Lernen Sie wie sie dieses optimal "Onpage" und "Offage" Optimieren.
2.) Werde ich Ihnen zeigen, wie Sie anständig Traffic bzw. Views über Google Adwords (YouTube Adwords) erhalten.
Beide, ich betone beide Methoden sind wichtig und notwendig wenn Sie mit YouTube und Videomarketing durchstarten wollen.
Lassen Sie sich also in einfachen Worten und immer, wie sie es von mir gewohnt sind, mit praktischen Beispielen anleiten Ihre Videos prominent bei Google und YouTube zu präsentieren.
target_audience: Alle Unternehmer die mehr Reichweite und Besucher mit Ihren Videos erzielen möchten

courses.description:
You are going to learn how to Build on-Device AI Applications with AI. On-device AI applications represent a significant evolution in the way artificial intelligence is deployed and utilized, allowing for real-time data processing and decision-making directly on a user's device, without relying on cloud services. This advancement leverages the increasing computational power of smartphones, tablets, and other edge devices, creating a powerful blend of speed, privacy, and functionality that benefits both users and developers.
On-device AI applications are not dependent on an internet connection, making them ideal for users in remote locations or areas with poor connectivity. This capability expands the reach of AI-powered services, ensuring they remain functional and accessible regardless of network conditions. For instance, a language translation app using on-device AI can still work while a user is traveling abroad without internet access. n-device AI offers faster processing times due to reduced latency. By eliminating the need for constant communication with cloud servers, applications can deliver instantaneous responses. This is crucial for time-sensitive tasks like augmented reality, language translation, and real-time video processing. Users experience smoother interactions, which improves overall application usability and engagement.
on-device AI is transforming the landscape of mobile applications, offering enhanced privacy, real-time performance, and offline functionality. However, it also presents new challenges in terms of optimization and energy management, pushing developers to innovate further to harness its full potential.
target_audience: Data scientists and AI Developers

courses.description:
YouTube channels are a great way to build an audience and get lots of revenue. Some of the bigger channels get tens of thousands of dollars every month just from making simple videos! However, getting your name out there isn't as easy as you think. YouTube is a very competitive space, and only the very best make it to the top. With this course, you will be able to produce videos that stand out from the crowd, grow your name, and maybe even grow a channel with millions of view and hundreds of thousands of subscribers on record. But, how do you do this? Making a YouTube channel and producing quality content is harder than you think. With this course, I will teach you all of the material and techniques you need to not only create a channel and make high quality content, but also using some easy techniques to improve your ranking in the search results, and beat out the competition. Not only that, but all of the programs used are FREE! In this course, we will cover everything, from being an absolute beginner to having a fully working YouTube channel with edited, high-quality videos. In this course, we will teach you:
How to create a google account from the very beginning, and how to create "Brand Accounts" to use on YouTube.
Explaining the YouTube interface, including all of the different widgets and sections on the front page of your YouTube channel, and also all of the different sections and settings you can change in the Creator Studio and YouTube settings.
How to prepare and setup your channel to get it ready for making videos and gaining views & subscribers, such as making high-quality profile pictures and channel art using GIMP (Gnu Image Manipulation Program) Adding featured channels, making different playlists, and much more.
How to record high-quality videos using the best free screen-casting software (Open Broadcast Software) and explaining all of the different settings in OBS to make sure that your screen-casting program is specifically aimed and geared towards your PC/Laptop to get the best HD video possible.
Learn how to create an engaging and eye-catching YouTube channel trailer using HitFilm 4 Express. I will teach you all of the different features to include in the trailer (such as text, music, and footage from your channel) and the best way to create your channel trailer to make sure anyone who watches your YouTube channel trailer will also subscribe to your channel.
I am going to be teaching you how to edit your raw recorded footage from scratch (Also using HitFilm 4 Express) to create entertaining videos. I will start from the very basics, including explaining what is in each tab and how to use HitFilm 4 Express in general, to creating the best videos you can possibly create using HitFilm 4 Express.
You will learn how to create a custom YouTube video thumbnail (Using GIMP 4) and upload it to YouTube. I will explain what people are looking for in a good thumbnail and how to create nice thumbnails to make sure your video will stand out from the rest of the competition.
I will teach you how to Finish your Video, and upload it to YouTube, making sure you know how to add all of the features and necessary content to make your video stand out from the rest.
Finally, I will teach you a couple of secret tricks and tips to make sure your video ranks high in the YouTube Search results using SEO, and making sure that your channel gets lots of views & subscribers quickly. I will also teach you some techniques to make lots of people look at your channel, getting you lots of views and subscribers fast.

courses.title: Como hacer ventas con llamada en frío (cold calling)
courses.bio: Telemarketing, televenta o ventas por teléfono es una forma muy utilizada para vender, pero pocos tienen un gran sistema
objectives: Sabrás como iniciar una conversación desde cold calling (llamada en frío).
Aprenderás la manera de seguir con una conversación descubriendo cuales son los puntos claves antes de disparar sin sentido cierres de venta
Aprenderás a identificar las diferencias con tus competidores y usarlas con la información que te haya dado el posible cliente
Aprenderás a como cerrar ventas, como tratar objeciones y como conseguir aumentar tus ventas de forma constante
Aprenderás a evitar los bajones que se producen en las rachas negativas con la creación de un sistema de ventas.
Aprenderás a hacer venta cruzada y venta aumentada y como incorporarla al sistema de ventas.

que es un sistema de ventas y como debem: que es un sistema de ventas
Qué hacer cuando acabe el curso: Resumen de como crear un sistema de ventas para televenta
Contenido adicional: Juego de gamificación para Venta cruzada

requirements: Debes hacer venta telefónica o querer hacerla
Usar el correo electrónico como herramienta de venta simultanea a la televenta
Querer tener un sistema de ventas para telemarketing
courses.description:
LLEVO MAS DE 8 AÑOS IMPARTIENDO ESTE CURSO PRESENCIAL EN EMPRESAS.
ES POSIBLE QUE VEAS MUCHOS CURSOS PERO POCOS SERÁN LOS PONENTES QUE LO IMPARTAN DE FORMA PRESENCIAL.
★★★ 30 DÍAS DE GARANTÍA ★★★
★★★ SI NO QUEDAS SATISFECHO TE DEVOLVEMOS TU DINERO ★★★
¡Bienvenidos al curso de Llamada en Frío, una experiencia única creada a partir de mi propia travesía en el mundo de las ventas! Soy Neftalí Claros Carretero, y a lo largo de mi carrera, he ocupado roles cruciales como Director Comercial en diversas empresas. Sin embargo, algo que siempre me apasionó fue transformar la dinámica de la venta en frío.
En mi camino, enfrenté el desafío recurrente de la rotación constante en los equipos comerciales. Grandes vendedores abandonaban sus puestos, exhaustos por los numerosos "noes". Esta situación me llevó a reflexionar y decidí tomar cartas en el asunto.
Como empresario, entendí que la clave estaba en abordar la venta en frío de una manera diferente. Fue así como me sumergí en la tarea de desarrollar un sistema de ventas que no solo minimizara la rotación, sino que también maximizara el rendimiento de los comerciales.
Enfrenté directamente el problema: las negativas constantes agotaban a los comerciales. Así, diseñé un sistema que focalizaba cada fase de la venta. Si en la primera frase no se obtenía una respuesta positiva del cliente, la venta no avanzaba. Esto no solo evitaba pérdidas de tiempo, sino que también preservaba la motivación y la energía de mis vendedores.
Este enfoque integral no solo disminuyó drásticamente la rotación en los equipos, sino que también generó un aumento significativo en las ventas. Los comerciales ya no se sentían desgastados; por el contrario, se sentían empoderados al tener un sistema claro y efectivo para abordar cada llamada en frío.
En este curso, compartiré contigo las lecciones aprendidas, estrategias probadas y tácticas que han demostrado cambiar el juego en el mundo de las ventas telefónicas. Prepárate para descubrir cómo convertir los desafíos de la llamada en frío en oportunidades para el éxito comercial. ¡Bienvenidos a un curso que transformará tu enfoque y elevará tu desempeño en las llamadas en frío!
target_audience: Cualquier persona que haga venta en frío sobretodo aquellas que lo hagan por teléfono e email

objectives: Erstellung hochwertiger Stock-Videos

Eine Kamera oder ein Smartphone mit guter Videoqualität und ein Computer mit Internetzugang werden benötigt, um die Videos zu bearbeiten und auf Stock-Plattformen hochzuladen.
Offenheit für kreatives Arbeiten und Lernen
Die Bereitschaft, kreative Ideen zu entwickeln und neue Techniken in der Videoproduktion zu erlernen, ist für den erfolgreichen Einstieg in den Footage-Markt unerlässlich.
courses.description:
Vom Dreh zum Dollar – Dein Weg zu passivem Einkommen mit Stock-Videos
Hast du eine kreative Ader und suchst nach einer Möglichkeit, daraus ein profitables, passives Einkommen zu machen?
Dann ist dieser Kurs genau richtig für dich! In „Stock-Videos für passives Einkommen“ lernst du, wie du mit einfach produzierten Footage-Videos eine neue Einnahmequelle erschließt – ohne teures Equipment und ohne Vorkenntnisse.
Das erwartet dich:
Dieser Kurs führt dich Schritt für Schritt durch den gesamten Prozess – von der Videoproduktion bis zum Verkauf. Du erfährst, wie du hochwertige Stock-Videos erstellst, sie erfolgreich auf Plattformen wie Shutterstock, Adobe Stock & Co. veröffentlichst und dir damit ein nachhaltiges Einkommen aufbaust.
Das wirst du lernen:
Grundlagen der Stock-Video-Produktion – wie du mit einfacher Ausrüstung professionelle Ergebnisse erzielst
Gefragte Themen & Motive – welche Inhalte sich am besten verkaufen und wie du den richtigen Fokus setzt
Plattform-Strategien – Upload-Prozesse, Positionierung und die wichtigsten Verkaufsplattformen
Marketing & Einnahmen – Methoden, um deine Sichtbarkeit zu steigern und langfristig passives Einkommen zu sichern
Recht & Preisgestaltung – alles zu Lizenzmodellen, Urheberrecht und fairen Preisen
Für wen ist dieser Kurs geeignet?
Kreative Köpfe, die ihre Fähigkeiten profitabel nutzen möchten
Hobbyfilmer und Content Creator, die mit Videos Geld verdienen wollen
Alle, die ein passives Einkommen mit einem wachsenden Zukunftsmarkt aufbauen möchten
Warum Stock-Videos?
Die Nachfrage steigt stetig – Unternehmen, Agenturen und Creator benötigen täglich frisches Videomaterial. Mit den richtigen Strategien kannst du aus dieser Nachfrage ein verlässliches Einkommen generieren und dabei deiner Kreativität freien Lauf lassen.
Warum dieser Kurs?
Du lernst direkt von einem erfahrenen Stock-Video-Experten, der selbst erfolgreich in diesem Markt aktiv ist.
Statt trockener Theorie bekommst du praxisnahe Anleitungen, Insider-Wissen und konkrete Tipps, mit denen du dich von der Konkurrenz abhebst und deine Videos erfolgreich verkaufst.
Dein nächster Schritt:
Starte jetzt in die Welt der Stock-Videos, nutze deine Kreativität und baue dir ein skalierbares, passives Einkommen auf.
Melde dich an und beginne deine Reise in den lukrativen Markt der Footage-Videos!
target_audience: Jede Person, die Geld im Internet verdienen möchte und sich für das Thema passives Einkommen interessiert
Unternehmer, die gerne mit Footage Videos Geld dazuverdienen möchten

courses.description:
YouTube sem Mistérios é um guia completo, estruturado e descomplicado para você criar ou reestruturar seu canal no YouTube. O curso ideal para você que quer criar uma presença digital forte e coerente nesta rede, criar sua comunidade, divulgar seu trabalho, ensinar, gerar renda e ganhar visibilidade na internet (sem mistérios, respeitando seus objetivos, personalidade e disponibilidade).
Olá! Eu sou a Leila! Professora, Empreendedora e criadora da Escola Digital sem Mistérios. Eu sou Professora de formação (e de coração) e encontrei no ensino a distância uma possibilidade de empreender fazendo o que eu melhor sei fazer: ENSINAR. Eu ensino a Ensinar e Empreender on-line.
Se hoje eu conto com mais de 70 mil alunos em 114 países e já criei a minha própria escola on-line, eu comecei como tantas outras pessoas: com um sonho e muito medo de fracassar!
Eu criei meu canal no YouTube para poder continuar ensinando e respondendo às perguntas dos meus alunos para além dos cursos on-line. Com mais de 17 mil assinantes e 915.387 visualizações (números do dia 28.08.2022), meu canal no YouTube é a minha melhor fonte de tráfego orgânico, altamente qualificado e pronto para se matricular nos meus cursos.
Meu canal no YouTube me traz alunos, clientes e parceiros importantes, sem que eu precise investir em anúncios, somente na criação de conteúdo de qualidade, relevante e coerente com meus objetivos profissionais.
Se você quer criar um Canal no YouTube para compartilhar conteúdo de qualidade, se conectar com seu público, criar sua comunidade, divulgar seu trabalho, produtos e servicos, eu posso ajudar você!
Juntos nós vamos:
- Conhecer o YouTube como ferramenta e entender “as regras do jogo” para poder entrar em campo para ganhar;
- Planejar a estrutura do nosso canal no YouTube
- Criar e personalizar o nosso canal
- Fazer o nosso canal crescer com conteúdo e parcerias relevantes
- Gerar renda com o nosso canal no YouTube
- E muito mais!
Você quer criar um canal de sucesso no YouTube?
Leia o programa do curso com atenção, assista as aulas disponíveis para visualização gratuita e se você gostar, eu vou adorar encontrar você do outro lado!
Para todas as suas dúvidas, visite meu site, meu canal no YouTube e entre em contato direto comigo. Todos os meus contatos, você encontra aqui no meu perfil de instrutora Udemy.


Antes de acessar o curso, ainda não sabia bem como seria, mas os vídeos introdutórios já ajudaram a perceber que o curso seria sim de qualidade. Agora admiro o carinho, a competência e o profissionalismo da professora Leila, e agradeço por todo o aprendizado gerado, pois o conteúdo é de tamanha importância para quem está começando.
(Gabriel Maltese, aluno do curso YouTube para Leigos)*

The Advanced, Step-by-Step System for Packaging Your Existing Knowledge into Information Products and Selling it through YouTube
Discover how 1000's of "niche" YouTube video publishers are making passive-income through turning their knowledge and expertise into digital-goods that people pay for
You've heard of the YouTube success stories - The stories of people making a living from publishing simple videos on the topics they love to talk about. Ever wonder if you have what it takes?
About 4 years ago, I started my own YouTube channel over "dance"! A few months later, I was able to turn this channel into a passive-income info-business. This business allowed me to travel all over the world and fund my many other online ventures.
From there, I branched out to creating channels over art, writing and even creative thinking!
Just a few months ago, I started on a brand new subject of Kindle Publishing and writing!
Many people come to me with these questions:


"Where exactly does the revenue come from?"
"What are some examples of niches that you can still make income in?"
"How do I keep myself accountable and create video consistently?"
"There are so many massive channels out there, how do you even compete?"
"People click off my videos after 42 seconds - How do I get them to stick around?"

"Why would anyone want my knowledge? I don't have any credentials!"
"Is it even possible to build a subscriber-base nowadays?"
"Is this going to even be worth the time or effort? Have I missed the opportunity"
In response to these things, I've created this advanced, step-by-step system that will show you how to take your existing knowledge and package it in to an online course that people are searching for, and sell it through the YouTube platform.
What's inside:
"Why would people buy if I give away content on YouTube?" - Overcoming this challenge

The MRSPE content creation checklist that gains trust and turns subscribers into customers

"Macro optimization" and "Micro optimization" techniques for dual-ended subscriber-base building
NVCC + CB + PC + SG = Self-sustained channel ---- The 4-part framework for turning your expertise in to a long-term passive-income "muse" business

Hello,
Welcome to Facebook Ads For Mobile App Marketing course.
Facebook ads for App install, understand Facebook marketing, App marketing and optimize your mobile app install campaign

App marketing, app install, mobile marketing, app install campaign, facebook app install, facebook app, facebook ads, facebook ads for apps, facebook app marketing, facebook sdk, facebook ads for mobile app marketing
If you are thinking to start to learn app promotion with Facebook, this course is a perfect place for you to start. This course is specifically designed for the beginner all the way up to advanced with hands-on courses. In this course, you will learn:
How to make money with your Apps?
Use the app install objective to drive app downloads,
Leverage the Facebook SDK and app events,
Use app event optimization to find people who will take valuable actions in your app,
Optimize for specific app events,
Utilize available creative formats and placements,

Mobile app marketing
app install with facebook ads
Facebook app install
App install
We explained all the subjects with simple examples and applications, and explanatory diagrams in a way that the student can understand at all levels.
We paid attention to explaining all the topics in order. Because we think that the order of presentation of the subject is as important as the content of education. We have seen this shortcoming in many pieces of training we have examined and tried to explain these issues to you in the best way.
What are Facebook ads?
Facebook ads are paid messages that businesses place on Facebook. This gives you the flexibility to write in your own voice. Plus, you can reach the people who matter most to you, as explained in the social network’s beginner's guide.
The essential component of this definition is the word "paid." Anyone can post on their Facebook page for free—but you never know who's going to see your post.
A paid ad lets you target a particular demographic, and you can be as specific or as broad as you’d like.
Facebook ad campaigns are available in a variety of formats. You also get to specify how much you want to spend, including:
The overall amount
Your daily budget
Your cost per result
You even get to determine what user actions you want to pay for. That doesn't mean that Facebook will only charge you when your ad works the way you want it to, but you can choose how they bill you, such as being charged by the number of views or clicks. You have different options depending on the goals you set for your ad.
Why are Facebook ads important?
Almost 96% of social media marketers believe that of all the platforms out there, Facebook provides the best return on investment (ROI). And there's a good reason for that:
"Facebook" is the most popular search term worldwide
The platform has 2.4 billion users and more than 7 million advertisers
People use it for an average of 35 minutes a day
68% of adults in the US have an active account
With a reach like that, you'd think that marketing on Facebook would be expensive, but it isn't. Not only does Facebook let you specify a maximum spend, it also charges you less to reach the same number of people that you'd reach on another platform.
Why would you want to take this course?
Everyone is talking about design, coding but no one is talking about how to make money with apps. There are tons of tutorials for how to make games, but everyone is silent about making money with apps and they are keeping it a secret. We believe in the power of sharing. Sharing is caring, any? So we decided to come out and teach you how to actually make money with apps.
When you enroll, you will feel our seasoned developers and marketing experts' expertise.
Step-by-Step Way
By the end of the course, you’ll have a firm understanding of how to make money with apps with Facebook ads.

Googelst Du noch? Oder bist Du schon "KI-ntelligent"? In diesem Kurs zeige ich Dir, wie Du auch als Anfänger ChatGPT smart ,sicher, effektiv und kreativ nutzen kannst in Beruf und Freizeit - nicht nur als Suchmaschine. Ich erkläre Dir alles Schritt für Schritt mit konkreten Beispielen, Ergebnissen und Übungen. Lerne, wie Du mit KI im Job Zeit sparen kannst und Arbeitsprozesse an die KI weitergeben kannst. Lerne, wie Du KI beim Marketing einsetzen kannst und wie Du Webseiten mit KI in Minuten erstellen kannst. Außerdem: Spaß, Spannung und Kreativität mit KI-Bildern, Videos und Musik. Der Kurs behandelt auch rechtliche und ethische Aspekte der KI und zeigt ehrlich die Grenzen und Fehler der KI auf.
Als  Imagefilmproduzentin und in meinen Marketing-Projekten nutze ich selbst schon täglich KI, z.B. in Schnittprogrammen integrierte, Übersetzungsprogramme, Video- und Musikgeneratoren und Vieles mehr. Der Kurs zeigt dir Möglichkeiten auf, die Du dann ganz nach Deinem Bedarf oder Interesse weiter ausbauen kannst.
Der Kurs hat 10 Videomodule mit klar definierten Themen zwischen 2 und 13 Minuten. Zum Kurs dazu bekommst Du ein Handout und Bonusmaterial in PDF-Form.


Auch in war mal KI-Anfängerin! Deswegen verstehe ich Skepsis und Zweifel - wie sollst Du in einem vollen Alltag jetzt noch so viel dazu lernen? Und ist KI nicht etwas Schlechtes, das man von sich fern halten sollte? Ich führe Dich Schritt für Schritt durch Themen und Fragen. Du kannst Pausen machen, nacharbeiten, parallel mitmachen, wie Du willst. Ich habe alles bewusst einfach gehalten, weil ich selbst Online Tutorials oft zu schnell oder speziell finde. Ich hoffe, dass ich Dir einen guten Einstieg in die KI vermitteln kann und dass Du sie schon bald sicher und smart für Dich nutzen kannst!


Viel Spaß wünscht Dir Carolin Reiter, Journalistin.

Great videos boost sales
Smart companies realize that great video boosts sales. And you can make your own professional videos for next to nothing by following our simple video production and editing techniques.
If you’re a business owner, a freelancer or a startup…
a skilled artisan or an ambitious manager…
if you work in education, a sports club or a non-profit...
...you can reach your target audiences easily by creating videos.
By learning simple video production techniques, you'll be able to make unlimited videos quickly and easily, you’ll attract new customers and educate them in how to use your products or services - before they even buy. And you’ll build loyalty among your existing customers, encourage repeat purchases and teach people to get even more value from what you offer.
We’re not talking about slick, expensive ‘corporate’ videos that no-one watches... nor long, dull, unsteady videos that look awful and are more than likely to drive customers away rather than win them over.
We’ll show you how to make honest, quality video that feature you, your staff or your customers at their very best - video production that shows the human side of your operation.
And we’ll show you how to use video production to educate your customers - because educated customers are everyone’s best customers. They’re frequent users, they tell their family and friends how great you are and, above all, they’re loyal. Heck, they’ll even share your videos and do your marketing for you.
This video production course shows you how to create such videos, how to edit them, how to publish them and how to promote them - without having to spend a fortune on technology.
And yes, this course will help even if you’ve never made videos before, or if you don’t own expensive video equipment. The truth is that most people already have the technology to make great videos, sitting unused on their smartphones, tablets or desktops.
But there’s one big problem!
If your videos are not engaging, entertaining and informative, your audience will quickly turn away. That means the knowledge you have will never reach them ...never enrich their lives ...and never give you the warm glow of satisfaction in passing your skills along to others.
And that’s where this course comes in
We’ll show video production and editing skills you can use with minimum expenditure and little need for technical knowledge or complicated equipment.
This is not a course about video production technology... or the latest video cameras ...or the expensive accessories that will give you the cleverest effects.
In this course, we believe it’s not about buying more technology, but about learning what to do with the technology you already have. Yes, that’s right! You probably have all the technology you need right there on your smartphone or tablet.
You'll find over 30 video production lessons in 4 important sections:


Why you need next to nothing to start. That’s because today’s electronic devices are jam-packed with video production technology and features - most of it underused or completely ignored. We’ll show you how to get super results with the equipment that you already own.
How to make videos your audience wants to see. We’ll show you how to easily find the questions your audiences are already asking online - and how you can turn that into an endless source of relevant video topics so you’ll never be short of new ideas.
How to edit videos for impact and enjoyment. We’ll share professional video production tricks and insider tips that will save you time and add a professional aura to your work. We’ll show you how to make videos your audience will really enjoy.
Video Snapshots: Great Videos from Ordinary Businesses. We take a look at how real-world businesses are using video to promote themselves. But then we explain how you can make the same, or similar videos, using the basic equipment we recommend in this course!
You'll also find quizzes to test your understanding of the course content, plus worksheets and resources - and recommendations on the best and cheapest equipment.
So start learning to harness the benefits of inexpensive video production and promote yourself, your business or your organization.

Hit the green button above to get instant access!

At the end of the course you will be able to utilise the powerful features to start building your own engaging video content.

courses.description:
今回のコースは、ホワイトボードアニメーションを自動で作成するVideoScribeという英国生まれのソフトウエアを紹介する内容となっています。
ホワイトボードアニメーションは、プレゼンソフトで作成されたスクリーンキャストと呼ばれる動画がオモシロクないという世界中の人たちの共通の思いをベースに誕生しました。
すでに、Udemyの英語コースには多数のコースがあり、中にはベストセラーとなっているコースも少なくありません。リサーチした結果では、おそらく日本人講師による日本語のコースとしては最初のものだと思います。
コースでは、VideoScribeの操作方法についての解説は一切ありません。説明などなくても、誰でもカンタンに扱えるからです。iPhoneよりもカンタンです。実際、VideoScribeにはマニュアルは存在しません。
VideoScribeは英語・スペイン語圏以外の人が使うことは想定されていません。そこで、コースでは日本人が使いこなすにはどうすれば良いか、ということを中心にお話ししています。
アニメーションを使えば、動画による情報発信へのハードルは一挙に下がります。動画が欠かせなくなる今後の情報発信に効果的なツールとして、ホワイトボードアニメーション(VideoScribe)というものがあることをお知らせするコースです。
【追記】
2020年8月末から、日本語対応になりました、

requirements: No Prior Experience Needed! This course is designed for beginners and professionals alike. Whether you’re new to video marketing or have some experience, you’ll find actionable strategies you can use right away.
A Product or Service to Launch (or an Idea in Development) You should have a product, service, or offer that you plan to launch soon—or at least be in the process of developing one.
Basic Computer Skills You’ll need basic computer skills to create, edit, and upload videos.
Access to a Computer or Smartphone You can use a computer or smartphone with a camera to record videos. A smartphone is often enough to get started!
An Internet Connection For uploading videos, sharing content, and accessing online tools and platforms.

Optional: Basic Video Editing Software While not required, having access to simple editing software (like iMovie, Windows Video Editor, or free online tools) can help you polish your videos. We’ll recommend both free and affordable options inside the course.
courses.description:
Ready to create excitement and anticipation around your next product launch? Discover how to leverage the power of video marketing to build pre-launch buzz and skyrocket your product’s success—even before it hits the market!
"Generating Pre-Launch Buzz for Your New Products with Videos" is a step-by-step video marketing course designed to help entrepreneurs, business owners, marketers, and creators master the art of using video to drive attention, engagement, and early demand for their products. Whether you're launching a physical product, a digital course, software, or a service, this course gives you the tools and strategies to make your pre-launch campaign a hit.
Why Video?
Video content captures attention like no other medium. It emotionally connects with your audience, showcases your product’s value, and motivates viewers to take action. Top global brands and successful startups alike use product launch videos to generate massive interest and sales. Now, it’s your turn.
Inside this course, you’ll learn the proven techniques and insider strategies that successful brands use to execute video-driven pre-launch campaigns. By the end, you’ll know how to plan, create, and promote compelling launch videos that captivate your audience and convert views into sales.


How to Strategically Plan a Pre-Launch Campaign
Develop a well-thought-out launch strategy to create anticipation, excitement, and demand for your product before it goes live.
How to Create Buzz-Worthy Pre-Launch Videos
Produce powerful teaser videos and storytelling content that capture attention and make your audience eager for more.
Step-by-Step Video Launch Sequences
Learn how to structure your launch videos—from generating curiosity to building trust and closing the sale.
How to Use Video to Build Trust and Credibility
Incorporate reviews, testimonials, and behind-the-scenes videos to boost credibility and influence buying decisions.
Practical Video Production Tips
Master affordable, effective video production techniques—whether you’re recording yourself or working with professionals.
How to Maximize Conversions with Video
Craft powerful calls-to-action that motivate viewers to sign up, pre-order, or purchase.


The course is broken into 9 easy-to-follow modules, each packed with actionable insights and real-world examples:
Introduction to Product Pre-Launch
Understand the power of pre-launch videos and why they are essential to the success of your product launch.
Planning Your Product Launch
Learn how to map out a successful video launch campaign, from goal setting to timeline planning.
Pre-Launch Buzz: What Needs to Be Done?
Discover effective strategies to generate excitement and build an engaged audience before your product goes live.
Launch Video 1: Making a Memorable First Impression
Create an engaging first launch video that hooks potential customers and gets them interested in your offer.
Launch Video 2: Reeling in Your Audience
Develop follow-up videos that deepen interest, explain benefits, and nurture curiosity.
Product Reviews and Descriptions That Sell
Showcase your product’s features in an authentic, persuasive way—without sounding pushy.
Closing the Deal: Turning Viewers into Buyers
Craft compelling offers and calls to action that turn excitement into sales.
Video Production Tips for Any Budget
Get insider tips on scripting, filming, editing, and publishing videos—even if you’re working on a tight budget.
Executing Your Video Launch for Maximum Impact
Tie everything together into a cohesive video launch strategy that amplifies visibility, builds hype, and drives results.


Course Benefits:
Plan and execute a successful product pre-launch campaign
Create high-converting video content without expensive equipment
Build excitement and anticipation around your product
Reach and engage your ideal customers effectively
Boost sales and grow your brand’s visibility with professional video strategies


Why Enroll Now?
The success of your product depends on the impact of its launch. With this course, you’ll have everything you need to create compelling videos that generate buzz, attract attention, and drive sales—before your product even hits the market.


Ready to make your next product launch your best one yet?
Enroll today and start generating pre-launch buzz with videos that convert!
target_audience: Entrepreneurs and small business owners launching a new product or service
Digital marketers looking to enhance product launch strategies
Creators and influencers promoting their new offerings
Startups wanting to stand out and generate early momentum
Anyone interested in mastering video marketing for product launches

requirements: TikTokアプリのインストール
事前にTikTokの知識は必要ありません。
courses.description:
TikTokの最大の魅力は拡散力の高さにあります。


どんなに良い商品もサービスも人もまずは知られなければ価値をもちません。TikTokはファーストステップである「認知」を獲得するのに非常に優れたプラットフォームなのです。


その秘密はTikTokのコンテンツ（動画）拡散の仕組みにあります。


TikTokではAiが動画を評価し、良い動画だと認めたものがより多くの人に届けられます。


よってAiの評価基準を十分に満たす動画を作成すれば、多くの人にリーチ（いわゆるバズ状態を作り出すことが）でき、広告宣伝費をかけずに高いエンゲージメントを獲得することが出来るのです。


近年、ユーザー数の右肩上がりの増加も相まってそのパワーは非常に強力なものになっています。


更にTikTokはその投稿動画をきっかけに商品やサービスが売れていく「TikTok売れ」という事例も増えており、TikTok市場は更に熱を帯びています。


「地球グミ」や「リップモンスター」が良い事例です。TikTok発で有名になる企業や個人もかなり増えてきました。


ただ一方でTikTokでアカウントをどのように運用していくか、その具体的な方法が分からない、アカウントを作成して運用してみたが思うような成果が上がらない、と悩んでいる方も多いかもしれません。


そこで今回はTikTokを運用していく上で知っておくべき基礎知識から効果的な動画の作成方法やアカウント運用方法、分析などなどTikTokについて網羅的に学べる講座となっております。


正直この講座１つで基礎はバッチリになります。


講師は、今なお自分のアカウントを伸ばし続けており、最新のTikTok事情にも詳しいフォロワー10万人を抱えるインフルエンサーの櫻井勇作氏。２時間の講座でTikTokの基礎知識を身につけて継続的に動画をバズらせるためのノウハウを伝授します。
target_audience: TikTokの基礎学習で失敗をしたくない方

Finally, live streaming technology explained in simple, straightforward language. This is a book that anyone can understand, written by author Paul Richards, to explain the most important topics in live streaming. From how to live stream with Zoom, to Facebook and YouTube, this book doesn't skip a step in this introduction to live streaming technology. What's more? Every chapter of this book includes a video tutorial you can reference to make the subject come alive. This is the ideal book for volunteers, entry-level video production professionals, and anyone who has taught themselves the valuable trade of live video production.
The Basics of Live Streaming can teach anyone the essential skills of live video streaming. It features foundational learning opportunities for audiovisual cables, equipment, and streaming technology for anyone interested in the subject. This material is great to review before other more advanced online courses available from the StreamGeeks because it reviews skills that can be applied to any streaming media project. For example, this book is an ideal introduction to more advanced topics like the OBS, vMix or Wirecast books already available on Amazon. This course is also ideal for volunteers who operate live streaming equipment or aspiring video producers.

courses.title: Bring your Instagram stories to life with InVideo
courses.bio: Learn simple, effective techniques to create beautiful marketing videos easily using InVideo in under 2 hours
objectives: Learn to create marketing videos for Instagram stories to promote your Business
Learn everything you need to know about InVideo
Create professional eye-catching videos that grab people's potential online
Be able to have a direct influence on your brand creation by doing it yourself
Walkthrough examples from scratch

Welcome to the club!: How to make the most out of this course
A Crash Course in Video Production: Step 1 : Coming up with a mind-blowing idea
Working with InVideo: Choosing the perfect template in InVideo
The InVideo Editor: Say Hello to the InVideo Editor
Working with the Timeline in InVideo
Adding a Custom Scene to our Video

requirements: Google Chrome Browser (recommended)
Any computer or laptop with 4GB RAM or more
A working Internet connection
No design skills required
courses.description:
Videos are the new face of marketing! Gone are the days of static images and posters. I have been making education content for over 6 years now and I have seen the entire landscape shift in front of my eyes. I remember how we promoted my first few online courses by making fancy posters a few years ago and no one wants to buy a course today without watching a demo video or an appealing ad about the course.
So trust me when I say this, I understand your concerns.
If you are a Content Developer yourself, you know exactly what I'm talking about. Photos and vectors simply aren't appealing to the audience anymore unless they are exceptionally well designed with an amazing copy. This in turn takes more time and doesn't guarantee anything. It's simply not worth the effort.
If you are a Brand, I get it. Changing your marketing strategies and developing new content is tough, but trust me, it is essential. I spent a lot of time trying to make the same old content work for my own firm and failed miserably. When all the dust finally settled with not-so-encouraging results, I had to take a step back and hire a Graphic Designer and a Video Editor for producing fresh content.
If you are a Video Editor, you know how difficult it has become to keep up with the client requirements. Tools like Premier Pro and Final Cut take a lot of time to get simple things done. They are amazing for full-length featured videos, but no so good for simple ad-style videos. I've been there. I've done that.
Technology evolves and we are left behind, unless we keep up with that change! This is exactly why I designed this course. Transforming our marketing content to make it more video-driven really helped drive sales and improved the lead generation dramatically.
We will be focusing on curating videos for Instagram in this course. Instagram is one of the leading sources of lead generation and companies spend a fortune for advertising on Instagram. You should enroll for this course to stay up to date with the industry trends and learn how to create amazing marketing videos with minimum effort. The tool we use in this course is InVideo. InVideo can be used to create videos for Instagram, Instagram Stories, Facebook ads, Facebook Page, LinkedIn, Youtube, Twitter, Website, and more. InVideo can also be used for creating social media ads.
'Video Creation' is a powerful skill to have, no matter what your job role presently is. Learn simple, effective techniques to create beautiful marketing videos easily using InVideo in under 2 hours!
target_audience: Entrepreneurs and business owners that want to create attention-grabbing videos - FAST!
Marketing Professionals
Advertisers and Agencies
Social Media Enthusiasts
Freelancers
Soloprenuers

courses.title: Make Effective & Easy Marketing Videos Using InVideo
courses.bio: Learn simple, effective techniques to make beautiful social media & web promo videos using InVideo
requirements: Chrome Browser, Any computer with 4GB RAM or more and internet connection. No design skills required
courses.description:
Are you ready to take charge and learn quick and easy methods for creating and editing powerful web and social media promo videos.

Whether you are an entrepreneur, employee, content creator, teacher, author, or social media maven, over the last few years it has become CRUCIAL to know how to do a little bit of everything online, including how to make your brand stand out with videos.
With this course as your guide, you'll learn how to confidentially and professionally create and manage your OWN unique marketing and promo videos for your website, blog, eCourse, eBook, presentations, or social media pages.
-No design skills required.
-No expensive software required.
-Beginners and busy people welcome.


Save time, money, and sanity by learning how to finally make your own videos without having to always pay someone else to do them for you.


In this course you will learn:
Easy and quick ways to create professional web & social media videos in minutes using InVideo (*FREE and premium accounts available.)
Learn the most essential and useful tools in InVideo
Absorb the most important video design principles as we work together making real social media videos for a real business
Understand how to better choose and organize type, images, colors, and layout in your videos
How to take your regular logo and put it on a transparent background in four minutes or less
Get a birds-eye view of the design process from concept to final product by following step by step case studies.


This course was created especially for complete beginners as well as people who fight with technology who want to gain new and valuable video-making skills that can be used every day. You can watch and follow along with me as I show you through case studies how I make professional-looking social media videos using the drag n' drop web-based video program, InVideo.


Empower yourself now by enrolling in this course and join our growing learning community! Click the "Take This Course" button in the upper right corner and let's get started building your new video creation skills using InVideo today.
Who this course is for:
Entrepreneurs and business owners that want to create attention-grabbing videos - FAST!
Marketing Professionals
Advertisers
Social Media enthusiasts
Freelancers

courses.description:
In this 2 part course, you'll learn an easy method to create high quality professional looking videos. In part 2 of the course we'll go over how to use Camtasia for video editing.
We'll first begin with creating screencast videos where you'll learn an easy method to create high quality professional looking videos, without needing to get in front of a camera and without needing any expensive equipment!
This course will teach you how to easily create videos that can be used in video marketing, sales videos, instructional videos (great for Udemy instructors), informational videos, presentation videos and many other types of videos.
It is no secret that online video has a huge impact. It's huge for building brands and products, it's huge for generating traffic, it's huge for creating high-converting sales-pages.
If you aren't using video for your business, product or website than you are missing out.
Video will increase your brand and credibility. Video marketing is going to get bigger, no matter what your  position is or what you are promoting. If you need to reach an audience,  especially in large number and via online methods, then using video  is the right marketing campaign to adopt.
If you've struggled with creating videos and wanted high quality videos for your business, product or website, then this course is for you!
In part 2 of the course you'll learn all about using Camtasia. Learn all the essentials of using Camtasia, such as recording, editing and sharing a screencast. We'll walk you through how to create software-based training and slides-based training, as well as edit video footage and audio with Camtasia.

courses.bio: 音声編集の工程をステップバイステップで体系的に解説！DaVinci Resolve（ダビンチリゾルブ）Fairlightの基本的な操作方法を身につけて、ビデオコンテンツの音声品質を向上させましょう。
objectives: 音声編集の基本的なスキルの習得

requirements: 特にありませんが、ヘッドフォンを使用した方が音声の変化を感じ取りやすくなります。
courses.description:
音声編集の世界へようこそ。この講座では、DaVinci ResolveのFairlightを使った音声編集の基本について学びます。Fairlightは、音声編集とサウンドデザインのための強力なプロフェッショナルツールで、映画やテレビ番組のサウンドを手がける専門家も利用しています。
本コースは音声編集の初心者を対象に、Fairlightの基本操作から効果的な音声編集までの一連の流れを解説しています。音声編集に関して全く何も知らない初心者の方でも大丈夫です。わかりやすいステップバイステップのガイダンスを通じて、Fairlightの基本機能の使い方を学んでいきます。
コースの途中で、音声クリップのインポート、クリップのトリミング、音量の調整、エフェクトの追加など、音声編集の基本的な技術を身につけます。さらに、プロの音響技師が使用するような高度な技術も紹介します。これらの技術を駆使することで、あなたのビデオプロジェクトに深みと魅力を加えることができます。
また、本コースでは、音声編集の理論的な側面にも触れ、効果的な音声編集がビデオコンテンツ全体の品質にどのように影響するかを理解します。音声編集は、視覚的なストーリーテリングを補完し、視聴者の体験を豊かにする重要な要素です。
さらに、Fairlightの高度な機能についても学びます。例えば、Dynamics、EQ、ノイズリダクションといったエフェクトの使用方法や、背景ノイズの追加等の高度なサウンドデザインテクニックを理解し、応用するための方法を解説します。
まったく新しいスキルを学び、自分のクリエイティブなプロジェクトに活用することで、あなた自身のビジョンを具現化する力を手に入れることができます。本コースは、あなたがFairlightの基本をしっかりと理解し、自信を持って操作できるようになるまでの良きパートナーとなるでしょう。
ぜひ楽しみながら学習して、あなたのビデオコンテンツのサウンドを次のレベルに引き上げましょう。
target_audience: 音声品質を向上させたいオンライン講師、ビデオクリエイター

courses.description:
★★★★★
This is an excellent course. There are courses with thousands of reviews that dont even compare to this one. The author is not teaching you how to use a camera or edit software. He is demonstrating the strategies and techniques to create the best possible videos If you want to learn how to take great footage on your smart phone for professional or business use. I would highly recommend this course
★★★★★
This course is amazing .. I learnt new things and even when I’m yet to finish the course .. it’s straight to the point! .. amazing and just too good!
★★★★★
I have no experience with video production, editing whatsoever. I only kinda know editing photos (thanks Instagram feed!) but in all reality, I didn't know the theory of these things. Along with that, I didn't know the things my phone can do to record a video. This course really teaches you how to film, and edit without fancy cameras and fancy softwares. The moment I finished the course, I went outside and film, and it turned out great! The only downside is, because of the location, I can't buy things from Amazon and/or eBay, but that's nothing too serious! Oh, and, after every lecture, you get a notes, a cheatsheet. If you're not native speaker, like I am, that really helps! And quizzes are there for you to test yourself. The course structure, the way the instructor explains stuff, everything is made greatly imo. Thanks man!


Two Questions!
Do you have a phone? Do you want to produce video content?
Yes to both?
Well hiring a professional Videographer can be an expensive investment, but producing engaging and professional video content doesn’t have to be.
The tools to produce professional video content have never been more accessible, cost effective and easy to use.
Video is fast becoming the best way to engage online and increase brand awareness for business with video accounting for up to 90% of all online traffic.
Online video content is an extremely effective medium for engaging with current and prospective clients...4 times more effective than text to be exact! Marketers who use video grow revenue 49% faster than non-video users, and 93% of marketers say they’ve landed a new customer because of a video on social media...Now that's a pretty good return on investment!
So here it is.
A guide to smartphone video production, suitable for individuals with no previous video experience. The course is packed with clear explanations of the basics in video production and a guide to what products are available and how to use them.
The content is communicated through video tutorials, quizzes, text and downloadable content so you can learn quickly how to produce high-quality, professional and engaging video content straight from a smartphone.
The result? An increased online presence engaging you with new and current audiences, sharing those engaging stories that are so worthwhile and the confidence to produce your own videos!
This course and is suitable for beginners without any prior video production knowledge or experience. The course requires the student to have a smartphone with the ability to capture audio and video. Additional items of equipment and smartphone applications are not neccessary to complete the course but are highly recommended for a practical learning experience and to increase the production quality of video content produced.

Aprenderás las estrategias de optimización en tus títulos para posicionarte mucho más rápido.
Conocerás las métricas más importantes (lo que realmente debes prestarle atención, para crecer exponencialmente)
Conocerás las formas de generar ingresos con tu canal (no solo con lo que te paga Youtube)
Y mucho más!!


Mas que ser el "clásico" curso de Youtube que no te enseña más que a grabar un video, hablamos sobre las estrategias para que puedas hacerlo crecer y que se convierta en una herramienta poderosa para tu negocio y generación de ingresos.

courses.title: 【集客】縦型ショート動画で売上UP ! iPhoneと無料アプリVNであなたも作れるショート動画作成講座
courses.bio: ショート動画で集客したい ! でも作り方がわからない?? 編集経験ゼロから始めるTikTok、インスタリール、Youtubeショートの動画作成講座。ネタ探しからシナリオ作りまでまるっとわかるテンプレート付き。
objectives: この講座は、ショート動画を使ってお店の売上を上げたい方のための講座です。まったく動画をつくったことがなくても大丈夫!テンプレートがあるので悩むことなく作ることが出来ます。
動画制作で一番悩むのはネタ探しです。講座では料理、施設、人物それぞれのネタ探しのポイントを詳しく紹介しています。あなたのお店にもたくさんのネタがあることにきっと気付いてもらえます。
動画編集には無料アプリ「VN」を使います。撮影素材の取り込みからカット編集、音楽と文字入れ、書き出しまで、たくさんの機能を持っており、iPhone、Androidどちらでも使えます。
TikTok、インスタリール、Youtubeショートのアカウント取得方法から、動画投稿までわかりやすく解説しています。この講座だけで悩むことなく設定から投稿まで行えるので、すぐにでもYoutubeやSNSでお店の宣伝ができます!

はじめに: この講座はこんな方にぴったりの講座です。
この講座を受けるとこんなことが出来るようになります。
この講座をあまり必要としない方、向かない方
自己紹介
お店の今を考える: 人気の料理は何ですか。
人気の理由は何だと思いますか。
お客さんに食べてほしい料理は何ですか。
なぜその料理を食べてほしいと思いますか。
撮影のネタ探しと誰に何を伝えるかを考えよう: 撮影のネタ探し（調理シーン）
撮影のネタ探し（料理のシズル）
撮影のネタ探し（癒しと映えスポット）
あなたの想いを言葉にしましょう。
３つの動画テンプレート: 「推し（おし）料理」テンプレート
「王道シナリオ」テンプレート
「触れ合い共感」テンプレート
テンプレートを決める: オープニングとロゴマーク
調理シズルと料理シズル
縦型ショート動画について: ３大縦型ショート動画の特性
なぜ縦型ショート動画なのか
縦型動画が視聴者に好まれる理由
ショート動画が視聴者に好まれる理由
縦型ショート動画制作のメリット
縦型ショート動画制作の留意点
iPhoneの動画撮影設定とあると便利な機材: 撮影に役立つ機材　三脚
撮影に役立つ機材　レフ板
スマホ撮影の基本: スマホ撮影の基本　その１
スマホ撮影の基本　その２
スマホ撮影の基本　その３
カメラワークの基本　その１
カメラワークの基本　その２
VNエディターを使った動画編集: セクション概要
VNエディター概要とインストール
動画素材の取り込み
VN編集画面の機能説明
クリップの並び替え
クリップのトリミング（カット編集）
画像の明るさと色補正
画像の拡大・縮小、位置の調整
クリップの切り替え（トランジション）
再生速度の調整
BGMの取り込み
Googleアカウントの取得
YoutubeオーディオライブラリーでBGMを選ぶ
YoutubeオーディオライブラリーからBGMをダウンロード
ダウンロードBGMのVNタイムラインへの取り込み
ダウンロードBGMと動画音声の調整
Youtubeオーディオライブラリー以外の無料で利用できる音楽サイト
DOVA - SYNDROME（ドーバシンドローム）からのBGMの取り込み
文字入れ
書き出し
まとめ
縦型ショート動画の投稿: TikTok　インストールと動画投稿方法
Instagram　インストールと動画投稿方法
YouTube　インストールと動画投稿方法

requirements: iPhone（今お持ちの機種でOK）
無料アプリ「VN」（講座内でインストール方法を解説）。Androidでもインストール可能。
Androidをお持ちの方でも動画のテーマづくりやVNの編集解説はそのまま参考にしていただける内容となっています。
courses.description:
お店の売上を伸ばしたい !


誰もがそう思ってYoutubeを始めるのですが、想像以上に時間がかかってほとんどの人が途中で断念しています。
動画販促が有効なのは知っていても、睡眠時間を削ってまで頑張っていては身体が持ちませんよね。


なぜそんなに時間がかかるんでしょう?


①動画のネタが浮かばない
②シナリオを考えるのが大変
③撮影が上手くできない
④編集に使いやすいソフト（アプリ）がわからない
⑤BGMをどうすればいいの? 著作権が心配
⑤動画の投稿方法がわからない


いろいろな事が動画制作の壁となってしまいます。


とは言え、今は動画の時代。なんとか動画でお店を多くの人に知ってもらって集客を増やしたいですよね。


世の中にはTikTok、インスタリール、Youtubeショートが溢れています。


ショート動画のメリットはこの講座の中で詳しくお伝えしていますが、なんと言ってもサムネイルがいらないこと。コレはかなりの時間短縮になります。


それから、長さが短くていいので、１本１ネタでいいこと。つまり量産しやすいということですね。


慣れないうちは１本つくるのも結構大変かもしれませんが、編集や撮影、音入れはやればやるほど慣れてきます。


量産のネックは、ネタ探しと、撮影した素材をどう並べるかというシナリオづくりだと思います。


この講座では、なるべく悩まなくていいように、３つのシナリオテンプレートを用意しました。


あなたは撮影した動画素材を、テンプレートに添って編集アプリVNのタイムラインに並べてゆけば、悩むことなく１本の動画に仕上げることが出来ます。


何を撮影すれば良いのかも、撮影ネタリストがあるので、お店のネタ探しには困りません。


スマホ撮影のコツも、事例を上げて初心者にわかりやすく解説しています。


ぜひこの３つのテンプレートを最大限活用していただいて、お店のイチオシ料理や新作メニュー、店内の紹介や周りの風景、スタッフ紹介など、楽しみながら発信していってもらえればうれしいです。


これからはますます動画販促の時代です !  まずは１本作ってみましょう !


そして気付いたところを次の制作に生かしてゆけば、制作時間も短くなって、動画のクオリティもどんどん上がってゆくでしょう。


ぜひ、この動画販促の講座がきっかけとなって、あなたのつくった動画がお店にたくさんの集客と売上をもたらしてくれることを願っています。
target_audience: これまで自分で動画をつくったこともなく、撮影機材や照明も持っていないけれど、これから自分で動画をつくってお店や商品の販促に力を入れてゆきたい方
動画編集に適したスマホアプリを探していて、できれば無料で使えるものが知りたい方。

courses.title: Sneaky Subconscious VSL Magic
courses.bio: Creating Compelling, Persuasive Direct Market Sales Videos With These Tried-and-True Covert Strategies
objectives: Discover the secret formula to CRAZY HIGH conversions by using PROVEN principles of persuasion and nearly magical subconscious audio and video techniques for your VSLs.
Learn some of the most POWERFUL weapons at your disposal — like how to use colors and frequencies to trigger emotionally-charged purchase decisions.
Uncover simple VSL (Video Sales Letter) 'tricks of the trade' that will help your high-ticket offer DOUBLE or even TRIPLE your current conversion rate!
I'm Ken Walker and in this course, I walk you through the exact strategies I've used for over 15 years to build my client ULTRA-HIGH converting sales videos.

Introduction: Getting Ready To Convert Copy To A Killer Script
Visual Pizazz: Creating A Strong Visual CTA — Photoshop Background Tutorial
Powerful, Persuasive Proof: How Income Proof Can Be Faked [EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY]

requirements: To get the most out of this course, you should be familiar with the basics of writing good, long-form sales copy. This course has a strong focus on advanced sales strategies to take your marketing videos to the next level.
Have a desire to learn one of the SIMPLEST video editing programs on the planet — so simple a 12 year old can use it.
courses.description:
Are you struggling with low-conversion sales videos?
Would you like to know the secrets to powerful, persuasive video production?
Do you want to be able to produce 6-figure, high-conversion sales videos yourself, on-demand — and save THOUSANDS in production costs?
54% of consumers make their buying decisions based on VIDEO CONTENT from brands and businesses.
87% of marketing professionals use VIDEO as a powerful marketing tool.
The Case Studies revealed in this course will uncover simple tricks-of-the-trade I use on real-world video sales letters to get my clients double and TRIPLE their previous conversion rates on optin forms, sales pages and live/prerecorded webinars.
My name is Ken Walker and my Sneaky Subconscious VSL Magic marketing video course reveals tactics and strategies that I've developed over the past 15 years as a covert video production guru. During that time, I've worked with big name marketers all over the globe churning out sales and marketing videos for 6-figure launches.
The techniques I've developed engage and virtually program viewers to take action — and now you can use them to boost your video response like you never though possible! And the best part is — all you need is a mic and virtually any simple video editing software. In this course, I specifically use one of the simplest video editors you'll ever find — Techsmith's ultra-popular screen-capture software, Camtasia.
With all the competition out there, it's hard to get customers and prospects to watch videos — let alone get them to take action. Many marketers make the mistake of thinking they have to throw more money at their projects — paying thousands of dollars for videos that produce poor results. But that all changes right now because in this course, you'll discover how easy it can be to create KILLER sales videos YOURSELF for next to no costs!
Just imagine what a 34-61% conversion rate would do for you marketing efforts — you'd have the same adspend, the same traffic sources...just a much higher conversion which makes you more sales. Can you imagine turning $100 of adspend into $2,000 in sales??? It's beyond thrilling!
In this huge library of creative conversion practices you'll discover firsthand...
How to create trust with the simple use of color association...you'll be blown away at how simple and POWERFUL this is!
Put your viewer 'in the mood' to take action with proven audio tricks that involve frequencies and tempos...discover for yourself how easy it is to influence and compel them to do your bidding, subconsciously!
Surprisingly simple techniques to build rapport, entertain your viewers and and most importantly — that have made MILLIONS for my clients and can do the same for you!
Use these subconscious techniques on your landing pages and sales pages for HUGE conversions. Use them in your live and pre-recorded webinars to get INSTANT signups! Use them anywhere you want to keep people watching and compel them to take a specific, desired action.
Specifically designed for small business owners, entrepreneurs and info product marketers and affiliates — this course is for anyone who has a high-ticket offer and knows the power of direct market copywriting.
*NOTE — THIS IS NOT A COURSE TO TEACH YOU THE BASICS OF AUDIO AND VIDEO EDITING. I DO WALK YOU THROUGH ACTUAL VIDEO PROJECTS AND EXPLAIN EACH COMPONENT AND THE STEPS NECESSARY TO IMPLEMENT THEM. THAT SAID, I HAVE PRODUCED 100's OF HOURS OF VIDEO TRAINING ON CAMTASIA, SONY VEGAS, ADOBE PREMIERE, PHOTOSHOP AND MORE — AS MY STUDENT YOU ARE FREE TO ASK ME ANY QUESTIONS RELATED TO VIDEO EDITING. I WILL HELP YOU AND RESPOND VERY QUICKLY.
Buy Sneaky Subconscious VSL Magic today and put the simple strategies to use in your VSL and watch your conversion rates climb like never before! Do it now and see the results for yourself.
target_audience: Marketers, small business owners, entrepreneurs and anyone looking to make a career as a sales video producer.

courses.title: 短影音行銷術，用TikTok幫你賺錢加薪
courses.bio: 給短影音行銷新手最全面的教學
objectives: 如何布局短影音內容行銷趨勢，讓你快速增加影響力
如何打造個人/品牌ip這波潮流並實際應用變現

第四章、零基礎製作短影音: 4-2 零基礎學會電腦剪接(一)

requirements: 開放學習心
保持好奇心
堅持創作心
能上網的手機，加一台電腦更好
courses.description:
疫情關係許多企業受巨大影響，如何運用短影音，打造個人與品牌的網路影響力?讓這波流量變現?
如果你靠買廣告來維持流量，你有沒有想過，當廣告成本越來越貴，你該怎麼辦？
大家都做自媒體、經營社群、搞網路創業，怎麼利用短影音創造不限時間、不限地點持續性商機?


如果10年前認真經營Facebook和Youtube，現在已是百萬粉絲大網紅，但現在進場經營門檻與困難度極高。如果你知道Tiktok儼然成為新一代的Facebook和Youtube，且1~2年內將產生越來越多創作者跟你競爭，你何時要開始?還是2年後再次後悔?


為何Facebook、Instagram、Youtube、Twitter、Line等全球大型社群平台，都開始模仿Tiktok，它已成為短影音趨勢的代名詞?


TikTok是2021年全球下載量最多、收入最高的非遊戲 app，也是首個非Meta集團旗下app，卻突破 30 億全球下載的！
TikTok全球用戶消費金額已達25億美金。自2014年以來，全球只有16個非遊戲app收入超過10億美金。
目前全球TikTok月活躍用戶約10億（不含中國版的抖音）。


全球知名行銷公司Hubspot提出2022行銷趨勢重點:
1.網紅KOL行銷將成為常態策略
2.影音是最熱門的行銷內容形式
3.影音行銷要讓內容簡短
4.Tiktok持續得到更多品牌關注與投資


台灣TikTok用戶已有450萬人，每日平均觀看TikTok 50分鐘，每日平均開tiktok 9次，每月觀看達106億次，每月上傳830萬支影片。
其中13~17歲18%，18~24歲佔33%，25~34歲佔25%，35~44歲16%，45~54歲5%，55歲3%。
台灣Tiktok起步較晚，現在正是入場時機，能享受TikTok的流量紅利與爆發成長。


無論你是短影音創作新人?
自媒體/新媒體運營新手?
想網路創業、網路賺錢、流量變現者?
想提升網路影響力、打造個人品牌?
還是想學習網路行銷或社群/粉絲運營?
請開始學中做、做中學當個Tiktoker，停止當別人影片中的配角，開始成為自己真正的明星!


本課程解決你的那些問題?
1. 解決新人經營短影音的迷失並增加創作信心
2. 解決受疫情影響或跟不上數位行銷與電商發展趨勢，讓你快速增加影響力與營收
3. 解決以為初期要花很多錢買設備和花很多時間學剪接軟體，其實可0成本開始
4. 解決找不到自己的頻道定位、人物角色設定、不會選題、不知道拍什麼，其實有方法能快速找到對標頻道與內容，降低試錯成本
5. 解決作品沒流量、無法漲粉、無法變現的窘境，選對方向、用對方法、找對工具比一個人悶頭苦幹更有效


教學特色
1. 講邏輯，讓學員能通盤運用到各行各業與各平台(包含Tiktok、Facebook、Instagram、Youtube、Line)
2. 談實際案例，讓學員能快速掌握並模仿學習
3. 以變現為目的，太多有流量卻無法變現的頻道暫停營運，沒賺錢難以長久運營，以終為始，一開始就要做對
4. 以自身在兩岸自營與代運營Tiktok與抖音的真實狀況，讓學員避開可能遇到的難點和瓶頸期該怎麼突破

在台灣運營Tiktok，三個月漲粉2萬+，兩個月觀看破53萬，600留言，3萬讚，1千次分享。

Видеомаркетинг на YouTube: Обзор YouTube и возможности для бизнеса
Рекомендации по развитию и ведению канал: Рекомендации по развитию и ведению канала

requirements: Желание изучить основы видеомаркетинга на Youtube
courses.description:
Почему бизнесу стоит начать использовать видеоплатформу YouTube для продвижения в 2022 году?
Во всем мире существует множество социальных платформ, которые нравятся пользователям и пользуются популярностью.
Одной из самых любимых площадок для развлечения и рекламных действий аудитория называет YouTube, и если вы до сих пор не используете его в целях продвижения бизнеса — пора начинать. Почему YouTube считают топовой видеоплатформой для продвижения бизнеса в 2022 году? Во-первых, ним часто пользуются бренды и рекламодатели, которые готовы тратить деньги на рекламу в ютуб. Во-вторых, у YouTube есть ряд преимуществ, которые мы сейчас рассмотрим детальнее.
Преимущества видеоплатформы YouTube для продвижения бизнеса:
Просмотр видео в YouTube доступен для потенциальных пользователей вашего бизнеса с любой точки мира по сети Интернет и с любого устройства.
Бесплатное создание личного или корпоративного канала, возможность рекламирования бренда, подписки на обновления, добавления комментариев и интерактивное взаимодействие с аудиторией.
Эффективная и вовлекающая пользователей реклама. В самом видео или его описании можно добавить гиперссылку на сайт или страницу, продемонстрировать или описать продукт.
Интерактивное взаимодействие и управление контентом.
Дополнительные возможности. Например, поиск видео по похожим запросам, переходы на сайты, повторный просмотр видео, коллекция избранного и т.д.
Мотивация. Рекламные видео и комментарии пользователей способны улучшить понимание продукта и помочь определиться клиенту с покупкой, а бизнесу — принести дополнительные инсайты об аудитории и повысить продажи.
В апреле 2021 года YouTube вошел в пятерку самых посещаемых веб-сайтов в мире. При этом, видеоплатформа заняла второе место с количеством в 21,9 миллиардов посещений, на первом месте только Google — 75,1 млрд посещений.
Больше 2 млрд пользовательской аудитории YouTube — это почти треть всех юзеров Интернета. Представляем вам краткую статистику по сайту YouTube от создателей ресурса:


Каждый месяц YouTube посещает более 1,9 миллиарда авторизованных пользователей. Миллиарды просмотров и более миллиарда часов воспроизведения – такова ежедневная статистика платформы.
Более 70 % времени просмотра приходится на пользователей мобильных устройств.
Платформа YouTube доступна в 91 стране.
Интерфейс YouTube переведен на 80 языков мира.
После прохождения онлайн-курса вы овладеете основами ведения и продвижения YouTube-канала.

Welcome to "YouTube SEO - YouTube Ads Marketing Course - 20 Course in 1" the ultimate guide to mastering YouTube as a powerful marketing platform. Whether you're a content creator, marketer, or business owner, this course will equip you with the tools and knowledge to leverage YouTube for growth, influence, and success.
In this comprehensive YouTube SEO Course, you’ll explore every aspect of YouTube marketing. From setting up your YouTube channel for maximum visibility to mastering YouTube Ads with our playbook, you’ll learn how to attract and engage your target audience effectively.
We’ll delve into live streaming with YouTube Live, a critical tool for real-time engagement, and uncover the secrets to building authority on YouTube, positioning you as a trusted voice in your niche. If you’re aiming to become an influencer, our dedicated module will guide you through every step of the process.
Beyond YouTube, you’ll gain expertise in essential tools like Canva, ClipChamp, and Vyond to create stunning visuals and animations. Learn audio editing with Audacity, content marketing strategies, and advanced WordPress techniques to build a robust online presence.
Additionally, this course will introduce you to cutting-edge AI-powered tools like Jasper for marketing automation and ChatGPT for content creation. You’ll also master the art of creating email funnels with ConvertKit, app marketing, and even messenger marketing with advanced strategies.
By the end of this YouTube SEO & Youtube Marketing course, you’ll have a complete toolkit to not only dominate YouTube but also to create a cohesive, powerful marketing strategy across multiple platforms.

Question:  What is the ultimate purpose of creating video content?  When it’s all said and done and boiled down to its key element, why do: entrepreneurs, YouTubers, business owners, coaches, authors, motivational speakers, performers and anyone else for that matter, create video content?
Hi, I’m Luc Bouchard, and I have produced well over 300 videos (most of which are on YouTube), and I firmly believe that there is only one reason why anyone markets themselves with the power of video and that is to
Influence Behavior
.  By having your audience click like, share your content, subscribe to your YouTube channel, download a document or buying a service or a product from you; are all outcomes of influencing your viewer’s behaviors.
So, I have another question:  If the creation and production of video content to Influence Behavior, how exactly do you do that?  What are the necessary mechanisms in a video to have someone: like, share, subscribe, download or purchase a service or a product?  In my course:  Producing High Performance Video Content: The GPS to loyal audiences; 4 essential mechanisms, I answer just that question.
If you would like to know how to Influence your audiences Behaviours and build a loyal fan base, then enroll in in my course now.
Luc Bouchard

courses.description:
Are you ready to embark on a journey from novice to expert in the world of video production and creation? Look no further! Our comprehensive course, "Video Production and Video Creation from Beginners to Experts," is designed to empower you with the skills and knowledge you need to create stunning videos for a variety of platforms and purposes. Whether you're a content creator, educator, business professional, or simply someone who loves making videos, this course is your gateway to mastering the art of video creation.


THE GOAL OF THIS COURSE:


In this course, we aim to provide you with the tools and expertise necessary to become a proficient video creator and producer. Our primary objectives are:


Equip you with the skills to create high-quality screen recording tutorial videos.
Teach you the art of styling videos using OBS Studio, catering to various preferences and platforms.
Enable you to craft engaging spokesperson videos and talking head videos using a range of equipment, including mobile devices, webcams, and DSLR cameras.
Guide you in the creation of vertical videos optimized for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.
Empower you to set up, configure, and master Zoom for online meetings and presentations.
Familiarize you with essential tools and techniques, including webcam usage, screen recording, microphone selection, DSLR camera operation, PowerPoint presentations, green screen chroma key, whiteboard presentations, and screen annotation, to produce captivating videos.
Provide you with the skills to edit and enhance your videos, as well as perfect your audio quality using popular software like Kinemaster, Filmora 12, Shotcut, Audacity, Adobe Speech Enhancer, AI Acoustics Noise Remover, and more.


WHY IS THIS COURSE DIFFERENT THAN OTHER COURSES:


What sets this course apart is the comprehensive approach we take towards video production and creation. Here's why this course is unique:


Holistic Approach: We cover a wide array of video creation techniques, including screen recording, spokesperson videos, and vertical video production, all in one course.
Extensive Software Knowledge: You'll gain expertise in popular video editing and sound editing software to refine your video output.
Practical Learning: Through hands-on tutorials and real-world examples, you'll gain practical skills that you can apply immediately.
Adaptability: Learn to create videos using a variety of equipment and for different platforms, making you a versatile video creator.


WHAT TOPICS ARE COVERED INSIDE THIS COURSE:


This course covers a vast array of topics, including:


Setting up and configuring OBS Studio for video styling.
Creating spokesperson and talking head videos with mobile devices, webcams, and DSLR cameras.
Crafting vertical videos tailored for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.
Mastering Zoom for online meetings and presentations.
Utilizing webcam, screen recording, microphones, DSLR cameras, PowerPoint presentations, green screen chroma key, whiteboard presentations, and screen annotation for engaging video creation.
Editing and enhancing videos with software like Kinemaster, Filmora 12, Shotcut, and perfecting audio quality with Audacity, Adobe Speech Enhancer, AI Acoustics Noise Remover, and more.


WHY IS THIS COURSE USEFUL:


This course is invaluable because it equips you with practical skills and knowledge that can be applied to various aspects of your personal and professional life:


Enhance your content creation skills, whether you're a YouTuber, social media influencer, or educator.
Improve your online meeting and presentation abilities, making you a more effective communicator in the virtual world.
Gain a competitive edge in the job market by acquiring video production skills that are in high demand across industries.
Elevate your creativity and storytelling capabilities, allowing you to stand out in a crowded digital landscape.


Don't miss this opportunity to become a video creation and production expert. Enroll in our course today and unlock your potential to create stunning, engaging videos that captivate your audience.
