courses.description: Sosyal medyalarda içerik üretmek artık neredeyse herkesin çok basit bir şekilde yapabileceği bir uğraş oldu bu sebeple de sosyal medya algoritmaları içerikleri denetlemede sürekli olarak güncelleniyor ve içerikler sıkı bir şekilde yapay zeka tarafından denetleniyor. Sosyal medyada yalnızca verimli ve başarılı içerikler üretebilen insanlar sürekli olarak "Keşfete" düşerek keşfediliyor bu kurstaki amacımızda tam olarak verimli ve keşfete uygun içerikler üretmek diğerlerinden öne çıkmak. Kurs boyunca sosyal medya yönetimi ve içerik üretimi hakkında bilgileri öğrenerek bizi başarıya ulaştıracak tüm adımlara değineceğiz kurs boyunca sosyal medyada içerik üretirken kullandığım araçları ve bu araçları nasıl kullanarak videolarımın etkileşimini artırdığımı sizlere göstereceğim. En temelden başlayarak uzmanlığa bir gelişim izleyeceğimiz bu kursta içerik üretimi yaparken Canva eğitimi, Photoshop eğitimi, Capcut eğitimi, Adobe Express eğitimi, Camera Raw eğitimi, profesyonel canlı yayın açma eğitimi ve daha bir çok eğitimi beraberinde alacaksınız. Bu eğitim sayesinde Instagram içerik üretimi eğitimi, TikTok içerik üretimi, Shorts içerik üretimi ya da e-ticaret web sitesi içerik üretimi yapabilirsiniz. Kurs boyunca aynı zamanda yapay zeka araç gereçlerini de kullanarak yapay zeka ile içerik üretme, yapay zeka ile görsel üretme ve chatgpt prompt mühendisliği gibi konulardan kritik noktaları da işliyoruz. Öğrendiğiniz bilgileri günlük hayatınızda uygulayarak hayatınızı kolaylaştırabilirsiniz. Profesyonel görsel düzenleme ve profesyonel video düzenleme işlemlerini rahatlıkla yapabilecek uzmanlığa geldikten sonra sosyal medya içerik üretimiyle para kazanma düzeyine geleceksiniz. Kurs içerisinde belirtilen stratejiler ile canva ile para kazanma yöntemlerini öğreneceksiniz aynı zamanda ürettiğiniz şablonları satarak ya da diğer insanlara pazarlayarak bu iş üzerinden para kazanabilirsiniz. Kursu tamamen bitirdikten sonra kendinizin veya diğer insanların sosyal medya yönetimini, sosyal medya içerik üretimini rahatlıkla yapabilirsiniz. Önemli uygulanması gereken tüm stratejileri kurs içerisinde bulabilirsiniz bu sayede sosyal medyada içerik üreterek çok hızlı yükselebilirsiniz.

courses.title: Green Screen Challenge! Your Own Green Screen Home Studio
courses.bio: Create Stunning Green Screen Videos and Virtual Studios Using Premiere Pro or FREE Green Screen Editing Software!
objectives: You will discover how to produce broadcast quality videos in your own home using “green screen “ or “chromakey” technology.
You'll also learn how to use a teleprompter, lighting in detail and also the choices of cameras you can use, using real and virtual furniture, plus how to get the best sound on the videos.

You'll discover how to “key” in 3 editing programs, Adobe Premiere Pro, the industry standard software used by major broadcasters, as well as how to use green screen two completely free software programs, DaVinci Resolve and Hit Film Express.

How to deal with “difficult” keying situations, adding music for certain videos and also a look at the wide variety of realistic “virtual studios” that can be downloaded – many for free – from the internet.
And also how to export the edited video in various formats for social media as well as HD broadcast use.

Introduction: THE KIT YOU NEED - THE GREEN SCREEN MATERIAL
WHAT CAMERA CAN YOU USE FOR GREEN SCREEN OR CHROMAKEY?
SETTING UP AND USING THE TELEPROMPTER
GREEN SCREEN VIDEO EDITING IN PREMIERE PRO CC
ADDING A FOREGROUND DESK AND HOW TO ZOOM IN
WORKING WITH A VIRTUAL GREEN SCREEN MONITOR
ANOTHER KEYING EXAMPLE & DEALING WITH SOUND - PART ONE
ANOTHER KEYING EXAMPLE & DEALING WITH SOUND - PART TWO
GREEN SCREEN VIDEO EDITING WITH FREE GREEN SCREEN SOFTWARE
GREEN SCREEN VIDEO EDITING WITH ANOTHER FREE GREEN SCREEN SOFTWARE
ADDING CAPTIONS AND TITLES IN BOTH PREMIERE PRO AND DAVINCI RESOLVE
CHOOSING AND ADDING MUSIC IN BOTH PREMIERE PRO AND DAVINCI RESOLVE
RENDERING AND EXPORTING YOUR VIDEOS IN BOTH PREMIERE PRO AND DAVINCI RESOLVE
TOP 10 TIPS FOR GREAT GREEN SCREEN VIDEOS!

requirements: You will need a willingness to learn but every section is well structured so that the knowledge is put across very well.
It helps but not essential if you have a general knowledge video and audio recording and know the basics of video editing.
The computer required to run the software featured needs to have at least 16GB of Ram and be fast enough for video editing, ideally with a Windows i7 chip at least or Mac equivalent.
courses.description:
In this Green Screen Course you'll learn everything you need to create your own professional high quality green screen videos and virtual studio sets from the comfort of your own home even if you have limited space!
You can appear to be filming from anywhere in the World even if you're just sat in front of your camera within a cramped spare room surrounded by junk...no one will know! :)

You'll see exactly how I turn a small room into a TV broadcasting studio using basic equipment and even FREE video editing software!

You'll discover;


• What is Chromakey or “Green Screen technology” and what are Virtual Studios?
• The importance of choosing the right kind of screen for the background.
• Lighting for green screen, using inexpensive, semi-professional LED studio lights.
• How to avoid shadows which affect correct keying and also how to minimise “green spill” on the back or the hair of the presenter.
• Making sure the audio quality matches the visuals.
• Adding in foreground desks, both real and virtual.
• Recording to camera using a teleprompter in the home studio, using either semi-pro software or even a tablet with Microsoft Word.
• Video editing green screen work in 3 programs, one chargeable and two completely free.
• Adding music and how to key difficult situations.
• Exporting for HD broadcast use or social media use.

courses.description: This is the most comprehensive Web Video Production course to follow up with the free overview. WIN 'EM OVER WITH WEB VIDEO PART 2: Stand Out and Move Up in Search Engine Results with Effective Web Video (HOW TO PREVENT A RAIN OUT ON YOUR FIELD OF DREAMS WITH WEB VIDEO):  This is a beginner-friendly course for busy professionals who want to learn how to create effective web video AND boost their search engine optimization efforts. Students will learn the basics of web video production and search engine optimization. This course provides video, screen records, and sample files for busy professionals who want the most essential information presented to them in a manner that can be quickly and easily digested and applied in under a half day (4 hours). After successful completion, students will learn video production and SEO for Video basics. The course instructor is Kamala Appel, aka "the key" in KEA Productions. She has produced numerous documentary-style web videos for small business owners and non-profit organizations since 2002. Ms. Appel worked in Hollywood in licensing at Universal Studios and Business Affairs at International Creative Management (ICM) and in programming at the Sundance Film Festival. She is a graduate of Yale University and where earned a BA in American Studies with a concentration in Film Studies and USC's School of Cinema-Television, now Cinematic Arts, where she earned her Master's degree.  She is also a certified SEO Practitioner. "What I love most about producing videos for small business owners and nonprofits is the opportunity to work with passionate professionals who are experts in their field. I feel very fortunate to be able to use my skills as a visual storyteller to help others. Unfortunately, I am not able to help every worthy business owner out there because not everyone can afford to hire a professional like myself to produce a video for them.  That is why I decided to develop a course that could empower more businesses, start ups, and nonprofits compete and share their passion with the world." Ms. Appel has been a faculty member at a number of accredited offline colleges throughout the State of California.  As an experienced film and multimedia instructor, she takes into consideration the three main learning styles: aural (listening- you can listen to the modules), visual (you can watch the videos with images that will hopefully stay with you), and kinetic (movement- you can exercise your kinetic learning style by taking notes and doing the quizzes). In addition to the modules or short training videos, there are samples and screen recordings * (Including FinalCut Pro and After FX demos) for all three stages: pre-production or planning, production or shooting, and post-production or editing; so that you can follow along throughout the process. To further your learning experience, there is an interactive coaching program that complements the e-learning course and supplementary materials. During the coaching calls we will delve more deeply into the materials with scenarios and go over the quizzes. Questions can be answered live and students can participate in interviews with other industry experts. As someone who has purchased this Web Video Production course, you get your first month's membership for free. So if you are a busy professional and you want to be able to have access to the information you need to take your business or organization to the next level with web video and SEO for video basics, then this is the course for you. If you want to positively persuade your target audience, your bottom line, and boost your SEO efforts, then again, this course is for you. Again, this is an accelerated course so that you can get through the materials in a manageable way while trying to stay sane throughout your busy life. Please note: The first several video modules are free to allow you to preview the style. These opening videos give students a chance to learn some history and the general philosophy that will influence the core content. The "meat" of the course is only available to paid subscribers who want to invest further in their online marketing efforts. 每一个想在这两个平台上获客的企业都会遇到这样的问题：这种广告形式适合我们公司吗？怎么快速上手？有哪些关键点？有哪些容易犯的错误？怎样快速提升效果？

7年深耕广告投放，帮助数百家企业通过付费流量提升企业收入。

courses.description:
Create high-quality marketing videos with just your smartphone—no experience or expensive gear needed!


Video marketing is one of the most powerful tools for small businesses, but getting started can feel overwhelming. Many business owners struggle with what to create, how to shoot, and how to make video work for their business. That’s why I created this step-by-step blueprint—to demystify video marketing and give you a clear path to success.


Enroll now and receive our Quick-Start Blueprint for FREE!


What You’ll Learn:
Plan Videos That Drive Results – Develop a clear video strategy, set goals, and create content your audience will love.
Shoot Videos on Your Smartphone – Master lighting, sound, and composition to create professional-looking videos.
Speak With Confidence on Camera – Overcome nerves and present your brand with clarity and authenticity.
Edit & Polish Videos Fast – Learn simple, effective editing techniques to create polished, professional content.
Boost Your Views & Engagement – Optimize for social media, SEO, and email marketing to maximize reach.
Turn Viewers Into Customers – Use proven strategies to convert video engagement into sales and business growth.
Why This Course?
Unlike other courses that focus only on theory, this is a hands-on, step-by-step system designed specifically for small business owners who want to see real results.
Designed for Beginners – No prior video experience needed.
Actionable & Practical – Follow a proven process with easy-to-apply lessons.
Smartphone Friendly – No fancy equipment required—just use what you already have.
By the end of this course, you’ll have a repeatable video marketing system that attracts customers and drives sales—without stress or guesswork.

requirements: Não há pré-requisitos ou experiência prévia necessária para fazer este curso. Se você é um iniciante completo ou alguém com alguma experiência em criação de vídeos, este curso foi projetado para ser acessível a todos.
courses.description:
InVideo AI - Criação de Vídeos com IA: Transforme Ideias em Vídeos Impressionantes e Profissionais em Minutos!
Imagine poder pegar qualquer ideia — por mais complexa ou criativa que seja — e transformá-la em um vídeo impressionante, com qualidade profissional, em apenas alguns minutos. Sem experiência prévia, sem habilidades em programação, sem software caro — apenas você e o poder da Inteligência Artificial ao seu alcance.
Bem-vindo ao futuro da criação de vídeos. Bem-vindo ao "Master InVideo AI."
Por que este curso?
No mundo digital acelerado de hoje, o vídeo é rei. Seja você um criador de conteúdo, um profissional de marketing digital, um pequeno empresário ou apenas alguém com uma mensagem para compartilhar, o vídeo é a maneira mais poderosa de engajar, informar e inspirar seu público.
Mas sejamos sinceros — criar vídeos de alta qualidade pode ser demorado, caro e frustrante. Até agora.
Com o InVideo AI, o jogo mudou. Esta ferramenta revolucionária, alimentada por IA, permite que você crie vídeos deslumbrantes de maneira rápida e sem esforço. E neste curso, vou mostrar exatamente como aproveitar essa tecnologia para dar vida às suas ideias como nunca antes.
O que você aprenderá
No "Master InVideo AI", você descobrirá:
Os fundamentos do InVideo AI: Mergulhe no mundo da criação de vídeos com IA e entenda como essa ferramenta pode transformar sua estratégia de conteúdo.
Criando vídeos do zero: Aprenda a pegar uma ideia simples e transformá-la em um vídeo totalmente produzido usando o InVideo AI — completo com animações, transições e efeitos.
Técnicas avançadas de edição: Domine a clonagem de voz, dublagem multilíngue e muito mais para fazer seus vídeos se destacarem.
Storytelling com IA: Use ChatGPT e outras ferramentas de IA para roteirizar, criar storyboards e desenvolver narrativas envolventes que ressoam com seu público.
Produzindo vídeos profissionais em minutos: Desde vídeos para YouTube sem rosto até conteúdos explicativos envolventes, você aprenderá a criar vários tipos de vídeos de forma rápida e eficiente.
O que você obterá ao final do curso
Ao final deste curso, você será capaz de:
Criar vídeos profissionais instantaneamente: Produza vídeos de alta qualidade, com acabamento polido, em uma fração do tempo dos métodos tradicionais.
Economizar tempo e dinheiro: Elimine a necessidade de softwares caros, editores profissionais e horas de trabalho manual.
Expandir seu conjunto de habilidades: Adquira habilidades valiosas em IA e edição de vídeos que o diferenciarão no espaço digital.
Aumentar o engajamento: Crie vídeos que cativam seu público, impulsionam o engajamento e aumentam as conversões.
Fortalecer sua marca: Estabeleça uma presença online poderosa com conteúdos que refletem a qualidade e o profissionalismo da sua marca.
Alcançar um público global: Use dublagem multilíngue e ferramentas de IA para criar conteúdos que atraem públicos em todo o mundo.
Para quem é este curso?
Este curso é perfeito para:
Criadores de Conteúdo que querem agilizar o processo de produção de vídeos e criar mais conteúdo em menos tempo.
Profissionais de Marketing Digital que desejam melhorar o desempenho de suas campanhas com vídeos de alta conversão.
Pequenos Empresários que precisam criar vídeos de marketing profissionais sem gastar muito.
Qualquer pessoa que queira dominar a arte da criação de vídeos com IA, independentemente da experiência ou habilidades técnicas.
Seu Instrutor
Olá, eu sou Diego Davila. Nos últimos 10 anos, ajudei mais de 1 milhão de alunos a usar o poder da IA e do Marketing Digital para expandir seus negócios e aumentar suas vendas.
Inscreva-se agora — O futuro da criação de vídeos espera por você!
Não deixe que a complexidade da criação de vídeos o impeça de avançar. Com o InVideo AI, você tem o poder de criar vídeos impressionantes e profissionais em minutos. Seja para expandir seu negócio, fortalecer sua marca ou simplesmente compartilhar sua mensagem com o mundo, este curso fornecerá as ferramentas e o conhecimento de que você precisa para ter sucesso.
Inscreva-se agora e junte-se ao futuro da criação de vídeos. Sua jornada para dominar o conteúdo de vídeo impulsionado por IA começa aqui!
Diego Davila
target_audience: Iniciantes Completos - Se você nunca criou um vídeo antes, este curso irá guiá-lo passo a passo por todo o processo usando ferramentas de IA.
Criadores de Conteúdo - Procurando otimizar seu processo de produção de vídeos e criar mais conteúdo em menos tempo? Este curso ensinará como aproveitar a IA para aumentar sua eficiência.
Profissionais de Marketing Digital - Melhore suas campanhas com vídeos de alta conversão criados sem esforço usando o InVideo AI, sem precisar de um editor de vídeo profissional.
Pequenos Empresários - Crie vídeos de marketing profissionais sem a necessidade de softwares caros ou de contratar uma equipe de produção.

courses.title: Секретная формула продающего видео на миллион!
courses.bio: Как с помощью секретной формулы и продвинутых технологий, создать профессиональное продающее видео, без сложных программ

requirements: Интернет и компьютер
courses.description:
Продающее видео – это незаменимый инструмент для увеличения прибыли и если вы хотите научиться продавать через видео свои товары и услуги, то этот бесплатный практикум для вас.
Данный практикум отлично подойдем тем, кто  хочет делать продажи, без вебинаров, личных консультаций и постоянного прогрева по базе подписчиков.
Из бесплатного практикума вы узнаете о продающей формуле и продвинутых технологий, которые позволяет вам в течении часа, создать продающее видео, быстро и качественно, без сложных программ, таких как After Effects и Premium Pro.
По окончанию бесплатного практикума, вы получите секретную форму, быстрого написания продающего сценария для рекламного ролика. А также узнаете о современных технологиях, быстрого и профессионального создания рекламных роликов для любой ниши, которые не уступают по уровню продакшн студий.
Умение создавать профессиональные продающие видео на миллион, позволит предпринимателям и авторам курсов, с экономить на заказах роликов от 10 000 рублей за 1 минуту. Фрилансеры за свои услуги повысят чеки на заказы, а маркетологам поднимут в десятки раз свои продажи.
Практикум состоит из трех видеоуроков и домашних заданий. Практические задания помогут закрепить учебный материал. Вы можете выполнять их по своему желанию.  Но те кто, будет выполнять домашнее задания, будут начисляться бонусные рубли, в обмен на которые  на специальных условиях вы получите от меня шикарный подарок!
target_audience: Маркетологам: специалист, который создает стратегию продвижения продуктов и услуг, чтобы увеличить продажи и доход компании
SMM-менеджерам: специалист по продвижению товаров, услуг и бренда в социальных сетях.
Фрилансерам: люди, которые работаю на себя, создавая ролики на заказ
MLM: сетевики прямых продаж, при которой бренд не ждёт, пока клиент заинтересуется товаром и совершит покупку, а привлекает независимых дистрибьюторов для поиска потребителей
Контент-менеджерам: сотрудник компании, который осуществляет разработку и публикацию контента, направленного на информирование и развлечение аудитории
Предпринимателям: лица, имеющее своё дело в товарном бизнесе и инфобизнесе
Арбитражникам:  специалист, который продвигает товары и услуги за вознаграждение
Видеографам: это специалист, который выполняет все работы с момента съёмки, включая постановку звука и света, до изготовления презентационного видеоролика

courses.bio: Mac限定のスクリーンキャストツールであるScreenFlow8（スクリーンフロー）はとても動作が軽く撮影から編集、書き出しまでスムーズに行える非常に優れたツールです。Macを使っている方はScreenFlowがもっともオススメです。

courses.description:
Udemy講師になりたい方やオンラインスクールのコンテンツをスクリーンキャスト形式で撮影したい方はMacのScreenFlow8がオススメです。
シンプルな編集しかできませんが、その分動作が軽く素早く撮影、編集、書き出しをしたい方は気にいるはずです。
Camtasiaも悪くはないのですが、色々たくさんの機能がある分少し動作が遅いのがネックになります。
なので、色々な編集をがっつりやりたい人であれば、Camtasiaがいいかもしれませんが、シンプルな編集でともかく動画コンテンツを量産したい方はScreenFlow8を使うことでかなりの時間的節約になります。
僕はスライド形式のスクリーンキャスト撮影はScreenFlow8で撮影するようにしてどんどん動画コンテンツを作って行きます。
だから、かなりのスピードでコースを出せているんです。
これは、間違いなくScreenFlow8のおかげです。
あなたもこのコースでScreenFlow8の使い方をマスターして質の高いコンテンツ制作に励んでください。
それでは、コースの中でお会いしましょう。

requirements: 유튜브 채널의 빠른 성장과 사업 구축, 또는
courses.description:
본 강의의 강사가 99% 자동화 유튜브 채널을 통해 300만 뷰 이상을 달성하여 불로소득을 발생시킨 방법
개인 브랜드를 성장시켜 리드와 매출을 만들어 큰 수익을 창출한 방법
제가 유튜브에서 성공할 수 있도록 도와주고, 제가 배우고 깨닫는 데에 수 년이 걸렸던 모든 팁을 대방출 합니다. 여러분은 더욱 높은 비즈니스 목표 달성을 도와줄 제 조언을 사용하여 더욱 높은 비즈니스 목표를 달성하실 수 있을 겁니다. 지금 바로 강의에 등록하신 후, 오늘부터 유튜브 성공을 위해 저와 함께 하세요.


[유튜브의 핫한 홍보 수단: ‘유튜브 라이브’ 섹션 추가]
저는 최근 ‘유튜브 라이브‘ 섹션을 추가했습니다. 유튜브 라이브는 실시간으로 시청자들에게 다가가서 사업과 제품을 홍보할 수 있도록 가장 최근 등장한 멋진 방식입니다.


[최근 개선된 ‘유튜브 광고‘ 섹션]
유튜브 광고는 새로운 영상이나 채널을 홍보할 수 있는 가장 완벽하고 저렴한 방법입니다. 유튜브 광고가 없다면, 유튜브 대다수는 인플루언서나 프리랜서를 고용해야 할 겁니다. 즉, 유튜브 광고는 더 많은 조회수를 확보할 수 있는 더 저렴하고 합법적인 솔루션이죠.
저는 여러분들께 다양한 종류의 유튜브 광고와 여러 상황에서 이 광고들을 적용할 때의 장, 단점을 알려드릴 겁니다. 또, 한 번 재생할 때마다 발생하는 돈을 벌 수 있도록 조회수를 확보할 수 있는 방법도 알려드릴 겁니다. 이 돈을 위해 광고를 거는 비용은 전체적으로 보았을 때 더 저렴합니다. 결국 영상을 한 번 본 사람들이 구독자가 되어 영상을 더 많이 재생할 테니까요. 그렇게 되면 조회수 당 벌 수 있는 돈이 일정 평균에 이르게 되고 결국 이러한 방식으로 유튜브 광고를 통해 여러분의 유튜브 채널을 키울 수 있는 것이죠.


[최근 추가된 ‘유튜브 수익창출’ 섹션]
저는 여러 가지 유튜브 수익 창출 전략을 추가하였고, 향후 훨씬 더 많은 전략을 추가할 계획입니다.


[‘유튜버’ 강사의 강의가 특별한 이유]
저는 15년 이상 사업가로 활동하며 1,000명 이상의 기업가들을 코칭하고 10만 명 이상의 학생들을 가르친 경력이 있습니다.
수 년 간 제 개인 채널에 대한 유튜브 마케팅을 진행하여 영상 조회수 300만 회 이상, 구독 자 수 3만 명 이상을 달성했습니다. 이를 통해 유튜브에서 수익을 창출하기도 했고요. 이건 여러분들도 하실 수 있습니다. 저는 제 일을 통해 전세계 모든 국가에 사는 이들의 삶을 개선하면서 수백 만 명의 기업가들에게 긍정적인 영향을 주었으며, 그 과정에서 10만, 100만 개 이상의 사업체를 만드는 데에 영향을 주었습니다. 그리고 이제는, 여러분들을 돕고 싶습니다.


[수강생만을 위한 보너스]
* 수많은 추가 무료 자료들과 다운로드 가능한 워크시트 및 활동들이 본 강의를 더욱 가치 있는 ‘대화형’ 강의로 만들어 줄 것입니다.
* 완강 후 제 페이스북 커뮤니티에 개인적으로 초대해 드리겠습니다.
* 완강 후 제 50가지 사업 성공 스킬을 공유하도록 하겠습니다.


[빠르게 응답하고 학생들을 신경 쓰는 강사: 어디서도 볼 수 없는 학생 지원]
질문이 있으실 때마다 제가 항상 여기 대기하고 있다는 걸 기억하세요! 저는 24시간 내로 학생들의 질문 중 99%에 대한 답변을 완료하고 있습니다. 많은 학생들이 응답이 없는 선생님들에 대해 이야기하곤 하죠. 하지만, 저는 다음과 같은 이유로 빠르게 응답해 줍니다.
1) 제 학생들을 신경 쓰고,
2) 학생들이 이 강의에서 얻을 수 있는 수익을 모두 얻어갈 수 있기를 바라기 때문이죠.


**강의를 들으시고 강의와 관련하여 궁금하신 점은 무엇이든 Q&A에 남기실 수 있지만, 꼭 영어로 내용을 남겨 주세요. 그래야 상세한 답변을 드릴 수 있습니다. :)


[완강 후 수료증 수여]
본 유튜브 강의를 100% 완강하실 경우, 유데미에서 보낸 수료증을 이메일을 통해 받아 보실 수 있는데요. 이 수료증을 유튜브 전문 기술의 증거이자, 일정 시간 동안 진행된 유튜브 마케팅 강의를 완강했다는 증거로 제시하실 수 있습니다. 이를 통해 유튜브 마케팅 프리랜서로서의 고용 기회를 얻기 더 쉬워질 것입니다.


[30일 이내 환불 보장]
본 유튜브 마케팅 강의는 유데미에서 지원하는 ‘무조건 30일 이내 환불을 보장’합니다. 보장 ‘제도’가 있기는 하지만, 제가 다른 수 천 명의 학생들에게 했던 것과 같이 여러분들이 유튜브 마케팅을 성공적으로 학습하실 수 있도록 제 개인적으로도 보장하겠습니다.


지금 바로 수강 신청하여, 여러분의 미래에 투자하세요.


- Alex
target_audience: 유튜브에서 브랜드를 만들어 선두에 서고자 하는 사업가들
유튜브 SEO, 유튜브 광고, 영상 만들기에 관심을 가지고 있는 열정 가득한 유튜브 예비 스타들

objectives: Video Creation to Video editing Mastery

What is Camtasia? Features & Use Cases
Recording Your Screen & Webcam: Tips for Clear Audio and Voiceovers

requirements: A computer (Windows or Mac) with internet access
Camtasia (free trial or licensed version) installed
Headphones and microphone (optional but recommended for better audio)
Enthusiasm to create and edit engaging videos!
courses.description:
Master Camtasia: Complete Video Editing for Beginners to Pro is a comprehensive course designed to take you from a complete beginner to a confident video editor using Camtasia. Whether you want to create engaging tutorials, professional training videos, or polished YouTube content, this course covers everything you need.
In this course, you will learn:
How to set up Camtasia and understand its interface for efficient editing
The step-by-step process to record your screen, webcam, and audio simultaneously
Essential video editing skills including trimming, splitting, adding transitions, and annotations
How to enhance your videos with zoom, pan effects, cursor highlights, and callouts
Techniques to improve audio quality by removing noise and adding voiceovers or background music
The use of templates and libraries to speed up your workflow
Best practices for exporting videos in high-quality formats suitable for platforms like YouTube, Udemy, or business presentations
This course is suitable for anyone interested in video editing regardless of prior experience. By the end, you will be able to create professional-looking videos that captivate your audience and communicate your message clearly.
You will also receive practical tips and tricks lessons on optimizing your editing process, avoiding common mistakes.
Start your journey to mastering video editing with Camtasia today!
target_audience: Beginners who want to learn video editing using Camtasia
Educators and trainers creating tutorial or e-learning content

Freelancers and marketers making promotional or explainer videos

Anyone who wants to produce high-quality screen recordings with ease

courses.title: Mobile Video Workshop with a former BBC ITV reporter
courses.bio: Learn the skills to increase your reach and engagement on social media
requirements: Students will need a mobile phone device - Android or iOS
The course has entire voice over presentation so students do not need to be able to read
Students need to download KineMaster, the free version with the watermark is fine for training purposes purposes
Students need to download BIGVU, the free version with the watermark is fine for training purposes
courses.description:
Anna Brees worked as a reporter and presenter for the BBC and ITV for ten years. In this first module she covers EVERYTHING you need to know to start creating professional quality video on your mobile device.
Anna will guide you through the whole process - from filming, editing, presenting and then finally broadcasting to your chosen social media platform.
Anna will invite you to a closed Facebook group, where you can post your video for feedback and support following the course, with the opportunity for it to be shared to my 300k followers!
This course will give your video the professional lift to make it stand out.


Landscape, Square or Portrait Is your video for a new audience on the grazing news feed? This is where approx. 83% of content is watched with the sound off. So your best format might be square, short-form video with subtitles. If it is for an already engaged audience for example on YouTube or Vimeo, an online course or for your website – landscape and long form is a better format.


Headline, top shot and story The three essentials to get people watching your content. The headline (also called the text introduction), the very first shot (thumbnail) and the story - hook them in and keep them watching.


Where is the Story? How to tell a story from beginning to end and keep your audience watching.


Sound Good quality audio is essential, we look at how you can achieve it with or without a microphone


Lighting & Stabilisation How to use natural light indoors and outdoors, and ways of keeping your shots steady with and without equipment such as selfie sticks and tripods.


Three shot sequence We look at the three types of shots you need, (wide, mid and close ups) along with looking out for those magic moments, if they capture your eye, they will capture your audience’s too.


Editing KineMaster The basics of the editing app KineMaster, trimming and moving shots, adding voice over and layering.


Subtitles & Autocue The quickest way to add subtitles to your video at speed and on location via your mobile. We learn how to be authentic when we present and to do it with confidence and energy.


Live Broadcasting How to make it engaging - working on your location and having interviewees lined up.


Pick a format Which one suits you best? A piece to camera with layers, the As-live, news package or square story-telling video.
target_audience: Anyone working in marketing, communications or PR
Business owners who do their own marketing
Influencers and Thought Leaders
Journalists
Content creators wanting to improve their mobile video skills
Hobby content creators wanting to share personal videos with family and friends

Sales Skills on video can be your secret advantage. Imagine thousands of people watching your sales presentation every day, through the power of online video. You can spread your sales message, with emotion and confidence, using the force of online video and proper sales skills. Selling through talking head video used to be reserved for Fortune 500 CEOs, US Presidents and Hollywood celebrities. Now, thanks to low-cost video production and distribution, you can use your sales skills to pitch your products and services to a worldwide market on the web.
And you can look and sound great, confident and memorable with enhanced sales skills!
You will learn how to use digital video and YouTube to communicate more effectively to your customers and prospects. Video can be the ultimate "sales" tool when it allows you to be fully responsive to customer/prospect concerns. This course will give you practical how-to tips on how to make simple, information packed videos for your website, YouTube channel, sales proposals, client communication and training tools.
Why waste one more day giving average sales presentations when you could be delivering outstanding, video-based, sales presentations?
There is a 100% Money-Back Guarantee for this sales skills course. And the instructor also provides an enhanced guarantee.

Here is what Udemy students say about this course:
"This is a really good experience in my life! Thanks for your advice." Lahiru Nilmal
"Yeah, really I was opened to some certain things about sales. Your customers need to see you speak to make some sales. It's not about audios all the time. Make a simple video of yourself" Ezeh James Chidubem

courses.title: How to Make Scalable Ad Creative for Paid Social (ex. Meta)
courses.bio: Learn the secrets to high performing ad creative
objectives: Learn the Winning Ad Formula for Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, and Tiktok Video Ads
How to Produce Twice the Ad Creative in Half the Time with Iterations
How to Learn and Understand Video Ad Data
How to make the Data-to-Creative Connection For Constant Improvement
requirements: Basic Video Editing Skills
courses.description:
Have someone film a selfie video of their experience with your product and then run that as your ad...right? WRONG! Please don't do that. You will get terrible results. This course will teach you how to make winning ad creative for Facebook, Instagram, Tiktok, Youtube, and more. Many advertisers view winning ad creative as a guessing game. Just throw whatever videos you have at the wall and see what sticks. This couldn't be further from the truth. Following an ad formula that is proven to work, you will learn how to use UGC style footage to make creative that converts - consistently. The timing, pacing, messaging, and all the other important elements that make up a good UGC ad will be broken down and made simple for you. This winning ad formula and editing method was developed by professional Performance Creative Director, Adam Frogley and in collaboration with some of the top marketing minds in the world. We will cover all topics such as:


• Where to start and how to do creative research
• How to make ads that don't look like ads
• The Winning Ad Creative Formula
• Data-to-creative connection
• Organization and workflows
• and more!

You will learn how to create, use, and re-use User Generated Content in multiple ways. UGC can be a major source of new revenue as it is applied to make your ads feel authentic and real. By the end of this course, you will be able to stay organized and efficient while you pump out winning UGC style ads consistently.
target_audience: This course is intended for Media Buyers, Marketing Directors, Video Editors and Digital Marketing Professionals who want to learn how to make high performing UGC-Style Video Ads

objectives: 对国际抖音TikTok和跨境电商有清晰的了解，掌握国际商业趋势，判断全球电商机会点
明确做TikTok和跨境电商需要做好哪些准备，并帮助自己判断是否适合来做TikTok
学习做TikTok所需的核心能力，以及具体课落地的提升实操方法
拥有自己的TikTok账号，并且拥有TikTok的基础理解与实操能力，掌握商业变现闭环

TikTok为什么值得做: 兴趣电商与搜索电商的差别
兴趣电商为什么会抢占搜索电商的份额
国内抖音兴趣电商背后的逻辑
TikTok五力模型: 五力模型的运用与自测

requirements: 零基础学员亦可
courses.description:
国际抖音TikTok在海外风靡，跨境电商也越来越被国内的商家关注。但是由于国家背景、文化、购物习惯、语言、物流、政策等问题，很多人想要入局TikTok和跨境电商却无从下手。也因为这些原因，很多团队频频踩坑，不仅没有挣到钱，还损失惨重。

courses.description:
Lerne YouTube SEO wie ein Profi: Dein Weg zu mehr Sichtbarkeit, Klicks und Abonnenten!
Du möchtest auf YouTube durchstarten, aber dein Kanal bleibt unsichtbar? Egal wie gut dein Content ist – ohne die richtige SEO-Strategie bleibt dein Erfolg aus. Mit meinem YouTube SEO Videokurs knacken wir gemeinsam den Algorithmus, bringen deine Videos auf die Top-Positionen und machen deinen Kanal zum Publikumsmagneten.


Das erwartet dich in meinem YouTube SEO Videokurs:
Modul 1: Einführung in YouTube SEO
Bevor wir richtig loslegen, legen wir das Fundament: Was steckt hinter YouTube SEO, und warum ist es der Schlüssel zu deinem Erfolg? Lerne, wie der YouTube-Algorithmus wirklich tickt und wie du ihn zu deinem Vorteil nutzt.
1.1 Was ist YouTube SEO?
Der Schlüssel zu organischer Reichweite und langfristigem Erfolg – verständlich erklärt.
1.2 So funktioniert der YouTube-Algorithmus
Die unsichtbaren Regeln, die entscheiden, ob dein Video viral geht oder in der Versenkung verschwindet.


Modul 2: Keyword-Recherche für YouTube
Das richtige Keyword kann über Erfolg oder Misserfolg deines Videos entscheiden. Ich zeige dir, wie du Themen findest, die wirklich gesucht werden, und wie du sie clever einsetzt.
2.1 Identifiziere dein Kanalthema mit ChatGPT
Lass dich inspirieren und finde die Themen, die wirklich zu dir und deiner Zielgruppe passen.
2.2 Keyword-Recherche mit YouTube und Google
Die mächtigsten Tools, um herauszufinden, wonach die Welt sucht.
2.3 Effektive Keyword-Strategien mit Keywordtool und ChatGPT
Von Basic bis Advanced: Strategien, die deine Sichtbarkeit maximieren.


Modul 3: Das KI-Tool VidIQ für dein YouTube SEO
SEO kann kompliziert sein, aber mit den richtigen Tools wird es zum Kinderspiel. VidIQ ist dein neuer bester Freund.
3.1 VidIQ: Dein mächtiges SEO-Tool
Eine Einführung in das Tool, das deine SEO-Arbeit revolutioniert.
3.2 Wettbewerbsanalyse mit VidIQ
Lerne von den Besten und finde heraus, was deine Konkurrenz richtig macht – und wie du sie übertriffst.


Modul 4: Optimierung von Videoinhalten
Content is King – aber nur, wenn er richtig präsentiert wird. Ich zeige dir, wie du deine Videos so optimierst, dass die Klicks fast von alleine kommen.
4.1 Fesselnde Titel erstellen
Clickbait war gestern – wir erstellen Titel, die neugierig machen und halten, was sie versprechen.
4.2 Überzeugende Beschreibungen schreiben
Eine gute Beschreibung ist mehr als nur Text – sie ist dein Verkaufstool.
4.3 Tags clever einsetzen
Vergiss wahllose Tags – wir setzen sie strategisch ein.
4.4 Thumbnails, die klicken lassen
Das visuelle Aushängeschild deines Videos – so hebst du dich ab.
4.5 Dateinamen für YouTube SEO optimieren
Kleiner Trick, große Wirkung – selbst der Dateiname zählt.
4.6 Effektive Call-to-Actions nutzen
Lass deine Zuschauer handeln – abonnieren, kommentieren und mehr.


Modul 5: Analyse und Anpassung deiner Strategie
Erfolg ist messbar. In diesem Modul lernst du, wie du YouTube Analytics effektiv nutzt, um deine Strategie zu verfeinern.
5.1 YouTube Analytics: Datenbasiert optimieren
Zahlen, die dir den Weg zeigen – einfach und verständlich erklärt.
5.2 Watchtime und Klickrate als Schlüsselindikatoren
Die zwei wichtigsten Faktoren für den Algorithmus und wie du sie verbesserst.
5.3 Analyse eines meiner erfolgreichsten Videos
Ein Blick hinter die Kulissen: Warum hat dieses Video funktioniert – und wie kannst du das nachmachen?


Modul 6: Fortgeschrittene YouTube SEO-Techniken
Du willst noch mehr? Dann tauchen wir ein in die Geheimnisse, die dir den entscheidenden Vorteil verschaffen.
6.1 Playlists gezielt für SEO nutzen
So bringst du Zuschauer dazu, mehr von deinem Content zu sehen.
6.2 Das Playlist-Spiel verstehen
Eine unterschätzte SEO-Strategie, die du unbedingt kennen musst.
6.3 Die Relevanz von Likes für den Algorithmus
Kleine Geste, große Wirkung – so beeinflussen Likes deine Sichtbarkeit.
6.4 Die Relevanz von Kommentaren für den Algorithmus
Interaktion ist alles – und du kannst sie gezielt fördern.


Modul 7: KI für YouTube SEO nutzen
Künstliche Intelligenz ist das nächste große Ding – und du kannst sie für deinen Erfolg einsetzen.
7.1 Inhalte erstellen und optimieren mit Canva AI
Von Thumbnails bis Posts – KI macht’s möglich.
7.2 Inhalte erstellen und optimieren mit Microsoft Designer
Noch mehr Tools, noch mehr Möglichkeiten für deinen perfekten Content.


Bist du bereit, deinen Kanal aufs nächste Level zu heben?
Egal, ob du gerade erst anfängst oder schon länger dabei bist – dieser Kurs bietet dir das Wissen und die Strategien, die du brauchst, um auf YouTube erfolgreich zu sein. Werde sichtbar, gewinne Abonnenten und dominiere die Suche!
target_audience: Anfänger, die einen erfolgreichen YouTube-Kanal starten möchten
Erfahrene Creator, die ihre YouTube SEO-Kenntnisse erweitern wollen
Alle, die KI-Tools nutzen möchten, um ihre Inhalte effizienter zu gestalten

courses.title: ライブ配信のプロも使用！これで配信ができる「Wirecast」の使い方講座！
courses.bio: 日本トップレベルの実績を持つ配信技術会社も使用しているライブ配信ソフトウェア「Wirecast」の使い方を解説いたします。
objectives: 「Wirecast」を使用した配信を理解できます
YouTubeを利用した「ライブ配信」が出来るようになります
カメラ・音声を使用した「ライブ配信」が出来るようになります
画像や映像を挿入してより高度な「ライブ配信」が出来るようになります

第2章 基礎編: 音声デバイスを入力する
静止画の入力とトランジション
第3章 配信設定編: 映像ソースの確認事項
第4章 配信開始編: アドレスとストリーム

requirements: 「配信ソフトウェア」に対する知識は不要ですが、「ライブ配信」に対する知識は必要です
courses.description:
この講座では、40,000件以上のライブ配信実績を持つアポロ・プロダクションが、
ライブ配信ソフトウェアの「Wirecast」の使い方をお伝えします。


※「Wirecast」とは？
Telestream®社より販売されているライブストリーミングソフトウェア。
YouTubeやTwitter、Facebookなどにライブ配信をするときに使用されています。
直感的なUIで使用できるため、非常に多くの方に愛用されています。
アポロ・プロダクションでは、日々の現場でWirecastを使用してライブ配信を行っております。


▼受講対象者
・「Wirecast」の使い方がわからない方
・企業の広報活動、マーケティング活動でライブ配信をしてみたい方
・「ライブ配信」のやり方が分からない方


▼受講をおすすめしない方
配信に関する基礎知識を解説していますので、以下に該当する方はすでにご存知の内容になっていると思います。
・ライブ配信に対する知識がある方
・Wirecastを使用したことがある方（基礎向けの内容になっているため）
target_audience: YouTubeでライブ配信をしたい方
配信ソフトウェアを使用してライブ配信をしてみたい方
Wirecastの使い方がわからない方

requirements: Requirements for this course are designed to ensure every learner can start from scratch and reach mastery. No Previous Experience Required: This course is beginner-friendly. Even if you're starting from zero, you're in the right place.
Smartphone for Video Shooting: Having a smartphone will enable you to practice shooting high-quality video content (this is optional but recommended).
Drone (Optional): If you have access to any kind of drone, it can enhance your video creation capabilities with aerial shots.
Adobe Premiere Pro & After Effects: Access to these software tools will be crucial for video editing sections. Both come with a 7-day free trial, perfect for getting started.
Laptop or Computer: Necessary for editing your videos or project videos. The more powerful, the smoother your editing experience will be.
Google Chrome: Required for activating 200+ prompts for ChatGPT, an essential tool for generating content ideas and scripts.
ChatGPT Plus (Optional): Having a ChatGPT Plus subscription can offer an advantage for accessing certain AI functions not available in the free version.
Desktop (Optional but Recommended): For those who have writing assignments, a desktop can provide a more comfortable working environment.

With just a little preparation and the right tools, you're all set to embark on this comprehensive journey to YouTube mastery. Get ready to transform your passion for video into tangible skills that can captivate an audience, enhance your digital presence, and even monetize your content. Welcome aboard!

Unlock YouTube Success: Your Comprehensive Guide to Engaging Content

courses.bio: Write a video script that grabs attention and engages viewers. Follow proven script-writing techniques for demo videos.
objectives: Understand video production terms to use in your product-demo video scripts

requirements: Students must be fluent in writing English
Students should have a basic grasp of content marketing terms and principles
courses.description:
If you are a content writer or copywriter, one of these days someone is going to ask you to write a script for a product-demo video or an explainer video. When they do, what will you do?
I ask because script writing is a unique form of writing. Because you don’t just determine the words that someone is going to say in the video, either on camera or as a voiceover. You also determine what your viewer is going to see, and you determine what your viewer is going to hear.
Video script writing involves these three things: words, visuals, and sounds. You control all three, and you exercise that control in your script using a set of common commands and video production terms. For the video production team to turn your vision into reality, you must tell them what to say and how to say it, what to shoot and how to shoot it, and what sound effects and music to include, and how to include them.
Hi, I’m Alan Sharpe, and welcome to my course on how to Write a Video Script for a Product Demo or Explainer Video. I designed this course for content writers and copywriters who need to master this unique, visual medium.
In this course, you learn every step to take to write a video script from scratch. You learn the basic structure of all product demo scripts, the production terms to use in your script, and the format you should follow in your script.
You learn how to write for the ear, how to think visually, how to tell a story, and how to write the three parts of every video script (the intro, the middle, and the outro).
Look over my shoulder as I start with a blank screen and write a product-demo script from scratch, guiding you every step of the way. Learn the things you must do, the blunders you must avoid, and the best practices you must follow to make your product-demo video script or explainer video script awesome, and effective.
I wrote my first script in 1989, before video marketing was even a thing. I have been writing, shooting, editing and producing product-demo videos as a one-man show for more than eight years. In this course, I show you all that I’ve learned the hard way, along the way.
If you need to write scripts for product-demo videos or explainer videos, and if you want your scripts to be clear, engaging, compelling and effective, take this course. Check out the detailed course description below. Watch the free preview lessons. Read the reviews from my satisfied students. Then enroll now.
target_audience: Copywriters who write product-demo or explainer video scripts
Content writers who write product-demo or explainer video scripts

courses.description:
I ran an email campaign to a tiny list of prospects and it resulted in 256 prequalified webinar sign-ups. These customers were located all over the US, there is no way I would have been able to visit them all and make a sales presentation. Leveraging the power of a properly planned webinar I was able to do in one month what many of my competitors won't accomplish this entire year!
In the last year THOUSANDS of people have bought training on how to setup, conduct, and succeed with Webinars, THOUSANDS!
There was just one critical element missing that everybody needed...
A "WEBINAR GAME PLAN" IN TEMPLATE FORM.
"Webinar Success Templates" is a step-by-step set of time saving templates that you can print out and slap in a binder, that tells you what to do and when to do it. This is the missing link to Webinar success.
My name is Anthony Flatt and my friend Jerry Roberts and I have put together an awesome product called "Webinar Success Templates". In a nut shell "Webinar Success Templates" is a complete series of fill-in-the-blank- time saving templates, agendas, and checklists we use for hosting webinars.
The "Webinar Success Templates" includes an eBook and Video training on how to use each of the more than 25 individual fill-in-the-blank templates, agendas, and checklist.
Webinars are one of the most powerful and cost-effective ways to quickly get your message across. They allow you to reach a large group of people all at once, ensuring your message reaches a maximum amount of people.
Webinars are great relationship builders. They allow the host to connect and interact live with their followers so there's no guessing at what topics to cover.
Webinars most importantly are a great way to have a large number of potential customers hear your sales message and take action to purchase your products and services.
target_audience: Business people wanting to learn to leverage the power of a properly planned webinar to convert webinar attendees into paying customers.
Startups and entrepreneurs who need to give an online presentation on an idea or to involve partners
For businesses that want to achieve a greater reach, by providing interactive, hands-on learning opportunities, in the form of live webinars and virtual events.

courses.description:
あなたがYouTubeを始めたい、しかも、難しい動画編集ツールを使わず、撮影なしでYouTubeを始められるものがあるとしたらどうでしょうか？


さらに、サブスクなしの動画生成AIで簡単にAI動画を作り、Canvaで動画をデザインするだけでYouTubeが始められるとしたら最高じゃないですか？


はじめまして、ITキャリアコンサルタント、YouTube自動化コンサルタントの迫 俊太です。


このコースでは、YouTubeをやりたいとは思っていたけど、台本作成が大変、撮影が大変、難しい動画編集ツールが使いこなせないといった理由でYouTubeを諦めていた方に、簡単にYouTubeを始めてもらう為のオンラインコースです。


自分の電子書籍やブログをVOICEVOXとVideoExpress．ai、Canvaを使って簡単にYouTubeオンライン講座へと変換します。


VOICEVOXは無料で簡単にAI音声を作成する事ができるツールでクレジットを記載するだけで商用利用も可能です。


VideoExpress．aiは買い切り型のAI画像生成とAI動画生成の機能を持っている動画編集ツールです。このサービスではStable Video Diffusionが使われており、画像から簡単に動画を生成できるサービスです。


Canvaは直感的に操作できるデザインツールですが、VideoExpress．aiを使用すれば、感情表現のあるAI動画が生成できて、カット編集が不要となる為、生成された動画をデザインするだけでYouTubeを作る事が出来ます。


今までYouTubeを諦めていた方、特に40代以上の女性の方は動画編集がネックだったためにYouTubeをやりたかったけどで諦めた人も多いでしょう。


ですが、もう心配ありません。AI動画で無駄なカット編集は必要無くなり、CanvaでAI動画をデザインするだけでYouTubeを始められるんです。


さらにこのコースではAI×VSL、AI画像生成、AI動画生成、AI漫画作成のオンライン講座も含まれていて、これらを学習すればより深くマーケティングを学ぶ事が出来ます。


また、この講座では5大特典プレゼントもご用意しています。


5つのオンライン講座と5大プレゼントを活用して、あなたも僕と一緒にAI×YouTubeを始めて、ビジネスを飛躍させませんか？


それでは、このコースの中でお会いしましょう。


VOICEVOX:青山龍星

courses.description:
Lerne von erfahrenen Filmemachern und Video-Marketing-Experten, wie du dich und dein Unternehmen in die Sichtbarkeit bringst und endlich wahrgenommen wirst. Starte noch heute ins Video-Marketing und erlange das Zertifikat zum Video-Marketer.

Deine Dozenten Dennis Budin, Jan Willhöft und Nico Serapins haben selbst mehr als 40.000.000 Zuschauer mit ihren Videos erreicht, und eine erfolgreiche Video-Marketing-Agentur aufgebaut. In diesem Kurs teilen sie ihr Expertenwissen.

Dieser Kurs eignet sich ganz einfach für jeden, der die Möglichkeit sieht, dem Wettbewerb voraus zu sein und endlich in die Sichtbarkeit zu kommen.
Selbstständige und Freelancer, neue Kunden zu gewinnen oder Vertrauen steigern wollen
Unternehmer, die mit möglichst wenig Zeiteinsatz Videos produzieren wollen
Marketingabteilungen, die sich für die Zukunft aufstellen wollen
KONZEPTION UND ZIELSETZUNG
Möglichkeiten und Ziele deiner Strategie zu erkennen ist das A und O zum Erfolg. Nico zeigt dir, wie du deine Kanäle auf deine Ziele abstimmst und wie deine Strategie so richtig erfolgreich wird.
THEMENFINDUNG FÜR DEINE ZIELGRUPPE
Deine Zielgruppe erreichst du nur mit den passenden Videothemen. Themen, die für deine Zielgruppe nicht relevant sind, kosten dir viel Zeit und bringen nicht den gewünschten Erfolg. Daher zeigt dir Nico, wie du passende Themen findest.
VIDEOPRODUKTION

VERÖFFENTLICHUNG

CONVERSION

courses.title: UGC on the Go: Creating Professional Videos on low budgets
courses.bio: From Concept to Delivery: Everything You Need to Know to Produce Professional-Quality UGC Videos on a Low Budget.
objectives: Discover the business benefits of creating professional user-generated videos on-the-go.
Learn to plan and create professional UGC videos by mastering client briefs, equipment selection, and shooting techniques.
Build comfortability on camera, speak naturally and authentically, and engage with the audience effectively.

Pre-Production: How to be Comfortable on Camera
Production: How to Handle Sound on a Budget
Making the Most of Your iPhone Through Lighting

requirements: No prior experience or special equipment is required, however you should at least have a smartphone with a working camera and microphone
courses.description:
In today's digital age, businesses are increasingly relying on user-generated content (UGC) videos to reach and engage with their audiences. However, creating professional-quality UGC videos on a tight budget can be a daunting task.
In this course, you will learn the skills needed to plan, shoot, and edit UGC videos that look and feel like they were made by a professional - all on a low budget. From understanding client briefs to selecting the right equipment and shooting techniques, you'll learn everything you need to create UGC videos that stand out from the crowd.
Specifically, you'll learn how to work with client briefs and target audiences, choose the right concept and style for your video, write a script and plan your shoot. You'll also learn about the basic equipment needed for shooting professional UGC videos and how to get the most out of your smartphone camera.
In addition, you'll master shooting techniques such as framing and composition, lighting, and capturing stable footage without a tripod. You'll also learn how to build comfortability on camera and overcome common challenges when speaking on camera.
Finally, you'll learn about the basics of editing software and how to organize and sort your footage, create a compelling story with UGC footage, and add music, sound effects, and voiceover. You'll also learn how to manage client expectations and communicate effectively, where to find clients for your UGC video services, and how to establish credibility and scale up your business.
Whether you're a freelancer, small business owner, or aspiring content creator, this course will give you the skills and confidence to create professional-quality UGC videos on the go - without breaking the bank.
target_audience: This course is ideal for anyone who wants to learn how to create high-quality user-generated videos for businesses with minimal equipment and on-the-go. It's designed for beginners who are interested in starting a career as a freelance UGC video creator, entrepreneurs who want to create their own UGC videos to promote their business, or marketing professionals who want to enhance their skills in creating compelling UGC videos.

courses.description:
It's not a secret to anyone anymore. YouTube Thumbnails matter. A lot. It's the first thing people see when browsing YouTube and it's what will make them click on your video to watch it or not. It can mean the difference between a million views and no views.
YouTube thumbnails are often the most influential factor in determining whether or not viewers will watch your video. This is because it's the first thing they see when browsing YouTube and is what will make them click on it to watch or not.
Creating an attractive YouTube thumbnail is one of the most important things to get right when uploading a video.
You can't get your video watched without a great thumbnail. Thumbnail size, shape, color, and location all affect your video's click-through rate.
A bad thumbnail can reduce your views by more than half. That's why YouTube Thumbnail Masterclass is designed to show you how to create attractive thumbnails that will help your video stand out on YouTube.
Make sure your thumbnails stand out from the crowd with this online course where I will teach you how to create an amazing YouTube Thumbnails.
And that's where this course comes in.
You will learn how to create an amazing YouTube Thumbnails in this course. I will teach you all the tricks and techniques you need to know about how to make a thumbnail stand out from the crowd. You will also learn how to create your own thumbnail styles and use different software as well as other digital graphics tools for editing images.
You know those amazing thumbnails that stand out and grab your attention? I will show you how to create your own and make them the best they can be. Whether you're creating a thumbnail for a video, logo or infographic, these techniques will help you stand out from the crowd.
Whether you are just a beginner or an expert, this course will teach you how to use Affinity Photo, its tools and other free software to create a custom thumbnail for YouTube video.

courses.title: YouTube大師課：打造YouTube熱門頻道完全指南
courses.bio: 打造YouTube熱門頻道完全指南，創建屬於你自己的品牌，讓更多人認識你吧！
objectives: 創辦屬於自己的成功的YouTube頻道
通過YouTube頻道拓展您的品牌
獲取更多YouTube觀看次數
獲得更多YouTube訂閱者

課程簡介: 為什麼要做YouTube？分享我們的成功案例
錄影設備推薦: 音訊設備及麥克風推薦

通過YouTube賺錢: 通過頻道會員和Super Chat賺錢
通過頻道贊助獲取收益
個案研究：Phil如何通過銷售數位產品賺錢
通過YouTube Analytics增長: 個案研究：Phil用Analytics來做頻道增長
福利: 福利課：任何一門Phil的課程都可以享受高達90%的折扣

requirements: 您應該知道自己想要創辦哪種類型的YouTube頻道
您需要一個Google帳戶，以便註冊YouTube帳戶（我們會向您展示課程中的使用方式）
courses.description:
本課是您快速啟動YouTube頻道的完美課程。
您来這裡是因為想創建一個大受歡迎的YouTube頻道，對吧？
也許您是YouTube新手或有一些經驗，但需要幫助發展現有的頻道。
YouTube是展示自己品牌，增加網站流量，從YouTube廣告以及服務中賺錢的理想之地。
如果您正在建立自己的品牌，想獲得更多的曝光和粉絲；或從頭開始創建一個頻道， 這對您來說是完美的課程！
無論您啟動YouTube頻道的動機是什麼，您都來對地方了。


這裡涵蓋您需要的一切，從開始創建專業影片獲得成千上萬的點擊和訂閱到最終讓您賺錢！
YouTube大師課是一門快速而有效的課程，帶您從零技能入手，生產出高品質的影片，最終建立一個完整的YouTube頻道。


雖然市面上有很多專注於建立YouTube頻道的課程，但很難找到像這樣的綜合課程，對於初學者和任何需要快速發展YouTube觀眾的人來說這門課是非常必要的。


本課程專為製作影片（或想製作影片）並希望通過YouTube頻道發展品牌的人而設計。因此，如果您是一位新手或者需要幫助的人，那麼您來對地方了。


通過本課，您將學到：
從頭開始創建頻道
一開始沒有訂閱用戶也可以有播放量的秘訣
將觀眾變成你的粉絲
根據預算製作影片
瀏覽YouTube平台
成為YouTube合作伙伴
使用精彩的標題、說明、標籤和縮圖發布和最佳化您的影片
過YouTube影片擴展您的品牌
使用分析改進您的頻道
通過您的YouTube影片賺錢 - 包括廣告、產品、服務、贊助商和眾籌
使用最佳方法創建和發展您的YouTube頻道


提升您的YouTube頻道，獲得更多觀看次數和訂閱者，賺取更多收益
不管你的經驗水平如何、使用的攝影器材如何，這門課程旨在為你提供建立一個成功的YouTube頻道所需的一切。
無論你是想通過vlogs建立一個渠道來促進你的業務或教授一項技能，還是僅僅通過vlogs分享你的生活故事，透過了解YouTube渠道成功的案例，你可以獲得更多的曝光和關注，並且能夠用此盈利。本課會告訴你如何做到這一點。


內容概述
這門課程的目的是教新的Youtubers如何製作受歡迎的影片並從中賺錢。本課大部分內容都是實踐性的教學，我們不僅引導您了解成功所需的條件，還向您展示如何做到這一點。
你將從最基本的操作開始，這是成為YouTubers的最佳路徑。另外我們的小建議會讓您快速成為YouTubers。
你將學習如何使用YouTube平台。註冊帳戶，成為YouTube認證合作伙伴，並知道如何使用創作者平台。
您將學習如何在預算範圍內使用專業設備製作出色的影片。學習如何用任何類型的相機拍攝一個好的影片，如何錄製好的音訊，如何用一個便宜的DIY設備給影片打光，以及如何有效地編輯影片。
在學習了如何創建令人驚嘆的影片後，您將學習如何將它們發布到YouTube頻道，其中包含對SEO搜尋引擎最佳化的標題、說明和標籤，最終獲得更多的瀏覽量。你甚至可以學習如何設計和上傳一個自訂的縮圖來增加你的瀏覽量。您還將學習各種最佳化策略以獲得最多的瀏覽和粉絲。
透過學習使用分析工具，您將知道哪些影片受歡迎，哪些影片無人觀看。只製作受歡迎的內容，這將幫助您快速發展您的YouTube頻道。
最後，你將學習如何通過YouTube盈利。有很多方法：包括廣告、YouTube Red、數字和實物產品、贊助和眾籌。
本課程結束時，您將擁有一個您引以為豪的YouTube頻道。你將製作觀眾喜愛的高品質影片。將會有越來越多的粉絲聚集在你的品牌下。你將從YouTube頻道中盈利。


關於講師：
Phil Ebiner 菲爾·埃比納  從2012年開始在線教學，現在有超過11萬名Udemy學生學習從攝影到影片製作的各種技能。菲爾在2013年創辦了自己的YouTube頻道，以此來發展自己的品牌，很高興與大家分享他的知識，幫助大家取得成功。


Mike and Lauren Moyer 邁克和勞倫·莫耶 成功的YouTubers，他們通過發布有關個人理財、提前退休和DIY項目的影片來謀生。他們迅速發展了自己的YouTube頻道，每天都有成千上萬的瀏覽量。邁克和勞倫運營著一個成功的YouTube頻道，他們期待著幫助你建立自己的頻道。


我們承諾30天100%退款，來吧，現在沒有任何東西能阻止你來嘗試一下課程了。


點擊學習按鍵，我們在第一課見！


Cheers,
Phil
target_audience: 想通過YouTube頻道獲得點擊、訂閱並賺錢的YouTubers

courses.bio: Placez vos vidéos youtube en 1ère page avec le référencement youtube et gagnez plus de vues, et de nouveaux abonnés.
objectives: Comprendre le fonctionnement du moteur de recherche de youtube.
Optimiser vos titres de vidéos comme un renard rusé.

Générer des vues et des likes sur ses vidéos pour améliorer l'engagement

Se servir du système d'auto-complétion de youtube
Avoir des idées de vidéos youtube

Positionner une vidéo sans avoir de vidéo à "copier"

requirements: Vous devez créer une chaine youtube et des vidéos
courses.description:
Dans cette formation au seo youtube vous découvrirez les secrets du moteur de recherche interne de youtube.
Dans une heure, vous pourrez vous classer sur n'importe quel mots clés de votre choix et voir vos vidéos apparaître en première page de youtube sur les recherches de votre choix...


Qu'allez-vous gagner en apprenant le référencement youtube?
Pour exister réellement sur youtube, vous devez être visible à une audience qui ne vous connait pas encore afin de faire grandir votre nombre d'abonnés de manière permanente.
Si vous n'optimisez pas vos vidéos correctement, vous serez noyé dans la masse des autres vidéos youtube, et il serait dommage que le monde entier ne découvre pas ce que vous avez à lui offrir.
Car oui, aujourd'hui youtube est le deuxième moteur de recherche du monde en termes de volume de recherches. Il y a donc une opportunité à saisir pour s'y faire remarquer.... Surtout que les stratégies que je vais vous apprendre, la plupart des youtubeurs ne les connaissent pas encore.


Est-ce une formation pour vous?
Si vous voulez apprendre comment amener des milliers de vues supplémentaires sur vos vidéos et votre chaîne grâce au référencement youtube alors cette formation est faite pour vous.
Si vous recherchez des faux abonnés, des fausses vues pour gonfler vos statistiques de chaine youtube, cette formation n'est pas faite pour vous.
Dans cette formation, on va travailler votre référencement youtube pour vous amener des abonnés qui s'abonnent parce qu'ils ont découvert vos vidéos par hasard et aiment votre travail.
target_audience: Toutes les personnes voulant bien positionner leurs vidéos sur youtube pour qu'elles soient découvertes par des inconnus.

courses.title: Camtasia Studio Unleashed | Start Mastering Video Creation
courses.bio: Explore Camtasia's Editing Features for Professional Results | Camtasia for Beginners: Start Your Video Journey
objectives: Organize Your Thoughts and Captivate Your Audience
Demonstrate Concepts with Engaging Screen Recordings
Remove Mistakes and Enhance Your Visual Storytelling
Learn to Harness the Full Power of Camtasia
Elevate Your Video-Making Skills with Camtasia

Getting Started: Upgrading Your Previous Registered Version of Camtasia

Converting Previous Camtasia Projects to the Most Recent Version

requirements: Basic Computer Skills: You should be comfortable using a computer and have a fundamental understanding of software applications.
Access to Camtasia Studio: It's recommended to have Camtasia Studio installed on your computer. While we will cover the basics, having access to this software will enhance your learning experience.

Desire to Create Videos: A passion for video creation and a willingness to learn are the most crucial prerequisites. Whether you're a beginner or have some experience, your enthusiasm is your greatest asset.
Internet Connection: A stable internet connection will be needed to access course materials and resources.

No prior video editing or Camtasia experience is required. This course is designed to accommodate learners at various skill levels, from beginners to those looking to enhance their existing video creation skills. We'll start with the fundamentals and gradually progress to more advanced topics, ensuring everyone can benefit from this course.
courses.description:
In today's digital landscape, video content is king, and Camtasia Studio is your ultimate tool for creating impactful videos. Whether you're an educator, content creator, business professional, or someone who simply wants to craft compelling videos without appearing on camera, this course is your gateway to mastering Camtasia Studio.


Our course is designed to take you from a novice to a proficient video creator. You'll discover the secrets of organizing your thoughts and captivating your audience with well-structured presentations. We'll delve into the art of narrating your screen while demonstrating concepts, ensuring that your viewers are engaged and enlightened.


But that's not all; we'll also equip you with the skills to edit your videos like a pro. Learn how to remove mistakes, enhance your storytelling, and create visually stunning content. Camtasia Studio is not just a video creation tool; it's your creative canvas to bring your ideas to life.


Throughout this course, you'll have the opportunity to explore the full power of Camtasia Studio. We'll cover its core features, advanced techniques, and best practices to ensure you're well-versed in every aspect of video creation.


By the end of this course, you'll be equipped with the knowledge and confidence to create videos that captivate, educate, and inspire. Whether you're looking to boost your career, engage your audience, or simply enjoy the art of video creation, this course is your ticket to success.


Join us today and embark on your journey to video excellence with Camtasia Studio!
target_audience: Aspiring video creators looking to master Camtasia Studio
Professionals seeking to improve their video presentation skills
Content creators and educators aiming to engage their audience
Anyone interested in crafting high-quality videos with ease

courses.description:
Video Marketing Scholars (VMS) mini course is designed for entrepreneurs and business owners that are looking for ways to advertise their businesses without spending a fortune on advertising.
Video marketing has grown exponentially and is a major tool for websites, YouTube and social media marketing. As a result, VMS designed this mini-course to introduce students to video marketing.
VMS has determined that page one rankings on the major search engines begins with keyword research. This is the cornerstone of the course.
VMS teaches students:
How to use keyword research
Why you should create at least 100 videos
How to add royalty-free music to your videos
Why meta-data will help you achieve ranking success
How Google and YouTube influence ranking success
Why you will never get your videos ranked on page one if you don’t do 3 things
The keyword research alone would help any entrepreneur or business owner do extremely well on social media marketing too.
The Video Marketing Scholar course is primarily video driven. Many of the things we demonstrate on the videos are applicable to what every student needs to do to be successful with video marketing.
There are 6 videos in this VMS mini-course. Each video addresses a specific issue we have gotten from our students over the past 3 years. There is approximately 1 hour of video content available to students.
Video marketing should be a key component of any business owner’s arsenal. VMS has gone to great lengths to fill in the knowledge gaps about video marketing and spent three full years refining the topics covered based on the dialogue we have had with customers all over the world.
The value you will receive with VMS is incalculable.
target_audience: This course is designed for students looking to use video marketing for their businesses.  Video Marketing Scholar has spent three years collating information from students around the world to address as many of the questions students have to be successful with video marketing.  This mini-course is not meant for students that have high PageRank YouTube Channels or websites.

Lets Dive in Vlogging: Free Tools For Growing Your YouTube Channel

requirements: There are no requirements for this course
courses.description:
Vlogging is becoming increasingly more popular and there has never been a better time to start a vlog.
People really enjoy watching high quality vlogs and some vloggers have subscribers in the millions. But you don’t need millions of subscribers to make money from vlogging.
There are many vloggers that have a lot less subscribers that make a full time income and more from their vlogging activities.
Doing something that you love and recording it to share with the world and making money at the same time. This is more than a dream – it can be your reality if you follow the advice provided in this guide.
Why should you start a Vlog?
People are curious by nature and they like to see what other people are doing with their lives. This is the reason why reality TV is so successful. What are the ordinary people doing out there? What are their hopes and dreams? What excites them and how do they go about their day?
It doesn’t matter that someone doesn’t know you. You have a message to share with the world and a vlog is the perfect way to do it. Sure you could create a conventional blog and write posts about your life and share your experiences. But people prefer video.
In a survey conducted by HubSpot a while ago, they discovered that 72% of participants preferred to watch video rather than read a blog post to learn how to do something or find out more about a product or a service.
YouTube is a giant of a website. There are 1 billion users who consume hours of video every day. There will always be somebody searching YouTube for what you are good at. This provides you with a fantastic opportunity.
With a vlog you can create a real connection with your viewers. It is different to creating a one off video. If you provide quality videos (and you must) then people will eagerly await the next one that you upload.
There are many vlogging success stories. These are ordinary people who drastically changed their lives through vlogging. They have all kinds of sponsorship deals and several different revenue streams. Some vloggers became millionaires very quickly – there is no reason why you cannot be the next vlogging sensation.
In this short report we will provide you with the 7 ways to start a successful vlog. How you start your vlog is really important. If you don’t get off to a flying start then it will be a real struggle for you. Use the methods in this report and you won’t go wrong.
Topics covered in This Course:
What is Vlogging?
Ideas for Profitable Vlogs
Starting a Successful Vlog
Creating Great Videos
Optimizing your YouTube Videos
Promoting your Vlog
Free Tools for Growing your YouTube Channel
Ways to Monetize your Vlog
Vlogging Best Practices
target_audience: Anyone Who Want  To Make Money Online

全体の流れ

2020年8月末から、日本語対応になりました、

courses.description:
随着直播行业，尤其是直播电商行业的火爆，直播运营的人才缺口越来越大。而要想成为一个优秀的直播运营，必定能够在统筹计划、执行跟进和反馈优化几个方面游刃有余，通过建立粉丝黏性，打造强转化直播间。本节小课，三节课邀请到武汉凡尘直播基地项目合伙人兼运营总监王璟雪，与你分享直播运营的工作法则。帮助你快速认知直播运营的角色定位，梳理完整的工作流程；为你解析直播流量和权重的关系，以及直播权重考核的标准；同时，也会揭秘直播运营的三板斧，让你迅速get直播运营的工作技巧，为你打开直播运营的大门。


课程导师——王璟雪
武汉凡尘直播基地项目合伙人兼运营总监
武昌理工学院客座讲师；武汉工商学院新媒体顾问。6年企业培训讲师从业经验。电商行业资深实践者，操盘管理多个直播、短视频基地项目，擅长各种新媒体板块布局和运营。为多家公司提供新媒体板块培训或咨询服务，与多个知名品牌客户有长期直播合作。
target_audience: 1.0-1岁直播电商运营

Bonus Exercise - Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) Strategies

requirements: A desire to learn how to create powerful and high quality video commercials
No prior experience in video ad creation is required
courses.description:
‘Learn from one of London's top production companies’
ESA Films & ESA Inspire are a community of filmmakers doing high calibre work on an international level for some of the biggest organisations in the world, who trust us with their content creation - and if we can do it, so can you. Just let us show you how. With the techniques we show you you’ll soon be creating great content.
Our series is the only one produced by an international production company that is currently producing award-winning TV Commercials and corporate videos for some of the world's leading brands such as SONY, Barclays, Kellogg's, BBC, Microsoft and Nokia to name just a few.

Unlike some other film courses taught by a single person or a few individuals, with ESA you will have the collective experience of a whole company behind you to guide you and support you in your career.
The difference between this course by ESA Films and other courses is that we are actually doing what we’re teaching everyday for some of the world’s leading brands and international organisations.
Quizzes and Exercises
This course includes quizzes and exercises throughout to help you to really get to grips with the content and become a better film maker.
Course Bonuses:
Feedback from the course providers on any and all sections of the course
Accompanying materials to help guide you step-by-step through the course
Advice from our instructors for your own high-end video project
Downloadable bonus materials from our Production Professionals tool kit - which includes everything we use to create videos for some of the world’s biggest companies, such as:
Call Sheets
Casting Briefs
Contracts For Cast
Contracts For Crew
Production Contracts
Risk Assessments
General Release Forms
Location Release Forms
Free Bonus Material Added In The Future
We will be adding free bonus lectures to the course in the future and this will be at no extra cost. All as a thank you for buying the course and to help you in your continued development as a film maker.
Real-Life Case Studies
We even include a real life case study of an actual TV ad which we produced, showing the creative evolution of the ad from the brief - to the directors treatments - to the storyboards & script - to the finished TV Commercial.  All of this and much more is included in the Bonus Materials.
So if you want to learn real world video commercial techniques for today's marketplace, look no further!
We’ll be showing you the video secrets of those big brand companies and how they achieve incredible results using video to help them to dominate their industry on a global scale.
We’ve been showing them how to do it for years. Now let us show you!
You could trawl around the internet and try to find answers to your questions for free. But that process as we all know is very time consuming, bity and uneven. And after all that trawling, you will probably find some answers but very little in terms of a powerful and comprehensive ‘how to’ manual like this course, which will take you fully through the whole process.
Or perhaps you could go to Film School and learn some of the information in this course. But it will cost you probably between £6,000 to £10,000 per term to go to film school and even that won't be real world training, just academic training.
Or you could simply buy this one course for a much smaller price and have the whole package at your fingertips, using real world techniques which have been tried and tested.
So what are you waiting for? Enroll today and kick start your career!


ABOUT YOUR INSTRUCTORS:
Angelique Rodrigues
Creative Producer, Course Co-Author and Presenter
My interest in film was born from my love for acting. I discovered the art of screen acting whilst studying for my Performing Arts diploma and Film Studies course. It was only then when I realised how exciting it could be to be behind the camera as well as in front of it!
As Creative Producer at ESA I manage the creative production process from start to finish; including idea creation, script writing, casting, locations and production. I am also involved with the on-set filming, as well as post production such as editing, sound and motion design.
I can’t wait to share my knowledge and experience with other filmmakers and creatives, in order to help you create great content and reach your goals to success!
Mitchell Brown
Principle Filmmaker and Course Co-Author
I have a passion for telling stories and creating my own films! As a Principle Film Maker at ESA I am a part of the creation process from start to finish.
I develop content from ideation to scripting, and I also do the lighting and camera for many of our productions. What really excites me is the editing and post production and seeing all our work come together.
I want to share the knowledge and skills I have developed through the years and am looking forward to sharing that with you, and helping you on your journey to create amazing, world class video and film.
Dave Irving
Head of Digital Marketing, and Course Co-Author
My main goal in life is to help people have their voices heard. Through digital marketing I have found that I’m able to help people stand out amongst the competition and find a platform for their passion. I want to do the same for you.
Since childhood, I have had an active interest in the arts. I first picked up a guitar at the tender age of 7, and have hardly put it down since. That flair for the creative has stuck with me ever since and plays a major role in almost every aspect of my personal and professional life.
As an adult, I have worked as a video content creator over a span of 15 years – but the one thing all of my work has in common is a desire to be seen and heard by as many people as possible. It was through this necessity that I developed an interest in digital marketing.
Although it might not seem as rock-and-roll as picking up a guitar and shredding to a room full of people, my skills as a digital marketing strategist have given me the ability to broaden my audience base far beyond what I previously thought possible – I sincerely hope I can help you do the same.
Zah Ahmad
Film Director, Course Co - Author
Zaheer is an award winning Director, Writer and Producer at ESA Films where he has directed and produced content for some of the world’s leading brands such as Sony, Microsoft, Shell, HSBC and AMEX, General Electric, IBM, Colgate and Kelloggs.
During his career, he has attracted notable industry accolades and awards: Winner ‘Gold Award for Best Short’ at the WorldFest 2013 for his film ‘Beautiful Impurity’, which followed an Honourable Mention Award at Richmond International Film Festival 2013 and being selected as a Finalist at Crystal Palace International Film Festival. The film has received recognition at the Berlin Independent Film Festival, and also achieved Official Selections at some of the most prestigious festivals in the world, including Oscar affiliated Montreal World Film Festival. Most recently the film has been honoured at the American Online Film Awards.
Prior to this, his film ‘Runaways’ was awarded 'Winner Gold Remi’ at the Houston International Film Festival 2007, 'Best Short Nomination' at the Salento International Film Festival 2007 and ‘Highly Recommended' category winner at Leicester International Film Festival 2007. He is also past winner of the LFS Script Competition for the drama 'Love After Death' 2005.
After graduating from Warwick University with a BSc (Hons) Management Science he studied film at London Film Academy before progressing to a Post Graduate degree in Film Making at the prestigious London Film School.

courses.description:
Curso Como Fazer Vídeos Com Inteligência Artificial IA - Videos IA: Videos com inteligência artificial


Transforme Sua Criação de Vídeos com Inteligência Artificial!


Você já sonhou em criar vídeos incríveis que capturam a atenção e se tornam virais nas redes sociais? E se agora isso fosse possível com a ajuda da Inteligência Artificial?


Seja você um criador de conteúdo, profissional de marketing, empreendedor ou apenas alguém que deseja aprender a criar vídeos de qualidade profissional, sabe como pode ser desafiador destacar-se em meio a tanta concorrência. Passar horas editando vídeos, procurando inspiração e tentando entender o que faz um vídeo viral pode ser exaustivo e frustrante.


Apresentamos o Curso "Como Criar Vídeos Com Inteligência Artificial"


Imagine uma maneira de simplificar todo esse processo. Com nosso curso, você aprenderá a dominar as ferramentas mais inovadoras do mercado, como Pictory, Lumen5, Synthesia e DeepBrain, para criar vídeos de alta qualidade de forma rápida e eficiente.


O Que Você Vai Aprender:


Dominar Ferramentas de IA: Aprenda a usar as tecnologias mais avançadas para criação de vídeos.

courses.title: Adobe Audition 宅録ナレーターのための実用講座【波形編集モード入門篇】
courses.bio: 適切な設定の知識、波形エディターでの録音・切り貼り編集をマスターします（当講座は公式セール対象外です/学びたいタイミングでお申し込みください）
objectives: Adobe Auditionの概要
機材の接続設定

はじめに: はじめに
Adobe Auditionの概要
波形編集モード（波形エディター）画面の見方: 波形編集モードの画面構成
表示あれこれ: 波形編集モードの表示
粗編集（簡易編集）: ノイズを発生させない切り貼り
別のファイルと組み合わせる
（補足）背景ノイズを残しておく
波形編集モードでの保存
設定のカスタマイズ: ショートカットキーのカスタマイズ
ワークスペースのカスタマイズ

requirements: Adobe Auditionがインストールされていること
courses.description:
多彩な機能をもつAdobe Audition。当講座は宅録ナレーションで使うものに絞って解説しています。
ネットで使い方を探しても、断片的な理解になってしまう
機能や設定箇所が多すぎてどこを見たらいいのか、どれを使ったらいいのかわからない
そんな宅録ナレーターのために
順を追って、現場研修のように説明した、実用的な講座となっています。


宅録ナレーションは「なんとなく」でも始められます。無料のソフトでも仕事はできるでしょう。
でも、わざわざAdobe Auditionを選んだあなたは、
無料ソフトでは不便を感じたり、仕事としてきっちりこなしたいのでプロユースのツールを使うことにしたなど
選んだなりの理由があったのではないでしょうか？
（偏見かもしれませんが、有料ソフトを仕事道具にしている方は仕事ぶりもしっかりされている印象です）


ただ残念なことに、Auditionの教本はなかなか見つけられません。
ネットで調べながら独学でがんばっているけれど、どこまで通用しているのか、自己流で間違っていることはないのだろうか。そのようになんとなーく不安を背負っている方も、ぜひ答え合わせの機会として当講座をお使いください。
初学者向けですが、音声ファイルの基礎知識も盛り込んでいるので、既ユーザーのおさらい用途としてもお役に立てるかと思います。


【波形編集モード入門篇】では、基本的な接続設定と、録音・切り貼り編集などの簡易編集をマスターします。


（注）操作しているシーンはキャプチャソフトの性能により、音声が圧縮された音質になっています。
あらかじめご了承ください。
target_audience: 宅録ナレーター
独学でAuditionを使っていて基礎から見直したい方

My name is Jonny Finch and I’m the Head Trainer for Sparkol, the creators of VideoScribe. I’ve been creating videos and teaching courses on how to get the most out of our software for over 7 years now.

courses.title: Vimeoで会員サイト・オンラインスクールを作る方法
courses.bio: Vimeoを使ってオンラインスクールを運営してみませんか？Vimeo Proアカウントのポートフォリオ機能を使えば簡易的な会員サイトを運営することができます。
objectives: Vimeoのポートフォリオ機能でオンラインスクールを構築できます
注文の確認メールで何を書けば良いかわかります
requirements: Vimeo PRO（月々¥1660）
売りたいオンラインコースをすでに持っている
courses.description:
Vimeoは動画のホスティングサービスなので、オンライン決済はできません。PayPalやStripe、あるいはInfotopなどと組み合わせて利用してください。また商品管理や顧客管理もできないので、別のWebサービスと併用していただく必要があります。もしこれら機能を一元管理したい場合はThinkificやTeachableの利用をオススメします。
僕がVimeoを使う場合は、次の組み合わせを利用していました。
動画ホスティングサービス：Vimeo Pro（月々1660円）
オンライン決済：PayPal（導入費0円）
商品管理：ペイメントEX（12800円）
顧客管理：ペイメントEX（12800円）
購入者メルマガ：VPS-NEO（月々12500円）
似たサービスにYouTubeがありますけど、VimeoのProと比べるとできることは限られています。例えばVimeoにはYouTubeにはない次の機能があります。
エンディングにCall To Actionリンクの挿入ができる
URL1つで複数の動画を管理できる（ポートフォリオ機能）
ポートフォリオ単位でパスワードを設定できる
動画単位でパスワードを設定できる
仮に1コースで70レクチャーがあるとします。この70レクチャーをYouTubeで提供しようとすれば、70本の限定リンクを出す必要があります。一方のVimeoであれば、ポートフォリオ機能を使って1本のリンクで70本の動画を管理することができます。
すでに決済や納品のシステムが出来上がっていて、あとはどうやって動画レクチャーを顧客に届けようか迷っている方にお勧めできるホスティングサービスです。
target_audience: Udemyの講師
オンラインで商品を売りたい先生
簡易な会員サイトを作りたい人
