courses.description:
Vous désirez vendre en vidéo, mais vous ne voulez pas passer pour un marchand de tapis comme ceux qu'on peut voir chaque jour sur internet?
Vous n'avez pas envie de brader vos produits à coup d'offres discounts. D'utiliser des stratégies de marketing direct classiques, vous en avez marre de presque quémander pour qu'on vous achète vos produits?
Alors cette formation est faite pour vous...
Dans cette formation je vais vous apprendre à créer un script de vidéo de vente qui va parler à l'inconscient de vos acheteurs potentiels, un script ou vous n'aurez pas besoin de demander au client potentiel d'acheter, mais qui va amener les clients potentiels à vous demander s'ils peuvent avoir une opportunité d'acheter votre produit.
J'ai connu tous les problèmes que vous rencontrez probablement aujourd'hui...
...le sentiment d'aller nulle part ....l’impression qu'un produit est invendable...  le sentiment d'être un imposteur dans son domaine... la peur d'être mangé par un plus gros que soit... des clients qui ne sont pas prêt à payer un produit à sa juste valeur... des gens qui vous disent qu'ils achèteront votre produit plus tard mais qui ne l’achètent jamais ensuite... le doute sur ses capacités de vendeurs...
Dans toutes ces situations que s’est-il passé ? Vous avez essayé de vendre consciemment quelque chose à quelqu’un qui n’était pas prêt mentalement pour acheter votre produit.
Vous avez demandé à la personne d’acheter, alors que c’est elle qui doit vous demandez si vous voulez bien lui vendre le produit.
La différence est subtile, mais elle est essentielle…  Et rassurez-vous vous, moi aussi j’ai été un marchand de tapis qui demandait d’acheter à tout le monde, et parfois ça marchait au forcing…
Mais il y a une façon beaucoup plus soft de vendre, une façon qui va créer un dialogue dans l'esprit de votre client potentiel sans que vous ne parliez jamais d’acheter quoi que ce soit.
Une façon qui est presque de la magie. Sans pour autant être de la manipulation. Elle s'apparente au fait de raconter une histoire...
Les histoires ont le pouvoir d'influencer notre opinion sur quelque chose sans que l'on s'en rende compte.
Et... cette formation va vous aider à trouver les arguments qui vont faire mouche dans l'histoire que votre client a envie d'entendre, tout en racontant la vérité sur votre produit.
Je vais vous donner le script complet que j’utilise pour persuader, et vous n’aurez plus qu’à remplir les cases de textes, avant d’enregistrer votre futur vidéo de vente.  Il est préparé de façon à avoir déjà un fort pouvoir de persuasion juste en remplissant les cases.
Cette formation vous aidera à  :
Savoir comment exprimer ce que veulent le plus les gens sans leur demander avant.
Exprimer les choses d’une façon désirable et intrigante qui donne envie d’en savoir plus.
Faire gonfler la valeur perçue de votre produit avec un processus de vente implacable.
Apprendre à transformer des caractéristiques techniques en bénéfices émotionnels qui font vibrer de désir.
Aimer préparer le script de vos vidéos de vente et les tourner ensuite.
Ne plus se poser la question de savoir quel produit va marcher et quel produit ne va pas marcher.
Avoir un parcours logique dans la progression du désir du client potentiel et préparer facilement le script de vente.
Désarmer les objections avant qu’elles n’arrivent.
Créer un dialogue intérieur avec les gens.
Guider le client à travers un parcours dont il est le héros.
Avoir des clients qui ont l’impression que le produit est fait pour eux, qu’ils doivent absolument le posséder ou mourir.
Trouver quoi dire, et à quel moment le dire.
Avec les bonnes techniques persuader quelqu’un d’acheter un produit est extrêmement simple et devient un vrai plaisir dont on ne peut plus se passer.
Après avoir écrit votre script et tourné votre vidéo votre regard sur vos clients et la vente va changer. Vous saurez comment parler et toucher l'inconscient de vos clients pour leur vendre quelque chose.
Vous pouvez être prêt dans 3 heures et disposer d’une méga liste d’arguments vendeurs que vous pourrez utiliser pour votre prochaine vidéo de vente, votre page de vente ou dans vos mails afin de parler au cœur de votre client idéal.
Faire la différence par les arguments de vos vidéos ne tient qu’à vous.

Created a 99% automated YouTube channel with 1,000,000+ views, generate passive income, grow your personal brand, and generate revenue.
I'll give you all the tips that helped me find success on YouTube, and took me a few years to learn and figure out. You will be able to use my advice to create your own winning YouTube channel that helps you achieve your business goals.
Sign up for the course, and let's start working on making you successful on YouTube, starting today.


RESULTS YOU CAN EXPECT AFTER COMPLETING THIS COURSE


By the end of this course, you'll have the skills to grow any channel, grow an audience, and generate revenue.

YouTube SEO: get your videos to rank highly in YouTube search.
YouTube recommendation algorithm: understand how to get your videos to be recommended next to popular videos.
YouTube home page algorithm: get YouTube to bring you repeat viewers by recommending your videos to past viewers.
YouTube shorts: take advantage of short-form videos to boost reach and virality.


IMAGINE GETTING A SURGE OF TRAFFIC AND SALES


Imagine waking up to a surge of traffic on your website, leads and sales pouring in. Imagine how incredible it would be to finally achieve your financial goals the online visibility you've dreamed of. This isn't a fantasy - it's what my students experience every day.
Enroll in the course, and make yourself the next person to experience that instead of your competitors.


NEW: YOUTUBE LIVE - HOT NEW WAY TO PROMOTE THINGS ON YOUTUBE


I recently added a section on YouTube Live, which is the latest and greatest cool new way to reach a live audience and to promote your business and products to them.


RECENTLY IMPROVED: YOUTUBE ADS


YouTube ads are a perfect and cheap way to boost a new video or a channel. Without YouTube ads, many new YouTubers have to hire influencers or freelancers. So YouTube ads are a cheaper and more legitimate solution for getting more views.
I'll walk you through different types of YouTube ads and their pros and cons for different situations. I'll also show you how to get views for a penny per view. When you run ads for a penny per view, they are actually cheaper than that because many of your viewers go on to subscribe and watch multiple videos so you end up averaging under a penny per view and can grow your YouTube channel with YouTube ads this way.


YOUTUBE MONETIZATION LIKE A BUSINESS PRO


Many people hope to make money by publishing ads on their channels. But that is a poor monetization strategy. Not only do you have to wait a long time to become eligible for monetizing with ads, but the ads don't earn a lot.
You can expect to make an average of a few dollars per 1,000 video views.
I'll show you much stronger YouTube monetization strategies such as selling affiliate products, your services, products you can make, or selling digital products. And many other more effective monetization strategies.

My list of 50 business-success skills after you complete the course

30-DAY, MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE


With a no-questions-asked, Udemy-backed guarantee, you can feel confident in your investment. I am personally committed to helping you succeed on YouTube, just as I have done for thousands of students.

courses.description:
今回のコースは、アニメ動画の編集がテーマになります。
別途でコースをリリースしている、VideoScribe、と、２DキャラクターアニメーションソフトのCrazyTalkの編集作業について、お伝えします。
VideoScribeもCrazyTalkも、それぞれのソフト単体で完成形まで作成することが可能です。本来は、さらなる編集作業など必要ありません。が、編集を加えることで、より豊かな動画表現が可能になります。
編集作業には、ScreenFlowを使います。ScreenFlowは、スクリーンキャストと呼ばれるパソコン画面上の収録がおもな用途です。収録機能と同じく、編集機能もそなわっています。今回、メインでお伝えするのは、編集機能の方になります。
ScreenFlowを使っての、アニメ動画の編集作業は、他に例を見ることのないマレな試みに他なりません。結果として、ライバルにはマネ出来ない動画がつくれるようになります。
他のアニメ動画やスクリーンキャストにも、オリジナリティの高い編集を加えることが出来ます。
また、このコースでは、通常の実写取り動画とアニメ動画がどいった関係にあるかについても、自説をふまえて、お伝えします。

初歩的なユーチューブに関する知識
courses.description:
iPhoneが世に誕生してから、デジカメだけではなく、
いつでもどこでも動画の撮影が簡単になりました。
ネット上の動画配信サイトにアップロードすることで、お金を稼ぐ方法があります。
それが『YouTubeアドセンス』です。
YouTubeで動画を観ていると時々表示される広告。
この広告から収入を得るビジネスモデルを「アフィリエイト」といいます。
再生されるだけで収益となる仕組みがあります。
＜動画１再生あたりの収益＞
YouTube 0.05～0.1円
再生回数や知名度によっても、この報酬は変動していきます。
■YouTubeチャンネルを立ち上げる方法
１．Googleアカウント取得
YouTubeで収入を得るためには、
まずは【Googleアカウント】を取得します。
次に、【YouTubeアカウント】を取得します。
２．YouTubeチャンネル開設
YouTubeアカウントが取得できましたら、
【YouTubeチャンネルを開設】致します。
■YouTubeに動画アップロード
１．動画作成
YouTubeチャンネルの開設ができましたら、
Windowsムービーメーカーなどで動画を作成してください。
講義内で説明致しますが、動画作成はもの凄く簡単です。
２．カスタムサムネイルの作成
動画が作成できましたら、動画の顔となる
【カスタムサムネイル】を作成してください。
■チャンネルに広告を表示させる方法
チャンネルに広告を表示させるためには、
動画をアップロードした後に、
【収益化設定】と【AdSenseアカウント設定】が必要になります。
複雑そうに聞こえますが、
１０分ぐらいで終わる非常に簡単な作業です。
いかがでしたでしょうか？
まだ動画作成なんかできるのか？
っと思っている方がいますが、講義内で詳細を話してありますので、
はっきり言って問題ありません。
ネットビジネスをやるのででしたら、
断然【YouTubeアドセンス】が一番稼ぎやすいです。
なぜかといいますと、
動画をYouTubeにアップロードするだけで
簡単に当日でもたくさんアクセスが集まるからです。
サイトアフィリエイト、トレンドアフィリエイトやブログなどを
やったことをある方は、アクセスを集めるのが、
どれだけ難しいのか知っています。
記事を書いた当日にアクセスがあるのは９９％ありえません。
３か月コツコツ記事を書き続けて、やっとポツポツと
アクセスが集まる程度です。
普通の人は、１００記事以上書く間に全くアクセスがないので
挫折してしまいます。
経験者の私が言うのですから、間違いありません。
それがYouTubeでは１日でアクセスが入ってきます。
収入源である動画に表示される広告も、
YouTube側で動画に合った広告を選定してくれますので、
なんど広告を使用すべきなのか？っと悩む必要もありません。
こんな美味しい【ネットビジネス】が他にありますか？
target_audience: This course is for beginners who want to know more about YouTube.

courses.description:
This course is a straightforward lesson that will help students understand the various ways they can live stream with their YouTube account. We will review the pros and cons of each solution and provide real live demonstration videos. The various methods of live streaming content will include: Google Hangouts on Air, Wirecast Play (Free), Wirecast Pro and Flash Media Encoder. We will also review the CDN (Content Delivery Network) market so that users can compare and contrast the various options available.
We will then take a deep dive into the options that YouTube Live offers including the ability to live stream multiple cameras at the same time. This feature allows viewers to select between multiple cameras on YouTube. Finally we will review the detailed settings you can use in YouTube Live to optimize your live stream including Low Latency and Buffering options.
target_audience: Take this course if you are interested in live streaming
Take this course if you have a YouTube account
DO NOT take this course if you do not have a webcam and/or microphone

courses.description:
You're here because you want to create a popular YouTube Channel, right?
Maybe you're brand new to YouTube, or maybe you have some experience but need help growing your existing channel.
YouTube is the perfect place to grow your own brand, drive traffic to your website, and earn money from YouTube ads and your product and service promotions. And this is the perfect course for you to jumpstart your YouTube Channel.
If you're looking to grow your own brand, GET MORE VIEWS AND SUBSCRIBERS, or start a channel from scratch, this is the perfect course for you!
Whatever your motivation to start a YouTube channel, you’ve come to the right place.
The YouTube Mastery Course is THE most comprehensive, action-packed, YouTube-enhancing course you’ll find on the internet - or your money back.
It's the one place with everything you need to start creating professional videos that get thousands of views & subscribers, and ultimately make you money!
The YouTube Mastery Course is a fast and effective course that takes you from zero skills to a complete YouTube channel with high-quality videos, views, and subscribers.
While there are plenty of YouTube courses that focus on specific aspects of building a YouTube channel, it’s hard to find a comprehensive course like this one, which is for complete beginners and anyone that needs to rapidly grow their YouTube audience.
This course is designed for anyone who makes videos (or wants to make videos) and wants to grow their brand with a YouTube channel. So if you're a complete newbie or someone with a channel that needs help, you're in the right place.
What will you be able to do after taking this course?
· Start a channel from scratch
· Edit Professional Videos With Mobile
· Edit Professional Videos With PC or Laptop
· Edit Video Thumbnail Using Mobile and PC
· Learn YouTube SEO For Ranking Number One in YouTube Search
· Get views without subscribers
· Turn viewers into subscribers
· Create videos on a budget
· Navigate the YouTube platform
· Become a YouTube Partner
· Post and optimize your video with great titles, descriptions, tags, and thumbnails
· Grow your brand through YouTube videos
· Improve your channel by using analytics
· Make money with your YouTube videos - with ads, products and services, sponsors, and crowdfunding
· Use best practices for creating and growing a YouTube channel
Improve Your YouTube Channel, Get More Views & Subscribers, and Make More Money
Regardless of what your level of experience is or what type of camera you use, this in-depth course is designed to provide you with everything you need to launch a successful YouTube channel.
Whether you want to make a channel to promote your business, teach a skill, or just share your life story through vlogs, by understanding what makes a YouTube channel successful, you can replicate and get more views, more subscribers, and make money on your own. This course shows you exactly how to do it.
Contents and Overview
This course is aimed at teaching new YouTubers what it takes to create great videos and make money from them. Most lessons are hands-on tutorials where we walk you through not only what it takes to succeed, but where we show you exactly how to do it.
You'll start with the basics - the best practices for all YouTubers. These tips will get you in the mindset of a YouTuber.
You'll learn how to use the YouTube platform. You’ll sign up for an account, get verified as a YouTube partner, and know-how to navigate the Creator Studio.
You’ll then learn how to make great videos with professional and budget equipment. You’ll learn how to shoot a great video with any camera, how to record great audio, how to light videos with a cheap DIY setup, and how to edit videos efficiently.
After learning how to create amazing videos, you’ll learn how to post them to your YouTube channel with great titles, descriptions, and tags that are SEO friendly and will get you the most views. You’ll even learn how to design and upload a custom thumbnail that increases your views. You’ll learn other optimization strategies to get the most views and subscribers.
By learning how to use analytics, you’ll know which videos work and which videos don’t. This will help you rapidly grow your YouTube channel with smart video creation - only making videos that you know will work.
Lastly, you’ll learn how to make money with YouTube. There are a number of ways that you will learn how to make money with your YouTube videos including ads, physical products Reviews, sponsorship, and Affiliate marketing.
By the end of this course, you will have a YouTube channel that you are proud of. You’ll be making high-quality videos that your audience loves. You’ll be getting more and more subscribers to increase your brand strength. And you’ll be making money from your YouTube channel.
About the instructors:
Jagmeet Brar started teaching online courses in 2011 and now has many happy students. He started his first YouTube channel in 2011 as a way to grow his own brand and is happy to share his knowledge to help you be successful. And he Started a very Popular YouTube Channel in the year 2016 named Bolly Holly Baba and on this channel he has 13 Lakh+ Subscribers. He Is a Pro YouTuber and Earning Good Amount of Money From YouTube and Other Online earning Sources.
Moreover, Jagmeet Brar is a successful YouTubers who make a living by posting videos about Celebrity Interviews, Biographies, Short Movies and News. He has rapidly grown their YouTube channel and get Lakhs of views each day. Bolly Holly Baba is the perfect example of a successful YouTube channel, and are looking forward to helping you start your own.
Go ahead and click the enroll button, and I'll see you in lesson 1!
Cheers,
Jagmeet Singh Brar

· Anyone that wants to create their own YouTube channel, who hasn't done so before and doesn't have any experience with videos or YouTube
· Businesses, entrepreneurs, online teachers, actors, actresses, entertainers, teachers... anyone that wants to build their own brand

requirements: gamilアカウントの取得（gmailアドレスの取得）は必ず行ってください
courses.description:
こんにちは！数ある情報から私のコンテンツに来ていただき、
本当にありがとうございます。


スマホ動画集客講師、佐々木富美と申します。


今まで私は、セラピスト、エクササイズトレーナー、料理研究家、コーチコンサル等々女性起業家に対して、スマホ一台で出来る動画集客の方法をお伝えしてきました。
スマホ動画集客をマスターする事で、今までアプローチする事の出来なかったお客様まで発信する事ができたり、あなたの商品を購入しようか一歩踏み出せずに迷っている方の後押しをする事が出来るようになります。


あなたは今こんな事で悩んでいませんか
・新規のお客様を獲得したい
・既存のお客様にリピートして頂きたい。
・とにかく収入を今より増やしたい
・今の環境から一つ上のステージにあがりたい
・オンラインでの販売を考えている


上記でお悩みの方は、是非スマホ動画集客を学んでください。
３０日、しっかり受講していただければ、スマホ集客の全体像から
具体的な手法、そして実践まで全てをマスターする事が出来るようになります。
現在アメリカでは、動画でお客様を引き寄せる手法が主流となっております。

現に、Googleとyoutubeはファミリーなので、youtubeへ動画をアップロードする事は
Google的には大歓迎ですから、検索ページの１ページ目引き上げてくれるという現象が起きています。


でも、この現状を日本ではまだ知っている人はほとんどいません。
youtubeに動画をアップロードしても、うまく活用していない為に誰にも見てもらえず
陸の孤島に動画を放り投げたのと同じ状態になっているものをよく見かけます。


この講座を受講していただければ、
どうしたらより多くの方に動画を見ていただけるか
動画を見ていただいた方に商品を購入してもらう方法
を分かりやすく解説していきます。


また新規顧客のみならず、既に見込み客となっているお客様にも
効果的に動画を活用する事で、よりあなたのファンとなってもらい
リピート率を高め、自然と収入をあげる事が可能となります。


集客は苦手。。と思っている方は動画をうまく利用する事で
自然とお客様を集める事ができ、喜んで商品やサービスを購入してもらえるようになります。
焦る事はありません。


私と一緒に、動画を一つずつしっかり落とし込んでいきましょう。
必ず、今まで見る事のなかった世界が広がってくるでしょう。
target_audience: サロンのオーナー
コーチ、コンサル業
エクササイズトレーナー
料理教室講師
士業
ファイナンシャルプランナー
セラピスト

courses.title: Camtasia Studio 8 - Esencja.
courses.bio: Nagrywaj, edytuj i dziel się swoją wiedzą. Najlepszy program do nagrywania ekranu ale nie tylko, montażu i udostępniania

Nagrywanie filmu: Nagrywanie prezentacji z PowerPointa za pomocą Camtasia Recorder
Edycja materiału filmowego: Separacja ścieżki na audio i wideo
Tworzenie zawartości interaktywnej: Gorące punkty - Hot spot i kiedy one działają
Efekt Zoom and Pan - czyli przybliżanie czy powiększanie
Przejścia wideo - jak je tworzyć i edytować
Efekty kursora - czyli jak prezentować kliknięcia myszy
Visual Properites - edycja i tworzenie animacji
Tworzenie quizów w trakcie odtwarzania filmów

requirements: Podstawowa umiejętność korzystania z komputera
courses.description:
Program Camtasia Studio to fantastyczne oprogramowanie służące do nagrywania ekranu ale nie tylko, edycji filmów, wzbogacenia ich o elementy graficzne, multimedialne czy interaktywne.
Camtasia Studio 8 - Esencja jest kursem dla tych wszystkich osób, którzy używają Camtasia do tworzenia filmów na komputerze z systemem operacyjnym Windows lub Mac. Od początkujących uczących się tego, czym jest ten program, po doświadczonych użytkowników, którzy chcą nauczyć się więcej na temat łączenia animacji i korzystania z nowych zachowań w wersji 8, ten kurs ma mnóstwo informacji dla uczących się na wszystkich poziomach doświadczenia. Od początkujących po długoletnich użytkowników dowiesz się, jak najlepiej korzystać z Camtasia Studio.
Sekcje kursu Camtasia Studio 8 - Esencja są podzielone na kilka filmów o małym rozmiarze. Jeśli jeszcze nie poznałeś programu  Camtasia, po prostu postępuj zgodnie z kolejnością filmów na lekcje oparte na poprzednich informacjach. Jeśli masz już jakieś doświadczenie z Camtasia, przejdź do któregokolwiek z tematów, z którymi potrzebujesz pomocy. Większość filmów trwa tylko kilka minut. Możesz uzyskać dokładnie to, czego potrzebujesz, kiedy jej potrzebujesz.
Ponieważ mój kurs to Esencja wobec tego znajdziesz tu odpowiedź na najczęstsze nurtujące Ciebie pytania. W kursie przedstawiam kompendium sprawdzonej wiedzy dotyczącej pracy z programem. Omawiam najczęściej stosowane narzędzia i techniki.
Opublikuj swoje pytania. Odpowiadam na większość pytań i komentarzy studentów w ciągu 3 dni (zwykle szybciej). Najlepsze pytania otrzymają odpowiedzi wideo. Stworzę film, aby w pełni odpowiedzieć na wszystkie Twoje pytania. Odpowiedzi wideo (i pytania) zostaną udostępnione wszystkim studentom w opcjonalnej sekcji na końcu kursu.
Jeśli tworzysz filmy szkoleniowe z Camtasia, nauczysz się sztuczek i wskazówek, które pomogą Ci zaoszczędzić czas i sprawią, że Twoje filmy będą wyglądać świetnie! Zarejestruj się teraz, i do zobaczenia w trakcie kursu.

=======================
Kilka słów o programie Camtasia Studio 8
=======================
Camtasia Studio 8 to oprogramowanie, stworzone i opublikowane przez kanadyjską firmę TechSmith, do tworzenia samouczków wideo i prezentacji bezpośrednio przez screencast lub poprzez wtyczkę służącą do nagrywania w programie Microsoft PowerPoint. Nagrywany obszar ekranu może być swobodnie wybierany, a nagrania audio lub inne nagrania multimedialne mogą być nagrywane w tym samym czasie lub dodawane oddzielnie od dowolnego innego źródła i zintegrowane w programie Camtasia.
Camtasia składa się z dwóch głównych komponentów:
Camtasia Recorder - osobne narzędzie do przechwytywania dźwięku i obrazu z ekranu, jak też z podłączonych kamer internetowych.
Edytor Camtasia - komponent, do którego nazwany jest cały produkt, który jest obecnie multimedialnym narzędziem do tworzenia treści z standardowym dla branży wideo interfejsem "osi czasu" do zarządzania wieloma klipami w ułożonej na sobie formie i ulepszeniami podsumowanymi poniżej.
Program Camtasia Studio 8 jest przydatny szczególnie do celu nagrywania szkoleń jak też prezentacji z PowerPointa.
target_audience: E marketerzy, szkoleniowcy, vlogerzy, twórcy filmów poradnikowych

courses.title: Mac版PowerDirector（パワーディレクター）365の使い方！基礎マスターコース
courses.bio: 2020年12月から新しくMac版のPowerDirectorが発売されました。Windows版に比べて機能制限はありますが今後どんどんアップデートされてWindows版に近づいていくと思います。

はじめに: Mac版PowerDirector365について
Mac版PowerDirector365の制限

プレビューウィンドウの基本

確認とDirectorZoneとサイバーリンククラウド

requirements: PowerDirectorのダウンロード
courses.description:
このコースは【Mac版】PowerDirector365の使い方の基礎を網羅的に解説しているコースです。
Mac版はサブスクリプション型の365しか選択できませんが月額500円（年払いで6000円ほど）とかなり安価に利用することができます。
Mac版はWindows版に比べてまだまだ機能制限が多く、マルチカム編集ができる「マルチカムデザイナー」も現時点では利用できません。
今後は、アップデートされて、利用できるようになってくると思います。
使ってみた感想は、値段の割には、かなり高機能ですし、音声のノイズ除去やノーマライズなど実際に必要な機能がワンタッチで適用できるので、編集初心者にはかなりありがたいツールだと思いました。
字幕テロップも簡単に入れることができますし、特にYouTube配信する人なんかに必要な昨日は大体揃っています。
何より、1番のポイントは簡単だということです。
Premiere ProやFinal Cut Pro X、DaVinci Resolveは高機能ですが、覚えるのが少し難しい印象です。
でも、PowerDirectorは必要な機能を簡単に利用できますから、それほど覚えることもありません。
iMovieなどの無料ツールだと物足りないですし、高機能ツールは難しいという方は、PowerDirectorがおすすめです。
初心者にも使いやすく、それでいて、機能としての物足りなさはありません。
これから、初めて動画編集をスタートする人が最初にトライするには最も最適だと言えます。
ぜひ、コースで学んで動画編集を実践してみてください。
target_audience: PowerDirectorの使い方を学びたい方
SNSに動画を活用したい方
YouTube配信をしたい方
動画編集スキルを身につけたい方

courses.bio: Maîtrisez la Création de Vidéos avec l'Intelligence Artificielle : De la Production à la Monétisation
objectives: Création de Vidéos YouTube avec l'IA
Création de Vidéos Verticales pour TikTok, YouTube Shorts et Instagram

requirements: Connaissances de base en informatique
Compétences de base en rédaction et création de contenu
Outils nécessaires
Motivation et ouverture à l’IA
Aucune expérience préalable requise
courses.description:
Dans ce cours complet, vous apprendrez à maîtriser l’art de la création de vidéos en utilisant l’intelligence artificielle, un domaine en pleine expansion qui vous permettra de créer un contenu vidéo de qualité professionnelle, rapidement et sans effort. Grâce à des outils IA de dernière génération, vous découvrirez comment automatiser l’écriture de scripts, créer des visuels percutants, générer des voix réalistes et monter des vidéos de manière fluide. Ce cours est conçu pour les créateurs de contenu, les freelances, et toute personne souhaitant se lancer dans la production vidéo moderne avec l'IA.
Vous débuterez par une introduction à la création de contenu avec l'IA, puis plongerez dans des modules avancés qui vous enseigneront à créer des vidéos YouTube complètes, des vidéos verticales pour TikTok, YouTube Shorts et Instagram, ainsi que des vidéos courtes. Vous apprendrez également à optimiser votre contenu pour maximiser son impact et sa portée sur les plateformes sociales.
Le cours va au-delà de la simple création vidéo. Vous découvrirez des stratégies de monétisation pour transformer vos vidéos en véritables sources de revenus. Avec des astuces et des techniques de montage, vous serez capable de rendre vos vidéos irrésistibles et captivantes, tout en apprenant à tirer parti de l'IA pour générer des idées et accroître votre productivité.
Aucune expérience préalable en vidéo n'est nécessaire. Ce cours vous guide pas à pas dans la création, la publication et la monétisation de vidéos avec l’IA, pour que vous puissiez vous lancer dans le monde de la création de contenu vidéo avec succès et rentabilité.
target_audience: Créateurs de contenu débutants ou confirmés
Freelancers et entrepreneurs
Marketeurs et gestionnaires de réseaux sociaux
Toute personne passionnée par l’IA et la création de contenu
Étudiants et professionnels en reconversion
Ceux qui souhaitent monétiser leur contenu

Módulo 1: Descarga y configura lo básico: Descarga y configura lo básico de WhatsApp Business
Módulo 2: Crea tu catálogo de productos: Crea tu catálogo paso a paso
Módulo 4: Define tu sistema de etiquetas: Define tu sistema de etiquetas y usa el “miniCRM”

Bonus 3: Datos y contexto - el Estado de: Datos y Contexto: El Estado del WhatsApp Marketing

requirements: No, solo ganas de aprender y la posibilidad de aplicarlo cuanto antes.
courses.description:
¡Hola!


Antes de nada: este curso está ya algo desactualizado.
Las bases siguen siendo válidas, pero varias cosas han cambiado.
Creo que todavía tiene validez y, si lo actualizo, tendrás acceso al nuevo material.


WhatsApp es la aplicación que tus clientes están usando, para todo.
Hay muchos estudios que la sitúan como una de las aplicaciones que más se usan en el mundo, y veremos datos y estudios que lo demuestran más adelante.
Pero estoy seguro de que eso ya lo sabes y por eso estás aquí.
Quieres empezar a usar WhatsApp para tu negocio. En este curso vamos a hacerlo todo muy sencillo y accesible, para que te puedas centrar en lo importante.


Pero solo para los nuevos: una vez que pagues, tendrás actualizaciones gratuitas, de por vida.
¿Por qué?
Porque estás siendo una persona pionera.
Porque el curso seguro que se enriquece con tus aportaciones.
Porque personalmente odio que los mejores precios sean para los que llegan más tarde.


Así que si quieres unirte a la era del WhatsApp Marketing, este es el momento perfecto para empezar.
Imagino que ahora mismo tendrás 3 preguntas:


1. ¿Qué hay ahora en el curso?
Ahora mismo tenemos 6 módulos y 3 bonus especiales.
En esta primera parte del curso cubrimos los aspectos esenciales de WhatsApp Business y hacemos un repaso del estado del arte de las últimas novedades del ecosistema de WhatsApp.
Si quieres aprender a usar WhatsApp Business y sacarle el máximo partido, este es el momento.


2. ¿Qué vamos a añadir?
Casos de éxito reales, explicados paso a paso.
Entrevistas a desarrolladores y agencias especializadas.
Un apartado completamente nuevo del curso:
Campañas
Live chat
Bots
3. ¿Quién narices eres y por qué debería pagar por este curso?


Soy Iván Fanego, también conocido como “Iván Critic”.
Hace 5 años creé AppCritic con un objetivo: descubrir soluciones de software para empresas que puedan ayudar a negocios de todo el mundo a ser más productivos.
target_audience: Personas que tengan un negocio (tiendas, restaurantes, agencias inmobiliarias etc.) u ofrezcan un servicio en el que tengan contacto directo con el cliente.

courses.description:
The 3 YouTube hacks that built a business (in a few months) by leveraging free traffic from YouTube in this new and exponential way...


What you’re about to see is a breakthrough in how you can leverage YouTube to sell anything online...

You name it, you can sell it, using this powerful traffic and sales system.


Did you know that YouTube is the 2nd LARGEST SEARCH ENGINE in the world?

This means that your perfect customer is likely already searching for you, your product, your service on YouTube, RIGHT NOW!

And all you need is a SYSTEM that:


Captures your best leads,
Warms them up and
Gets them ready to buy as soon as possible.

This is that system...


What’s Missing In Most Selling Systems Is the warm up


What do I mean by “the warm up”?

The warm up is when you take an icy cold audience and build a relationship with them so that they know you, like you and trust you.


And THEN...


And ONLY THEN...


Will They BUY FROM YOU...


Think about it, in everything you’ve tried that didn’t work out:

Was the audience WARMED UP to buying from you, or was it the FIRST TIME they ever saw you and your offer?


I can tell you that it was probably the ONLY time they ever saw your offer!

And think about it – have YOU ever bought something sight unseen the very first time you saw it AND without trusting the person you bought it from?


Most of us have to at least TRUST the person we are buying from, right?


So MOST people will not buy from you the first time, and that’s why THE WARM UP is so important.


THIS IS KEY!


With this YouTube system, your leads get warmed up automatically, so they go from icy cold leads…

…to warmed up and ready to buy customers.


That is the one huge advantage to this system that no one else teaches.


In just a few short months, we've taken a brand new YouTube channel and created 5 income streams from it.


YouTube Ad Revenue
Course Sales
Paid Newsletter
Affiliate Sales
Sponsored Videos And Sponsored Channel


And we did this in just a few months due to the system you're about to learn here.


You'll learn:


How to set up your YouTube channel
How to set up your lead magnet
How to set up your email newsletter
How to build your audience using YouTube SEO
How to build your list using YouTube's free traffic
How to build a "snowball effect" so your traffic, audience and list grows exponentially


And much more
You can sell pretty much anything with this system because you are tapping into YouTube, the second largest search engine in the world.


People are already looking for your product or service on YouTube, and this is the smart way to put yourself in front of your perfect prospects.

courses.title: What Is Your Passion In Life? Make A Film About It.
courses.bio: A Call To Action
objectives: Students will learn how to select and approach non-profit organisations to help them make a better world.
Students will learn how to Focus their film, write a Brief, how to use that Brief to write a Proposal and how the Proposal is used to write a Shooting Script.
Well made focussed films will help your non-profit get more funding and through that help more people, animals or our world that we live in.
Students can use the handouts and exercises to start production on their own real life film.

Making Promotional Films for Non-Profit: Promotional Films For NGO and NPO Clients - Practical Exercises

requirements: Some ability to shoot and edit raw film material
Have a passion for social justice issues and make films that will make a difference.
courses.description:
What is you special passion in life? What is your special charity or non-profit organisation that you support and want to work for? Do they work with People, Animals or the Environment - or all three?  Whatever your interest and their area of operation - they need funds. And one of the best ways to secure funding is to tell stories in a way that people can understand and believe in what you are doing.
Well here is an opportunity to learn how to make effective films.
Making films for non-profit organisations requires staying in close touch with what your client needs all the time. The focus in this course is to ensure that a solid brief is taken before any production starts. Making sure that what the non-profit company wants in terms of a film is what you will give them. From the briefing stage the course moves through to writing a proposal for the non-profit company, getting their acceptance and then moving on to completing a script for the film.
This course is for students who are either part of a non-profit or charity or want to make films for their passions and favourite organisations. If you are part of an NPO you will develop in-house production skills for your charity. If you are outside an NPO you will learn how to find an organisation you want to make a film for, then take a brief from them on how they will use the film, then you write a proposal for your film and finally develop a script that will ensure your film has a compelling content.
To help you along with planning your first promotional film there is also an on-the-job practical project consisting of three exercises (with detailed handouts) to help you along with producing your first promotional film. Remember, you get to choose the organisation doing the kind of work that you are most interested in. So help your favourite charity by making a film for them.
Have fun and at the same time take away some practical skills that will help you and your charity make films that will not only be great to watch but will also help them with funding and support.
For more detailed production skills also take a look at the Documentary Filmmaking Masterclass, also on Udemy.
target_audience: Aspiring social justice filmmakers and people who work in the non-profit sector.
For people who want to help change the world.

courses.title: Reels без танцев: как выстроить Стратегию Видеоконтента
courses.bio: Как встроить Reels в маркетинг: как создать видео-систему, которая работает на продукт, доверие и привлечение клиентов

Вводная часть: Добро пожаловать! Для кого этот курс
Как работает видеомаркетинг: Почему видеоконтент - лучший формат. Домашнее задание
Создаем контент-матрицу: Создаем контент-матрицу на месяц вперед с ChatGPT
Система, где каждый элемент работает по целям
Система на автомате: как всё работает вм: Мой путь: как выглядит автоматизация Reels в реальности
Ваша очередь: как перейти от курса к действию

requirements: Для прохождения нашего курса не требуется никаких предварительных знаний или навыков по видеопродакшену. Всё, что вам нужно - это интерес к теме и желание учиться!
courses.description:
Этот курс — не про "танцы ради охватов", а про выстроенную систему, где каждое видео работает на маркетинг, доверие и продажи.
Здесь не будет "100 идей для Reels" и "магии алгоритмов".
Здесь — стратегия для тех, кто хочет клиентов, а не лайков.
Если ты эксперт, предприниматель, продюсер или владелец небольшого бизнеса — и у тебя есть что продавать —
ты поймёшь, как видео может стать твоим самым сильным маркетинговым инструментом.

Что внутри:
1. Нужны ли тебе вообще Reels?
Разбираем без иллюзий: где видео действительно помогает продвигать продукт, а где — просто тратит ресурсы.
2. Ниша и аудитория
Проверим твою тему на жизнеспособность. Поможем понять, кому ты продаёшь и зачем ты вообще выходишь в кадр.
3. Стратегия "Теплица"
Модель контента, которая "греет" подписчика до покупки — без манипуляций, но с логикой.
4. CAC и видео как часть воронки
Как Reels вписываются в экономику твоего маркетинга и помогают снижать стоимость привлечения клиента.
5. Контент-матрица
Вся стратегия собирается в понятную систему: какие видео нужны именно тебе и в какой последовательности. В этом нам конечно же поможет ChatGPT!

ChatGPT — твой стратег и креативный редактор.
Мы не просто "спрашиваем нейросеть что снимать" — мы учимся думать как маркетолог и формулировать промпты как продюсер.

Результат — ChatGPT помогает тебе:
составить контент-матрицу под твою нишу и ЦА с правильным соотношением охватного, вовлекающего, экспертного и продажного контента,
найти формулировки, которые цепляют,
адаптировать один и тот же смысл под разные форматы (Reels, карусель, сторис),
упростить сложное и превратить экспертность в смотрибельный контент,
писать сценарии и сториборды для AI-видео.
А дальше — подключаем нейросетевой продакшен:

ChatGPT готовит текст →
Heygen и D-ID превращает это в видео с аватаром →
Revid нарезает лучшие фрагменты и создает видео чисто по текстовому промпту →
Opus Clip делает автонарезку горизонтальных на Reels →
Runway, Hailuo и Kling добавляют визуальный вау-эффект.
Всё это — чтобы продвигать твой продукт, а не просто кормить ленту контентом и свое тщеславие.
Этот курс — стартовая площадка.

Потом ты просто подключаешь автоматизацию и выпускаешь Reels в потоке — без выгорания и суеты.
target_audience: Эксперты и специалисты, продвигающие личный бренд. Курс поможет выстроить стратегию контента, который подогревает доверие и работает на продукт.
Предприниматели, развивающие свои услуги или онлайн-продукты
Продюсеры, маркетологи и контент-менеджеры. урс даст структуру видеоконтента, поможет объяснить клиенту, зачем и как снимать Reels, и покажет, как делегировать продакшн нейросетям.

Творцы и контент-креаторы, уставшие от хаоса и выгорания. авторы, видеомейкеры, которые ищут способ систематизировать контент и перестать “пилить ради алгоритма”. Курс покажет, как выйти из гонки идей, собрать стратегию и использовать нейросети как творческую и продюсерскую опору.

courses.title: Green Screen From the Comfort of Your Home
courses.bio: A-Z green screen video creation guide. Learn Hollywood techniques for the fraction of the cost!
objectives: Create professional looking green screen videos
Learn how to build a TelePromter for just $1
Choose the right equipment and sofware
Learn how to set correct camera settings and how it impacts the video
Learn editing techniques that will make videos more engaging
Bonus material will teach you how to create crisp white and black backgrounds

Production / Behind the Scenes: Bonus Video - How to Build a Telepromter
Case Study Part 1 - Preping Your Script

requirements: All you will need for this course is a Computer
To shoot and edit green screen videos you will need all the gear (this course will explain where to get everything cheap)
You need to be able to download Editing Software
courses.description:
Course Description
Have you ever wanted to create Green Screen Videos from the comfort of your home or the office, but always thought it would be too complicated or expensive to do?! If so, then I am happy to tell you that it has never been more affordable and easy to build your own Green Screen Studio for the fraction of the cost used in professional video production and I will show you exactly how! Not only you will learn all the secrets behind the green screen videos, but also video production in general.
You don't need to have any prior experience of any editing software, or working with DSLR cameras to learn all the skills taught in this course. It's designed to provide you with the most comprehensive curriculum  that will take you step by step from initial theory about the light , sound , type of green screens and different cameras that you can use to achieve optimal quality of your green screen videos, to actual production and post-production stages where you will learn how to build your own studio, shoot your videos, and finally edit them so that they look and sound as if they were shot in a professional studio.
Course Structure
This course is divided in 4 parts.
Part 1 is Pre-Production : This is where you will learn what kind of equipment you will need to start creating you Green Screen Videos, where to buy it from for the most affordable prices, and how to build your studio.
Part 2 is Production : This part is packed with great material. Here I will take you behind the scenes and demonstrate you how I shoot my green screen videos. After going through all the lessons in Part 2 you should be ready to stand up in front of the camera with your green screen evenly lit behind you, and start shooting your own green screen videos.
I know a lot of people do not feel confident in front of the camera (including me), that's why as a BONUS to this part I am going to reveal how you can build your own TELEPROMTER and start reading your script word by word without looking away from the camera lens. This is invaluable tool used by many professionals that allow them to look prepared, competent , knowledgeable and very confident when delivering their content. And the best part of this bonus is that you can build this telepromter for less than a DOLLAR.
Part 3 is Post-Production : One thing is to shoot your videos, but another is to edit them so that they don't look cheap, amateurish, and cheesy. My goal here is to equip you with the techniques that are easy to learn, and when applied make your overall image look like it was done by professionals even if you never used editing software before. You will learn how to remove and replace the background in less than 10 minutes, how to create Flying titles, how to cut your footage so it looks more engaging and hold the interest of your viewers, and much more... All you have to do is simply follow my instructions and you'll learn all the essential editing tools in no time.
and finally....Part 4
This part is designed to show you other low budget methods how to achieve professional looking image if you don't want to deal with the green screen. In this module I will teach you how to achieve classic white background look (i.e Big Think) , and what kind of videos you can start creating to promote your business, engage with your audience, and sell more.
Is this Course for You?
I bet you know that VIDEO is the ULTIMATE SELLING MACHINE, and if you are not using it in your strategy whether to sell more products, educate people, drive more traffic to your website or online courses, etc. than you are loosing out on the huge opportunities. Reports show that by 2018, video will account for 80% of all consumer internet traffic. And that 52% of marketing professionals name video as the content with the best ROI. So if you always wanted to start producing video content and green screen videos to add creative flare to your content, then this course is for you.
After completing this course you will know everything you need to know about GREEN Screen and VIDEO Production.
You will get answers to questions like :
What camera to use ?
How to record good quality audio and what microphone to use ?
How to achieve good lighting ?
What material to use for Green Screen ?
What are the best in camera settings ?
How to prepare your Script ?
What is the best editing software ?
How to color correct your footage ?
What kind of Videos to shoot ?
The list goes on , and I don't want to overwhelm you. I structured this course so that you only learn what is essential first , before moving on to the next modules. The course is very engaging and the material is presented in variety of forms that includes both Screen Recordings and Power Point Slides, as well as live recordings from my "studio".
If this sounds like the right course for you, then welcome to "Green Screen from the Comfort of Your Home"
target_audience: This course is for anyone who wants to learn how to make perfect Green Screen Video from Home on a Budget!

courses.description:
Have you always wanted to start that YouTube channel, but didn't know where to start?

OR
Do you feel overwhelmed by the idea of running and maintaining a YouTube channel?
This course designed to clear those doubts and guide you through every step needed to get started with your YouTube channel, and go from having nothing to having a fully functional channel that you will be able to continue with after finishing this course.
I have been creating content on YouTube for over three years and am very knowledgeable of the platform as a result of this experience. I know exactly where everything is on the website and what the exact steps are to create a new YouTube channel from scratch due. Over my years on YouTube I have also made many mistakes on the platform which I have learnt from and will pass on to you so that you do not make the same mistakes that I have done and hit then ground running when you start creating your content.
Contained in this course:

I will cover these topics very thoroughly and will show you everything that you need to know when you are getting started on YouTube, whether it is with how you should go about recording the audio and video for your first video, to what topic you could do for your first video, to how you put an end-screen or annotations on your video.

courses.description:
If you're frustrated with amateur looking videos and the slow progress of your business growth.
DIGITAL CHEF ACADEMY IS YOUR NEW BEST FRIEND.
This program will never teach you out-of-date things. You can be yourself and satisfied everyday through this business model.

Tanto si eres una marca personal como una empresa que busca crecer en Instagram, YouTube, Facebook o TikTok, este curso te ayudará a lograrlo.

Comprender qué son los Reels/Shorts & Stories y cómo utilizarlos estratégicamente.
Saber qué equipos necesitas para hacer videos atractivos sin gastar una fortuna.

Horas de lecciones en video fáciles de seguir.
Material descargable con los mejores consejos de cada lección.
Soporte del instructor para responder cualquier duda.
Acceso de por vida con actualizaciones constantes.
Este curso está basado en la práctica y el mundo real.
Todo lo que enseñamos se basa en nuestra propia experiencia en redes sociales y en el análisis de los creadores más exitosos. Incluimos casos de estudio reales para que veas cómo aplicamos las estrategias.
Además, te guiaremos en la creación de un short/reel y una serie de stories, desde la planificación hasta la publicación.
Lo más importante es que aprenderás a reutilizar un solo video en todas las plataformas, para que puedas maximizar tu visibilidad con menos esfuerzo.

This course is designed to do more than introduce you to FCP. It was created to give you an in depth look at all the power Final Cut has to offer. Storytelling with video can be very satisfying and rewarding...IF you can get past the frustration of learning new software. This course aims to help you, not only feel comfortable with FCP, but to command it. Make it work for you!
Learning keyboard shortcuts, and the tools that make the editing process faster and easier will help you spend more time with the creative side of content creation and storytelling.

courses.description:
In meiner Serie "Powerpoint 4 Video" zeige ich dir, wie du auf Powerpoint coole Marketing- und Erklärvideos (Explainer Videos) erstellen kannst.
Dies ist Kapitel A!
Ich habe seit Jahren eine Firma, die Marketing- und Explainer-Videos erstellt. Viele Menschen wissen nicht, dass man schon auf Powerpoint tolle animierte Videos erstellen kann. Hier lernst du wie!
Kapitel A heißt "Meet Oscar" Hier zeige ich dir, wie du einen Comic-Avatar für deine Explainer-Videos verwendest und animierst.
Du lernst 5 verschiedene Animationen:
In Teil 1 gebe ich dir eine kleine Einführung über Video Scipting und auch wo du coole Bilder für deine Avatare finden kannst. Danach beginnen wir mit einer ersten Animation.
In Teil 2 zeige ich dir, wie du deinen Avatar durch blinzeln gleich viel lebendiger und menschlicher erscheinen lässt.
In Teil 3 lernst du, wie du die Laune deines Avatars ändern kannst.
Teil 4 zeigt dir, wie du auch selbst einen neuen Gesichtsausdruck für deinen Avatar kreieren kannst.
In Teil 5 siehst du, wie du deinen Avatar auch sprechen lassen kannst.
Weitere Kurse zum Thema Powerpoint 4 Video sind bereits in Planung!
Dieser Kurs zeigt nicht, wie man Videos rendert und schneidet, er befasst sich nur mit der Animation auf Powerpoint! Basis-Kenntnisse in Powerpoint sind von Vorteil!
Hinweis: Ich bin nicht mehr im Udemy-Marketing-System. Von mir wirst du keine Kurse um 9,99 € mehr bekommen!

courses.description:
This course by Nisandeh Neta, a multimillionaire marketing expert that has cooperated with world class experts such us Sir Richard Branson, Brian Tracy, Jay Abraham and Rich Schefren, is focused on boosting your coaching/consulting/expert business through video marketing.
Video is a quick, free and easy way to connect with your target market and really talk to them. I’ve often heard that it can be a scary experience to record yourself or that it is hard to think of what exactly to record. In this course I will share with you 10 different kinds of video that you can start with right now to connect with your audience and to grow your business.

– The 10 most effective types of videos to grow your business
– What type of videos work on Facebook, on your website, on your landing pages, with case studies
– The most common mistakes to avoid
– What equipment to use through case studies
– Tips & Tricks to look awesome on camera (from an expert videographer)
– How to easily overcome the fear of standing in front to of the camera
– When and why to use each type of video
– The step-by-step action plan (what to do first and what to do later) without getting overwhelmed

How will it change your business?

This course will make you aware of the various possibilities that you have when it comes to using videos to grow your business. It will help you tell apart the different type of video for each occasion and what suits best for each strategic marketing objective.
Also, you’ll easily overcome the reluctance of standing in front of a camera and bring home an easy-to-implement action plan that will walk you through the steps and avoid becoming overwhelmed with unnecessary technicalities.
After this course, you will be able to start using videos with full confidence for all your marketing campaigns and even get ready to wing it LIVE!
Creating videos is one of the most powerful ways to grow your business. Through videos you can:

-build your credibility as an expert,
-attract the right clients easier,
-get clients to clearly see how you are different from your competitors,
-save yourself plenty of time trying to explain the same things to different people
-build a stronger relationship with your potential clients and more.
If you are looking for implementable strategies to grow your business, video might be the solution you were looking for.

Important: Nisandeh is answering questions almost daily to help you keep growing your business.


Ready to join?
target_audience: Coaches that want to use video to grow their business and are interested to learn about the marketing side of videos
Coaches that feel that they are overworked & underpaid
Coaches that want to build a brand as the go-to person in their field and want to use video to do it

courses.description:
Se você quer ter o seu podcast mas não sabe por onde começar, ou se já tem trabalha na área mas quer aperfeçoar suas técnicas, este curso é para você! O mundo dos videocasts está crescendo exponencialmente, oferecendo uma oportunidade única para indivíduos criativos e empreendedores expressarem suas ideias e alcançarem uma audiência global.


Neste curso completo, você vai aprender tudo o que precisa para criar, produzir e monetizar seu próprio podcast ou videocast, mesmo se estiver começando do zero. Cada etapa do processo será apresentada com detalhes práticos, insights valiosos e, principalmente, demonstrações de como a IA pode agilizar seu trabalho.


Ao longo do curso, você aprenderá:
1. Conceitos Básicos e Planejamento: Descubra o que são podcasts e videocasts, entenda seu público-alvo, defina seus objetivos e crie um plano estratégico para o seu conteúdo.
2. Equipamentos e Software Essenciais: Conheça os equipamentos necessários para gravação de áudio e vídeo, além dos softwares de edição e distribuição mais populares e eficazes.
3. Produção de Conteúdo Cativante: Aprenda técnicas de storytelling, roteiro, entrevistas, e edição para garantir que seu conteúdo seja envolvente e atrativo para seus ouvintes e espectadores.
4. Distribuição e Marketing: Descubra as melhores plataformas para distribuir seu podcast ou videocast, bem como estratégias de marketing para aumentar sua audiência e construir uma comunidade engajada.
5. Monetização e Sustentabilidade: Explore várias formas de monetização, incluindo publicidade, patrocínios, crowdfunding, produtos e serviços relacionados ao seu conteúdo. Aprenda a construir uma estratégia de negócios sustentável para transformar sua paixão em uma fonte de renda.


Este curso é ministrado por um especialista na área, com vasta experiência em produção de mídia digital e principalmente de podcasts. Se você está pronto para transformar sua paixão em uma carreira lucrativa e ou alavancar seu negócio, inscreva-se agora e embarque nesta jornada emocionante rumo ao mundo dos podcasts!

courses.description:
Are you a brand-new user of Vyond Studio and want to make amazing videos but have NO IDEA where to begin? Better yet! Are you an advanced user looking for better explanations on complicated topics? Well, you’re in the right place.


Hi, my name’s David Martin and I’ve been worked in entertainment for over a decade. I’ve been in love with cartoons for over 30 years but had a problem. I wanted to make my own animations but wasn’t very good at drawing. When I found Vyond Studio, I was completely amazed and how much this software engine had to offer.


At first, I was so excited but had no idea what I was doing. Although there are some good tutorials out there, I didn’t feel like they explained things well enough. Most of the things I know are from exploring on my own. I needed more detail to understand what was going on when I was completely lost.


Don’t end up like me.


I have created a course that dives deep into detail and won’t leave you hanging or rush through the teaching process. Invest in my expert knowledge and I will teach you step by step how to do everything from basic buttons and character creation, all the way to different camera effects and information on voice acting. My instructions will come in real-time and will not be rushed.


I’m going to teach you things that other tutorials did not. I’ll be going into detail and overviewing this program at a slower pace. Beginners will feel comfortable using Vyond, while advanced users can pick up new tricks along the way. And I really mean that.




--------------------------------------------------------------------




I broke the course into three sections with 54 short, easy lessons.


-----------------


Section 1 - The Must Know, which advanced users can usually skip.


-----------------

-----------------


Section 2 - The helpful hints


-----------------


23 - Music. Adding. Cutting. Fade. Volume. - basics
24 - More Camera and Zoom

27 - Text to speech feature
28 - Character placement - Does it fit the camera angle or is it funky?

-----------------


Section 3 – My Secret Stash
-----------------
This is the one you’re going to want! I’m going to be teaching you things that are tough to find. Do not miss these insights from a professional.
-----------------
38 - Pair Sounds with Scene Boxes

-----------------


If you’re ready to produce the very best professional animated videos, click down there and get started. Every moment you waste is a moment you could be learning the easiest animation software in the world.


Thank you very much for your time in advance and I look forward to teaching you the best information.


What are you waiting for? Get started today!

Bạn có muốn học cách tạo video Shorts & Reels hấp dẫn để phát triển mạnh trên mạng xã hội?
Bạn có muốn sử dụng Stories để kết nối với khán giả của mình?
Bạn đang gặp khó khăn trong việc theo kịp các xu hướng mới nhất trên Instagram, TikTok và YouTube?
Nhưng bạn cũng muốn phát triển thương hiệu của mình để mở rộng kinh doanh, tăng thu nhập hoặc đơn giản là kết nối với nhiều người hơn.
Nếu đó là bạn, thì The Shorts Film School chính là khóa học hoàn hảo dành cho bạn!
Dù bạn là cá nhân xây dựng thương hiệu hay doanh nghiệp muốn tăng tốc trên Instagram, YouTube, Facebook hoặc TikTok, khóa học này sẽ giúp bạn bắt đầu đúng hướng.
Mục tiêu khóa học dành cho bạn:
Hiểu rõ Shorts/Reels & Stories là gì và cách sử dụng chúng hiệu quả.
Biết chính xác thiết bị nào cần dùng để tạo video hấp dẫn mà không cần đầu tư quá nhiều tiền.
Học cách lập kế hoạch nội dung với nghiên cứu trong lĩnh vực của bạn, giúp tiết kiệm thời gian & công sức vào những điều thực sự hiệu quả.
Làm chủ cấu trúc của một video ngắn để thu hút khán giả ngay từ giây đầu tiên và giữ chân họ đến cuối.

courses.description:
The Ins and Outs of Successful Online Video Marketing
Dear Friend,
YouTube and Facebook introduced live streaming for a reason — people want video content. Some of the most successful YouTube channels today are vlogs, and audiences continue to grow rapidly.
The good news is that you don’t need millions of subscribers to make money from vlogging. Many creators earn a full-time income with smaller, more focused audiences. With the right approach, you can turn your passion into a rewarding business by sharing your experiences and expertise through video.
Why Video Marketing Works
Video creates stronger emotional connections than text or images.
People trust content that feels authentic and relatable.
Video platforms like YouTube, Instagram, and TikTok make it easier than ever to reach global audiences.
Brands and individuals alike use video to build credibility and increase sales.
The challenge today is not just creating videos, but creating videos that convert — content that gets viewers to subscribe, engage, and ultimately take action.
What You’ll Learn in This Course
What vlogging really is and how it works
Ideas for profitable vlogs and video topics
How to launch a vlog with maximum impact
Steps to create engaging, high-quality videos
How to optimize your YouTube videos for growth
Strategies to promote your vlog and increase subscribers
Free tools to help grow your channel faster
Different ways to monetize your vlog
Best practices for building a long-term video brand
Essentials of modern video marketing and how to make your content stand out
How to build trust (KLT: Know-Like-Trust) with your audience through video
Why This Course Matters
Video marketing isn’t just a trend — it’s a proven strategy that continues to dominate online. The key is understanding how to combine timeless marketing principles with the latest tools and platforms. This course gives you both.
By the end, you’ll know how to create impactful content, grow your following, and monetize your videos effectively — whether you’re building a personal brand, growing a business, or simply sharing your passion with the world.
Final Note: Vlogging and video marketing are opportunities available to everyone. With the right mindset and strategies, you can turn viewers into subscribers and subscribers into loyal fans — and income.
The Elite Team Group
Entrepreneurs, Market Experts, and Online Tutors
target_audience: Anyone want to create A Successful Video Blog For Profit.
